description.en: This course gives a brief introduction with those knowledge related architecture and construction for the freshmen of department of Architecture, that students may have a whole concept about each professional courses for the future 4 years. This course is focus on training the ability of thinking & observation of students to establish the integrated structure of Architecture.

description.zh: 圖學課程概述【上學期】授課內容: 圖學基礎著重於基礎圖學與繪圖能力的建構，並導入基本設計練習。(理論上，視各位大一同學基本能力為零從頭教起)教學內容:字體、線條、平面造型、三視圖、立體圖、剖面、一點透視、二點透視、草模製作【下學期】授課內容: 建築製圖著重於建築設計常用圖面與表現法之繪製能力建立。(本課程與下學期之大一建築設計、表現法相互接軌，其設計作品之圖面、模型部份作為本課程之作業成績)教學內容:陰影、速寫、景物描繪、平面圖、立面圖、剖面圖、分解圖、設計說明、配置、版面設計
description.en: The course objective is to train students understanding and fully employing the emerging technology of drawing methods in the architectural design process. The main topics base on CNS standards of Architectural drawing, and contents include: Site analysis, Plan, Section, etc. Finally, a series of exercises seeks to expand students' abilities to utilize various software packages of computer graphics.

description.zh: 本課程的授課內容如下：1.	木造技術發展史2.	2.磚造技術發展史3.	3.RC造技術發展史4.	4.鋼骨造技術發展史5.	混合構造技術發展史
description.en: The course content about followings:1.	Developmental history of wooden construction2.	Developmental history of brick construction3.	Developmental history of RC construction4.	Developmental history of steel construction5.	Developmental history of mixed construction

name.en: Aesthetics Approach to Architecture and Environment

description.zh: 本課程涵蓋建築美學和環境美學兩大部分，旨在培養學生建築與環境的美學鑑賞力與美感能力、最終能對建築專業有所提升。課程分為四部分：1 中西方美學知識論2 建築美學發展脈絡3 環境美學發展脈絡4 當前建築美學課題與專業的啟發
description.en: This course is about Aesthetics approach to Architecture and Environmen that is aimed to establish connoisseurship on architecture and environment, and therefore enhance ability toward design practice. The class includes four parts:1 The Aesthetics epistemology   2 The context of Architectural aesthetics3 the context of Environmental aesthetics4 Contemporary issues on aesthetics inspirations from the professionals.

description.zh: 一、	從廣域範圍介紹自然生態與人文資源永續發展之道二、	藉由我國現階段環境發展策略及個案經驗，實務討論生態環境課題與措施。三、	課程內容涵蓋台灣自然與生態環境現況、森林、山坡地、農地、能源、海洋、自然保育、人文環境保育、環境法規、環境影響評估。
description.en: 1.	It will introduce the sustainable development of natural ecology and human resources through wide range.2.	It will emphasize with students to discuss the issues and strategies on environmental ecology. Those discussions will depend on national environmental development policies and special cases in recent years.3.	This course will include Taiwan nature and ecology, forest, lands lope , farmland, coastal area, natural conservation , human resources ,environmental impact assessment.

description.zh: 本校體育課程目標為鍛鍊健全身心、促進身心健全發展、培養運動道德、發揚團隊精神及養成終身運動習慣。四技一年級實施普通班體育正課教學。四技二、三年級實施專項分組教學，由具有專長之教師授課。開課項目：籃球、排球、桌球、羽球、保齡球、射箭、高爾夫球、網球、體操遊戲、慢速壘球、太極拳、國際標準舞、體適能、國術。學生得按自己興趣選擇修習。本校體育課程目標為鍛鍊健全身心、促進身心健全發展、培養運動道德、發揚團隊精神及養成終身運動習慣。四技一年級實施普通班體育正課教學。四技二、三年級實施專項分組教學，由具有專長之教師授課。開課項目：籃球、排球、桌球、羽球、保齡球、射箭、高爾夫球、網球、體操遊戲、慢速壘球、太極拳、國際標準舞、體適能、國術。學生得按自己興趣選擇修習。
description.en: All students are required to attend two hours per week of Physical Education class. This requirement applies to Freshman Sophomore and Junior students while it is an elective for senior students.  For Freshman level, Classes focus on basic physical strength training.  For Sophomore and Junior students, classes are interest-oriented, thus giving students the opportunity to select specific activities they are interested in.  Choices include Basketball, Volleyball, Table Tennis, Badminton, Bowling, Archery, Golf, Tennis, Gymnastics, Slow pitch, Tai Chi Chuan, Ballroom Dancing, Physical Fitness and martial arts, to mention a few.

description.zh: 本課程利用三學年四學期的時間，培養學生簡易法文的聽、說、讀、寫能力，以達到溝通的目的，增進學生對法國文化的認識與興趣，提供學生法文的基礎知識（包括字母、讀音、語法等）。授課內容：1.個人（姓名、數字、身體重要部位、職業、年齡等），2.家庭（親屬稱謂、住宅式樣、個性、求學、介紹他人等），3.日常生活對話（打電話、道謝、道歉、討論天氣、討論日常活動、常用物品、約會、重要場所、用餐、提出邀請等）。
description.en: This is a French language course for beginners. By keeping their interests in study French, students are expected to have basic communicational skill, basic knowledge of French language (including alphabet, phonetic and grammar) and better understand French culture. This course contains: 1. Personal expression (names, numbers, body, occupation, age etc.) 2.Family (relatives, house, personality, studying, introduction etc.) 3.daily conversation (give a phone call, thanks, apologize, discussion about weather, Activities, dating, dining, invitation etc.)

description.zh: 中文課程共分四年三階段授課。 第一年以華語教學為主，授課重點為：（一）華語基本句型句法；（二）華語基本會話；（三）生活語言；（四）標音系統。 第二、第三年，除延續第一年華語授課重點外，以段落朗讀和基本認字為主要訓練，並給與中國文字書寫訓練。 第四年，加強會話能力，認字與閱讀能力，並傳授中國文化。
description.en: The course of Chinese is categorized as three individual stages for four years. In the first year, the course focuses on : (a) Basic Sentence Patterns, (b) Basic Conversation, (c) Languages in the Real Life and (d) the phonetic system for the Chinese language. In the second and the third year, the training focuses on paragraph reading and term/character recognition-in addition to the teaching themes set in the first year. Writing courses are also added during this stage. In the fourth year, we add more emphasis on the conversational ability, term/character recognition and reading ability. More culture-related information will be included.

description.zh: 本課程分四年（八學期）教授，各學年課程教授內容如下：第一學年----主要在教導學生對美學基本素養、空間的體驗及空間構成演練，使具備建築設計之基本能力與知識。2.機能與動線安排。3.空間的組織。第二學年----主要在教導學生探討空間組織、造型與行為模式等使學生具備整合建築設計相關知識及操作之能力。第三學年----主要在教導學生對環境或都市之認知，並使其具備細部設計以至整體建築設計及監造之能力，以銜接未來之實。第四學年----學生們將以一個完整的題目分為兩個學期作為設計練習，使他們在建築設計上更多元思考以及練習所學習的專業技能。
description.en: This course is organized, as a four-year's program that is arranged around a pattern of eight semesters. The modular teaching structure is: An introduction to basic design problem solving : concepts of point, line, plane, and space organization : principles of unity/variety , order ,balance , proportion ,scale , etc.; orthographic projection and axonometric ; pattern diagramming ; and basic design consequences of human activity. Studio introduction to architectural design problem solving; concepts of architectural aesthetic principles; value drawing techniques; model building; anthropometrics ; and human gathering and circulation patterns. Investigations of visual structures and their order , and exercises to develop ability to communicate about form and space. Explorations of two-dimensional and three-dimensional design through manipulation of the design elements in association with the design principles. Emphasis on materials , techniques , and color/shape relationship.

description.zh: 本課程主要在導引學生經由傳統的繪圖觀念及技術，進入電腦繪圖的領域。訓練學生藉著繪圖軟體的功能，應用於建築設計與其他相關課程。教學內容為講授 AutoCAD指令及應用於建築基本繪圖的練習，以二度空間繪圖指令為主及 AutoCAD三度空間的繪圖指令與其他進階繪圖軟體之使用。
description.en: The course objective is to train students understanding and fully employing the emerging technology of computer graphics in the architectural design process.Topics focus on both two and three-dimension computer graphics, and exercises seeks to expand students abilities to utilize various software packages of computer graphics.

description.zh: 課程重點：熟悉法語人士日常生活情境及與學生將來就業環境相關之會話及適當之應對方式。
description.en: This course is designed to familiarize students with useful expressions in conversation and build up their confidence in cross-cultural communication.

description.zh: 待修正；本課程主要在講解一般都市計畫的主要內容，同時針對台灣現行都市計畫的有關組織體系、實務作業與現況問題作有系統的探討。授課主題涵蓋：1.台灣空間規劃的階層體系、2.都市計畫組織體系與功能、3.台灣都市計畫的發展沿革、4.都市規劃的程序、內容與方法、5.規劃資料的搜集、調查與分析、6.土地使用計畫、7.交通計畫、8.公共設施計畫、9.都市更新、10.都市計畫未來的發展趨勢、11.實際案例分析、研討。

notes: 四創意四與四建四合開

description.zh: 1.建築法規體系概述、2.中央法規標準法、3.建築法架構解說、4.建築師法及營造業管理規則、5.省市建築管理規則、6.省市畸零地使用規則、7.面臨現有巷道申請建築原則、8.都市計劃法系簡介及鄉關法規介紹、9.建築技術規則及台北市土地使用分區管制規則、10. 研定(修)中之建築法規介紹。
description.en: 1.	Introduction to the Building Law and Regulation System2.	Building Code3.	Construction Code4.	Urban planning Code5.	Zoning Code6.	Analysis on New Directions of the Codes

notes: 四創意四與四建四合開

description.zh: 1. 藉其他專業知識的融入訓練學生具備深化建築實質環境的能力，兼顧實質設計手法與內涵。2. 訓練學生具備探討和發展設計議題，培養設計思考和評斷能力，並透過設計報告的撰寫，指導學生獨力發展與組織設計過程的能力。
description.en: With a specific design issue, in this course we explore the students' sensibility to our built environment. Students exercise a complete design process of a real project in two semesters, that they may touch more contexts in design thinking and practice more skills in architectural design.

description.zh: 本課主要以實例演練、訓練學生對施工圖樣、施工規範及施工實務之瞭解，並熟練數量計算及單價分析之方法及要點。主要授課內容含蓋：1.講授各項工程施工規範之標準、2.以實例訓練各項工程數量計算及單價分析：a.假設工程 b.安全措施工程 c.土方工程 d.混凝土工程 e.模板工程 f.鋼筋工程 g.磚牆工程 h.粉刷及裝修工程 i.雜項工程。
description.en: The main purpose of this course is training students to comprehend the working drawings, the performance standards and the affairs of works by drilling actual example. This course makes students to be familiar with not only calculating the quantity but also the essentials and the methods in analyzing the unite price. The lesson's contents include: A.	To teach the standards of every performance standard. B.	To train calculating and analyzing the unite price of every work.1.	Temporary work 2.	Safety measure work 3.	Earthwork4.	Concrete work5.	Mold work6.	Reinforcement work7.	Partition work8.	Plaster, decoration and finish work9.	Miscellaneous work

notes: 四創意三與四建四合開

description.zh: 本課程採用分組教學，以1：5的師生比例就教師之專長指導學生在建築實務工作之各領域進行資料搜集，現場觀摩，對特定之課題提出報告，訓練學生深入的接觸並膫解實際的工作，以培養學生發掘問題，解決問題之執業能力。課程中間之暑假學生必須至事務所或工地現場實習，成果列為成績之一部分。
description.en: There are teaching groups for this course, each teacher by his particular research field direct five students in special topics on Architecture practice for information collecting, site studying, and report writing, The purpose is training students to come into conduct with reality Architecture working. Then, footer students professional ability to find problems, and resolve there problems in working field.On summer vocation period, students who take this course should do practice teaching in Architecture in Architecture office or working site, and the student performance for practice teaching will reueal to final grade.

description.zh: 待修正；本課程主要在教導學生對都市空間的體驗與涵構的認知，並使學生具備都市設計之基本能力與相關知識，其主要授課內容如下：1.在範圍上--主要探討都市的涵構含實質元素、自然環境及人文向度。2.在理論上--主要探討都市構成的空間基礎理論如圖地、連接及場所理論。3.在方法上--從社區居民的經營、都市設計程序的討論以至多元設計程序法之應用。4.在實務上--以台北市及高雄新市鎮為例，研討相關案例並讀設計準則之意含。

name.en: Operation and Management of Real Estate

description.zh: 本課程主要目的為提供學生瞭解不動產開發案相關之理論基礎及實務經驗。不動產經營所涉及的領域甚廣，因此課程內容安排著重實務討論及法令解說，藉由案例分享瞭解地方政府落實開發建設可能涉及的資源課題與對策，例如容積獎勵、稅賦減免、都市計畫變更及容積移轉等；另外開發案財務分析導論及比較，讓學生可以系統性的認識各種類型不動產開發案之收益、稅制、規劃限制及風險等，除了增加實務的認識，對於個人理財亦有幫助。課程內容包含1.基礎財務分析、2.不動產相關法令解說、3.不動產產品規劃及銷售實務、4.不動產開發流程及實務、5.產業創新案例分享、6.產業政策與方向及7.實際案例參訪等。
description.en: The course provides both theoretical and pragmatic knowledge in real estate management. Course contents emphasize on practical recitations and codes commentaries. Factors such as area-allowanced incentives, tax reductions, amendments in city planning, and transfer area allowance are addressed in each case study. In addition, financial benefits, tax regulations, design constraints, and risk assessment in development different types are presented in systematic manner thru the course. Course topics include: 1. Fundamental financial analyses. 2. Real estate regulations and codes. 3. Real estate planning and marketing. 4. Procedures in real estate development. 5. Innovations in practice. 6. Real estate policy. 7. Visitation in projects.

name.en: Design and Analysis of Computer Algorithms

description.zh: 1. 數學基礎   1.1 函數成長率之漸近性質   1.2 遞迴關係之解   1.3 數學歸納法2. 基本分析技巧   2.1 計算複雜度之上下限   2.2 最差情況分析及平均情況分析   2.3 動態平均分析3. 基本設計技巧   3.1 分擊法   3.2 貪婪法   3.3 動態規劃   3.4 隨機演算法4. 計算複雜度   4.1 資訊理論證明法   4.2 對抗式證明法   4.3 問題之線性轉換   4.4 完全NP
description.en: 1. Mathematical background   1.1 Asymptotic growth rate of functions   1.2 Solving recurrence relations   1.3 Mathematical induction2. Basic analysis techniques   2.1 Computational complexities -- lower bounds and upper bounds   2.2 Worst case analysis and average case analysis   2.3 Amortized analysis3. Basic Design Paradigms   3.1 Divide and conquer   3.2 Greedy methods   3.3 Dynamic programming   3.4 Probabilistic algorithms4. Computational Complexity   4.1 Information-theoretic arguments   4.2 Adversary arguments   4.3 Linear reduction of problems   4.4 NP-completeness

description.zh: 1.醫用電子學之基礎。2.生醫電物理化學之基礎。3.人體生理系統與經絡系統介紹。4.生醫系統電物理化學模型分析。5.醫用電探針、感測器元件與生物晶片的應用。6.量測理論與生醫電訊號量測技術。7.生醫電訊號處理技術。8.超音波、紅外線、X光、CT、磁振醫學造影原理與影像處理。9.醫用電子安全規格製訂。10.醫用醫療儀器與生化分析儀設計。11.DICOM、HL7醫療網路資訊系統介紹。12.中西醫工應用系列介紹。
description.en: 1.Fundamental of medical electronics。2.Fundamental of electro-physiology。3.Introduction to human body system and Meridian system。4.Electronic physics-chemical modeling analysis of   biomedical system。5.Applications of medical electrode、biosensor and biochip。 6.Medical measurement theory and technology。7.Processing technology of biomedical signals。8.Constructing and processing of ultrasound、infrared、X-ray  、CT and MRI Imaging。9.Safety specifications of medical electronic devices。10.Designs of biomed

description.zh: 本課程主要目標在設計一個嵌入式系統時，如何同時考慮選擇與設計系統軟體及硬體之方法，課程內容如下：1.介紹軟硬體共同設計之基本概念2.嵌入式系統之系統設計3.系統設計步驟4.系統功能最佳化5.系統功能及結構最佳化6.結構之最佳化7.軟硬體之共同合成及評估8.系統功能及結構最佳化及共同設計之流程9.合成之結果
description.en: The goal of this course is how to design and select the hardware andsoftware parts for designing an embedded system. The contents of this courseare shown as follows :1.Introduction to Hardware-Software Co-design2.Ststem Level Design of Embedded Systems3.Design Representation4.Function Optimizations5.Function/ Architecture Optimizations6.Architectural Optimizations7.Hardware/software Co-synthesis and Estimation8.Function/Architecture Optimization and Co-design Flow9.Synthesis Results

description.zh: 此課程主要目標在學習VLSI系統架構設計，使學生以宏觀的系統架構觀念設計超大型積體電路。其課程內容包含如下： 1、VLSI架構設計原理 2、各式積體電路架構介紹 3、運算處理單元架構設計 4、多媒體架構實例 5、高速及高效能的數位積體電路架夠 6、專題研究
description.en: 1. Basic Design Skills2. Introduction to digital signal processing systems3. Iteration bound4. Pipeline and parallel processing5. Retiming6. Unfolding7. Folding8. Systolic array architecture9. Scheduling and resource allocation10. Processing element design11. Programmable digital signal processors

name.zh: 電力電子積體電路設計

description.zh: 本課程在訓練學生如何使用電腦輔助設計軟体來設計電力電子積體電路,進而能培養學生具有設計電力電子積體電路的能力,課程內容包念： 1.電源管理IC設計簡介 2.電壓參考電路設計 3.低電壓降電壓調整器設計 4.交換式電壓調整器 5.交換電容電源轉換器 6.電池充電技術與應用 7.設計專題討論
description.en: This course is trained the student to use computer-aided design tools for the design of power electronic integrated circuit. Therefore, the student has the design capability of power electronic integrated circuit. The contents of this course: 1.Introduction to power management IC design 2. Voltage reference Design 3.Low dropout regulator design 4. Switching voltage regulator 5.Switching Capacitor Regulator 6.Battery charging techniques and applications 7.Design project discussion

name.en: Clinical Application of Medical Electronic Device

description.zh: 本課程主要目的為使學生以電子學的知識，應用在生物醫學的臨床領域。本課程將介紹生理測量的應用電路，由電路的實現使學生更能感受到生醫電子的實際應用範疇。包含生醫感測器、生醫電子放大器、血壓和心血管診斷儀器。本課程主要著重在觀念的溝通與臨床之應用，使學生能學習與扮演電子工程與臨床醫學之橋樑角色。
description.en: This course aims to provide students with electronics knowledge, to help the clinical application in the biomedical field. This course will introduce the medical electronic systems and electronic circuit theory, and then introduce the application of physiological measurement circuit. Mainly on medical equipment and application of technical principles, which includes  biomedical sensors, electrodes and transducers, biomedical electronic amplifier, blood pressure and cardiovascular diagnostic equipment. The students can learn and play a role of bridge between electrical engineering and clinical medicine.

notes: 四子四、四子三及電通所合開

name.zh: 數值分析在結構工程上之應用
name.en: Applications of Structures Engineering by Numerical Analysis

description.zh: 電腦基本知識，中英文文書處理系統的基本設計理念與現有系統實習，電腦工作底稿功能架構說明及應用實習，資料庫管理系統基本觀念，工程資訊管理系統基本觀念，資料庫設計及資料庫軟體系統使用練習，簡易型之統計繪圖軟體及工程應用實例，其他現代電腦科技發展與其在結構上之應用個案。
description.en: Applications of Structures Engineering by Numerical AnalysisThe application of computer about civil engineering, such as officials Dispatch to handle in Chinese and English, the software of drawings and using software of data base etc.

description.zh: 本課程係以營建工程專案管理之架構為核心目標，說明營建專案管理介紹，應用及方法論介紹，專案管理研究方法、透過營建管理重要課題，藉由工程實務經驗，使修課同學得以瞭解抽象的管理理念，而後能實際加以運用。內容範圍包含專案管理研究方法、品質管理，風險管理，價值工程，生產力分析，合約管理，糾紛與談判等營建工程專案管理等理論或實務內容。
description.en: 英課名：Construct engineering investigation research        General to say construct manage.        Schedule, capital, quality manage, risk manage,         value engineering, system method and theory.        Contract manage, arbitration, disagree handle,         coordinate and negotiations, etc.

description.zh: 本課程旨在闡述專案工程規劃與控制之系統架構，主要介紹各種專案規劃與控制之方法及專案管理方法，內容包工程專案管理方法，專案工期規劃與控制，專案成本控制方法，專案資源管理，專案風險整合管理，專案品質管理，及專案人力及目標管理等介紹。
description.en: 英課名：Investigation engineering control        System framework of investigation engineering         control.        Investigation plan and period procedure arrange.        A method that rate of progress control.        Natural resources to allocate and the most suitable         schedule.        Cost accounting and cost control.        Complete cost/System control of time limit for a           project.

description.zh: 本課程將介紹1.變分法        2.線性彈性力學       3.變分法應用到彈性力學4.Euler梁與Timoshenko梁      5.扭力    6.古典板理論7.彈性穩定.
description.en: This course will introduces:1.Calculus of Variations2.Linear Elasticity3.Variational Principles of Elasticity4.Euler Beam and Timoshenko Beam5.Torsion6.Classical Theory of Plates7.Elastic Stability

description.zh: 本課程主要目的在於提供方法，用來分析任何型式的結構物受任意動荷重所產生的應力與變化。
description.en: The primary purpose of this course is to present methods for analyzing the stresses and deflections developed in any given type of structure whenit is subjected to an arbitary dynamic loading.

description.zh: 本課程主要探討土木工程施工品質的內容，並藉由諸如統計品管，QC七大手法，ISO9000等品管技能與精義，探討改進工程品質，防止土木災害的相關技術。
description.en: This course will discuss the construction quality of civil engineering in detail.Form the learning of statistical quality,QC seven tools and ISO 9000,students can understand how to improve the quality and prevent the accident of civil engineering.

description.zh: 本課程將針對如何從土壤動力試驗評估土壤的動態力學參考數導入,作為理論解或者數值解的輸入值,以預測土壤在震動下的變形行為,以及分析土壤與結構物的動態互制行為.內容包括:波傳遞理論,土壤的動力性質,土壤的液化,基礎的振動問題,等等..
description.en: This course will teach how to evaluate the soil's dynamic material properties by means of dynamic laboratory testing.Based on the analytical and numerical solution,the behaviour of soil-structure dynamic interaction can be predicted.

description.zh: 本課程為大學部地盤改良之一後續課程,進一步介紹比較重要和特殊的地盤改良工法之原理及其在土工和基礎施工方面之實際應用.此外,亦介紹與大地工程施工之安全與穩定具有密切關係的地錨工法和加勁土(補強土)工法.因此本課程包括下列各種工法之原理,設計及施工: 1.石灰穩定工法  2.水泥穩定工法  3.化學灌漿處理工法  4.凍結穩定工法  5.粉體噴射攪拌工法  6.碎石排水工法  7.地錨工法  8.加勁土(補強土)工法  9.地盤改良(穩定)工法之選擇.
description.en: This course introduces the principles and practical applications of the current and special method of soil Improvement in geotechnical engineering.In addition,as an important stability technique of soil slopes and soil grounds,reinforced earth method and ground anchor method are also introduced.Therefore,this course deals with the principle and practical application of following subjects;1.lime stabilization2.cement stabilization3.stabilization by grouting4.stabilization by freezing5.Dry Jet Mixing method 6.reinforced earth method 7.ground anchor method.

name.zh: 有限元素法在大地工程之應用
name.en: Finite Element Method in Geotechnical Engineering

description.zh: 有限元素法常被用來模擬基礎施工、開控支撐及山坡地開控的過程，預估土壤或岩盤的變形行為，研判或分析施工的安全性。本課程的內容除了講授有限元素法的基本理論，尚須以大地工程的案例作為實際推導公式理論之演練。其案例包括滲流問題、壓密沉陷問題及土石結構穩定分析等等。
description.en: Finite element method ha been widely used to simulae the process of foundation construction, cut and bracing and excavation etc, and to predict and analyze the construction safety. This course should include the basic theory and sfiffues matrix formulation, in addition, geotechnical engineering problem are in addition, geotechical engineering problems are used to help students to understand the basic theory and code formulation. These examle problems includes seepage, consolidation and earth structure stability analyses.

description.zh: 資料研析方法,水文統計與迴歸分析,小流域洪水推估(含基本水文系統實驗),基本水文系統實驗,頻率分析(2),水文演算,水力演算,降雨逕流模擬,地理資訊系統(GIS)結合地文單位歷線,序率水文模式,HEC-2,6講解與實習,專題討論.
description.en: Introduction,Data error analysis,Hydrological statistics,Frequency analysis,Stochastic analysis,Hydrological routing,Hydraulic routing,GIUH plus GIS,Small watershed flood prediction(including Lab.experiment),Seminar.

description.zh: 本課程是較大學部的「岩石力學」課程為之深入探討岩石行為的課程，將針對岩石的指數性質、透水性、強度及變形性做更詳細的研究，並將比較岩石和土壤的不同，以及介紹機率概念在岩石力學上的應用。上課時將以研究論文為主，，書籍、報告為輔，其涵蓋的課程內容大致如下：1、岩石的指數性質2、岩石和土壤的不同3、岩體分類法4、岩石的透水性5、立體投影圖6、岩石的強度7、岩石的破壤準則8、岩石的變形性9、弱面的分析10、機率在岩石力學上的應用
description.en: Compared to the undergraduate Rock Mechanics course, this is a more advanced course to examine the behaviors of rocks under different stress conditions。 It will focus on the index properties, the permeability properties, the strength properties, and the deformation properties of rocks。 In addition, it will address the difference between rocks and soils by contrast。 Finally, this course will introduce students to the concept of probability, and how it can be applied to the Rock Mechanics。 The students taking this course will have plenty of reading assignments, and are required to participate in the classroom discussions。

name.en: Special Topics on Geographical Information System

description.zh: 政府近年積極推動行政資訊化，應用資訊技術提昇行政的效率與品質，以達到便民及創新的效益。地理資訊系統(Geographical Information System，簡稱GIs)之開發與應用，即是提供各使用單位在處理大量圖籍與相關文字資料之管理與查詢的最佳解決方案；配合完整中文介面與印表技術，更可提高效率資訊服務。國內各重大工程在規劃設計時，正逐漸引用地理資訊系統。以其強大之資訊處理、整合、分析、及展示等功能輔助，如圖籍疊合與環框分析等，使工程規劃設計更為準確客觀，發揮工程最大效益。
description.en: To provide public service with better quality, the administration of government with information-based is widely established by adopting newly developed information technology.  Geographic Information System is one of the technology especially applicable when massive maps and attribute data are involved in management affairs.  It offers users a solution for information management and data query under a graphic environment with Chinese interface as well as output printing specification.  The planning and design of major construction projects in Taiwan were increasingly referred to GIS for the reason that efficiency can be maximized by the powerful data organization, integration, and display capability along with GIS.

name.en: Biotechnical and Soil Bioengineering Slope Stabilization

description.zh: 生態工法的概念和原則近年來廣泛地引介和應用在各種的土木工程領域中，包括河溪、坡地、都市和交通建設等，而由於土石流和坡地災害的頻繁發生，因此在山坡地應用生態工法遂成為重要的課題，也逐漸成為應該提供給土木系學生，使其瞭解相關基礎知識的重要課程，因此在本導論課程中，我們將介紹如何將生物地工技術和土壤生物工程（Biotechnical and Soil Bioengineering）應用在邊坡穩定和侵蝕控制上，使學生認識並瞭解目前在邊坡保護上結合工程力學分析、植物學知識和實際案例應用的發展，並藉此介紹國內外常用的邊坡穩定工法，以及結合不同傳統擋土設施的可行方式。本課程無先修課程限制，建議研究所和大學部高年級同學選修。
description.en: The concept and principles of ecological engineering has been widely adopted by various disciplines of traditional civil engineering,including hydraulic engineering, slope stabilization, urban infrastructures, and transportation engineering.  Among them, slope stabilization is a particularly important topic because of thefrequent occurrence of debris flows and landslides in Taiwan, and thus it becomes necessary to provide such a course to familiarize students with this important field.  In this introductory course, we will explain the fundamental concepts of biotechnical and soil bioengineering and how to apply them to the slope stabilization anderosion control.  An interdisciplinary approach that combines the knowledge and understanding of both mechanical design and vegetation properties will be emphasized.  The results can be integrated with traditional retaining structures to create more economical and eco-friendly slope stabilization systems.  No prerequisite.

description.zh: 地下水為地球上可資利用且蘊藏最豐富之淡水資源，本課程以介紹地下水文相關理論及實務為主，有助於學生了解地下水之開發利用與經營管理。課程內容包括地下水之來源、流動及開發應用，以及各項天然或人為化學汙染對地下水系統質與量之影響評估 。
description.en: This course is concerned with the theory and practice of hydrology, the science of water in subsurface environments which are helpful for groundwater resource exploitation and management. It is divided into two main parts: (1) basic concepts dealing with the origin, movement of groundwater, and its recovery from wells, and (2) a qualitative and quantitative assessment of the chemistry of natural and contaminated systems.

description.zh: 這門課程的目的在於訓練學生開發應用程式解決土木或研究相關問題的能力，課程內容包括基本程式設計技巧回顧、進階程式設計技術研習、物件導向程式設計學習、版本控制系統說明、腳本語言學習、Shell 語言學習、符合CMMI 的軟體開發實務學習等，學生須分組以協同作業方式完成指定專案，視開課當時客觀環境，亦可能加入簡單叢集電腦架設實作。
description.en: The purpose of this graduate level course is to cultivate the ability of students to develop software applications to solve engineering/research related problems. Throughout this course, students will be encouraged to think independently, to acquire new knowledge actively, and to keep up with the ever more sophisticated and complex programming tools. The course material includes the following aspects: reviewing of basic programming skills, studying of advanced programming concepts, examining of OO techniques, introducing of CMMI and version control systems, and researching of shell/scripting languages. Students are required to complete programming projects in groups. If situation/equipment allows, students will also learn how to create and configure clusters.

description.zh: 先修課程：負責教授同意。包括液滲檢測法、磁粉檢測法、放射線、超音波檢測法、中子射線、全像攝影檢測法等、針對各種檢測方法之原理、可靠度、靈敏度等作探討。
description.en: Liquid-Penetrant Examination, Magnetic Particle Examination, Radiographic Examination, Ultrasonic Examination, and other less common techniques. Physical Bases of Tests, Materials to which applicable, Calibration Standards, Reliability.

description.zh: 介紹台灣軌道車輛現況及未來、軌道車輛名詞、轉向架與懸吊系統、軌道與設施、車輛動態、輪軌界面、推進傳動與制動、行控號誌、大眾捷運系統、輕軌電車、高速鐵路、軌道公司參訪。
description.en: This course is a basic course of railroad vehicle system.  Topics will be mentioned: railroad vehicles in Taiwan, terminology, bogie and suspension systems, rail and construction, vehicle dynamics, wheel and rail, drive / transmission and brake, train control and communication, mass rapid transit system, light rail transit system, high speed rail transit system, and tours in railway company..

description.zh: 先修課程:4402014或負責教授同意空調的基本原理，冷凍的基本循環原理：冷煤及管路、壓縮機冷凝器、膨脹閥等熱負荷之計算，冷、暖氣循環系統之負荷平衡計算，冷凍空調之控制系統介紹與計算，冷凍空調之電路系統介紹與計算。
description.en: Fundamentals: Tables of Thermodynamic Properties, Principles of Heat Transfer Classification of Refrigeration, Vapor Compression Refrigeration System, Compressors, Condensers, Evaporators, Expansion Values, Refrigerants, Piping and Accessories, Load Calculations, Control.

description.zh: 本校體育課程目標為鍛鍊健全身心、促進身心健全發展、培養運動道德、發揚團隊精神及養成終身運動習慣。四技一年級實施普通班體育正課教學。四技二、三年級實施專項分組教學，由具有專長之教師授課。開課項目：籃球、排球、桌球、羽球、保齡球、射箭、高爾夫球、網球、體操遊戲、慢速壘球、太極拳、國際標準舞、體適能、國術。學生得按自己興趣選擇修習。本校體育課程目標為鍛鍊健全身心、促進身心健全發展、培養運動道德、發揚團隊精神及養成終身運動習慣。四技一年級實施普通班體育正課教學。四技二、三年級實施專項分組教學，由具有專長之教師授課。開課項目：籃球、排球、桌球、羽球、保齡球、射箭、高爾夫球、網球、體操遊戲、慢速壘球、太極拳、國際標準舞、體適能、國術。學生得按自己興趣選擇修習。
description.en: All students are required to attend two hours per week of Physical Education class. This requirement applies to Freshman Sophomore and Junior students while it is an elective for senior students.  For Freshman level, Classes focus on basic physical strength training.  For Sophomore and Junior students, classes are interest-oriented, thus giving students the opportunity to select specific activities they are interested in.  Choices include Basketball, Volleyball, Table Tennis, Badminton, Bowling, Archery, Golf, Tennis, Gymnastics, Slow pitch, Tai Chi Chuan, Ballroom Dancing, Physical Fitness and martial arts, to mention a few.

description.zh: 課程重點：(1)藉由適合其程度的教材加強學生必備的基礎文法觀念和句型結構；(2)使學生確切把握閱讀要領以及充分瞭解寫作的各種技巧，重心在生字、片語、句法的解釋和基本寫作技巧的分析；(3)熟悉英語人士日常生活情境及與學生將來就業環境相關之會話及適當之應對方式；(4)透過練習加強聽、說、讀、寫的知能及表達。
description.en: This course is designed (1) to strengthen students' previously required knowledge in English with basic grammatical ideas and sentence patterns reviewed through reading materials appropriate to their levels; (2) to develop reading skill by giving explanation of difficult words, phrases, and syntax, as well as analysis of basic writing skill; (3)to  familiarize students with useful expressions in conversation and build up their confidence in cross-cultural communication; (4)to reinforce the competence and performance of listening, speaking, reading and writing by practice.

name.en: First step to achieving the goals of universities

description.zh: 大學入門是針對大一新生所開授之全校性課程。用以協助學生:(一)認識高等教育的理念、目的與價值(二)有效學習(三)涵養正視困境並妥適因應能力。藉以實踐自我鍛鍊，自我掌握，自我經營並建構宏觀視界的高等教育宗旨。
description.en: "First step to achieving the goals of universities" is a campus-wide course provided for all of the first-year students at this school. The course is designed to help first-year students to achieve the following aims and objectives:(1) understanding the basic idea, goals, and fundamental value of higher education at college level;(2) learning proper study attitudes and methods effectively;(3) cultivating the required abilities and skills of responding appropriately to setbacks and difficult situations in order to acquire self-knowledge, self-control, and self-management, so that they may construct the knowledge and imagination that are needed in planning for grand visions of achieving the goals of higher education.

description.zh: 本課程目標乃是協助學生透過有意義之社區服務活動，認識服務學習理念，從服務學習中體驗服務的意義，深化學習的領域、擴大自己的生活範疇與生命歷練。課程內容：包含三大類（一）志願服務基礎課程：選取志願服務相關主題，由授課教師於課堂上講述。可包含服務學習理論、內政部志願服務法所訂定之六大主題（志願服務的內涵、志願服務倫理、自我了解及自我肯定、志願服務經驗分享、志願服務法規之認識、志願服務發展趨勢），或非營利組織、服務機構之介紹等等。（二）社區服務：選擇服務機構前往服務，於本學期內完成授課教師所規定服務時數或內容。（三）課堂討論與反思：學生必須進行服務經驗分享與討論，並撰寫與繳交服務日誌、心得報告。
description.en: This course is geared to expand and intensify students' learning beyond classroom by introducing service learning as an integral part of holistic life learning experience. Apart from class work, students will be able to not only understand the significance of services and experience the true value of such learning through various forms of community work. The course is designed to deepen their learning and life experience.I. Core curricula of services: The course is structured on the framework of six themes in service learning by theory and practice as well as legal regulations regarding community services enacted by the Ministry of the Interior. The six themes respectively are: significance of service; standards of service; self-comprehension and affirmation; sharing service experience; service law and trends; and non-profit and service organizations.II. Community service: Students select or be arranged to service organizations and are responsible for completing service assignments

description.zh: 國文，是運用本國語言文字，蘊釀於欣賞文藝作品，充實文化內涵，增進思維能力與人文素養的一門課程。本課程分為大一上學期2學分，大一下學期2學分。大一上學期的授課內容，以文學名篇為範圍；希望藉此擴建學生深入品味文學趣味的能力，鍛鍊靈活的語文敏感度，默契文學創意，甚而嘗試創作。大一下學期的授課內容，以思想名篇為範圍；希望藉此啟發學生透轍分析各家學說思想，漫步哲人的宇宙天地，跟隨哲人的心路歷程，進而念茲在茲，從容內化，共饗取之不盡用之不竭的先驗與風範。
description.en: "Chinese" is the course where we make full use of our native languages to enjoy literary works, to enrich our cultural taste, to develop our thinking and even to elevate human cultivation.This four-credit course is set for the freshman students: with 2 credits in each of the two semesters of the school year. In the first semester, the course covers important articles in literature, in the hope for the student learners to cultivate better ability to taste literary works when they have more vivid sense on the language. With fuller knowledge on what literature is about, they are expected to try creative writings. For the second semester, the course is mainly focused on the writings on thoughts. It is our expectation that throughout the reading and analysis of various great schools of philosophy, the student learners are given the opportunity to explore the huge minds of philosophers, who will thus be imitated and followed. Through the internalization, the students might benefit themse

name.en: Core Curriculum of Liberal Arts Education：Philosophy

description.zh: 哲學既是一門兼具理想性與現實性的基礎學科，又是一種既有趣又深刻的一種思想活動。 它所探討的目標都是和人類自身與他們所生活的周遭世界密切相關的一些基本問題；這些基本問題至少包括：宇宙、知識、公平正義、道德、宗教、語言、心靈、社會、教育、愛情，和生與死。 從事哲學思考，就是對上述問題，進行一種反省。 這種反省，能夠讓我們明白形成這些問題背後的一些基本原則，以及解決這些問題的一些可能方案的理由根據和獲致這些解決方案的應有程序。 由於哲學是著重思考與反省的活動，學習哲學其實不僅僅可以幫助我們掌握和人類自身與生活世界相關問題的一些根本知識，更能培養一個負責任的社會公民不可或缺的一種思維能力和反省態度。
description.en: Philosophy is not only a fundamental subject with both ideals and practical value, but also an interesting thinking activity of depth.  The topics it discusses concern some basic questions for we human beings and the world around us.  These basic questions at least include: the universe, knowledge, equality and justice, morality, religion, language, mind, society, education, love, and life and death.  Thinking things philosophically is to reflect upon these basic questions.  The reflection of this sort leads us to understand not only the basic principles behind these questions,   also the reasons and procedures of the possible solutions to these questions.  Given philosophy is such an activity based on thinking and reflection, learning philosophy hence can help us grasp the required knowledge concerning ourselves and our living world, and more importantly, prepare a thinking ability and reflecting attitude that are needed for us to succeed in becoming responsible social citizen.

name.en: Core Curriculum of Liberal Arts Education：Nomocracy

description.zh: 本課程以民主、法治課程為核心，重在強化公民的素養，增進政治體制及法律運作實務等之相關課程。
description.en: Democracy and nomocracy are the core curriculum, focusing on enhancing the quality of citizens and promoting the related courses in  the political system, the operation of the law practices and so on.

description.zh: 本課程希望在一學年中，能使學生對微分及積分有充分的瞭解、培養邏輯推理、啟發思考創造、強化計算演繹並注重應用與作圖，以建立同學未來學習工程數學及相關專業課程之數學基礎，充分達到學以致用的目的。課程內容包括：1.極限與連續，2.導數及其應用，3.不定積分與定積分，4.超越函數及其反函數，5.積分法則，6.不定型與瑕積分，7.定積分的應用，8.空間幾何與向量微積分，9.偏導數，10.重積分。
description.en: This course aims at developing comprehension of Derivation and Integral、activating capabilities of Logic Inference and Induction、enlightening confidence and independence、strengthening calculating abilities with an emphasis on its application and diagram、furnishing a sound basis for future specialty. The content includes: 1.Limits and Continuity, 2.Derivative and Application, 3.Indefinite and Definite Integral, 4.Transcendental Functions and their Inverses, 5.Techniques of Integration, 6.Indeterminate Forms and Improper Integral, 7.Application of Integration, 8.Basic Vector Analysis, 9.Partial Derivative, 10.Multiple Integration.

description.zh: 本校之普通物理課程專為工程科系背景之同學設計，主要的目的是鼓勵同學參與大自然運行奧秘、法則之探索，並供給爾後修習專業課程之堅實基礎。本課程之內容包含力學、熱力學、聲學、電磁學、光學及近代物理。教授者可按每週三小時、二個學期的時間設計、再參酌各系不同之需求、加強或節略某些章節。
description.en: The course is designed for the students with engineering background. The theme of this course is to encourage students to participate in the discovery of laws and wonder of nature, and to solidate the foundation for the particular courses of study for different departments. The contents of this course include mechanics, dynamics, thermodynamics, electromagnetics, optics, and foundation of modern physics, etc.. The lecturers will emphasize or abridge certain contents based on the individual needs of departments. For this course, there will be 3 credits for each of two semesters,  and 3 lecture hours per week.

description.zh: 先修課程:4401051或負責教授同意銜接圖學及基本幾何學觀念以繪製機械之零件圖與組合圖，並熟悉交線展開之原理與繪圖管路、鋼架、油壓氣壓及機械相關圖。
description.en: Connecting the fundamental Engineering graphics and the geometrical drawing technology to mechanical parts and assembly drawing. Also The emphasis should be Included such as mastering the intersections and development theorem , Steel structures, Hydraulic and Fluid Systems and Related mechanical Drawing.

description.zh: 1.作業系統簡介 2.網際網路 3.文書處理軟體使用 4.資料表格化與整理 5.簡報製作 6.網頁製作 7.數字系統與二進碼 8.數位邏輯簡介 9.計算機組織與架構 10.資料結構
description.en: To provide an overview of current computer technologies. Students will learn basic introductions to computer operating systems, internet software, office software (Word, Excel, PowerPoint, etc), WWW homepage programming, number system, logic gate, processor structure, and data structure.

description.zh: 先修課程:負責教授同意材料一般性質之介紹，化學對材料性質的影響，原子在晶體內的堆積方式及X 光繞射，固體內原子排列的不規則性和原子擴散，固體傳導電子的特性，凝固的各種物理性質，相金屬和有關的各種機械性質，鋼鐵材料及其應用。
description.en: General Properties of Materials, Chemical Effects to Material Properties, Atomic Packing Types in Crystals and X-ray Diffraction, Imperfections of Atomic Arrangement in Solids and Atomic Diffusion, Conduction of Electrons in Solids, Solidification, Physical Properties, Metals and their echanical Properties, Ferrous Materials and their Applications.

This requirement applies to Freshman Sophomore and Junior students while it is an elective for senior students.  For Freshman level, Classes focus on basic physical strength training.  For Sophomore and Junior students, classes are interest-oriented, thus giving students the opportunity to select specific activities they are interested in.  Choices include Basketball, Volleyball, Table Tennis, Badminton, Bowling, Archery, Golf, Tennis, Gymnastics, Slow pitch, Tai Chi Chuan, Ballroom Dancing, Physical Fitness and martial arts, to mention a few.

description.zh: 本課程以提升學生英文能力，至全民英檢中級以上的程度為目標。教學內容以加強學生日常生活中，如：購物、旅遊、定餐等用語之溝通、運用、表達及閱讀寫作等能力為主。1. 94學年度起之大學部入學新生擬修習「英文實務」課程說明：學生修習「英文實務」課程，必須參加全民英檢中級初試， 其中「聽力 測驗」及「閱讀測驗」兩項成績合計達80分以上，始得修習此課程，修課學生請持「全民英檢中級初試成績單正本及影本至」教務處註冊組登錄。）2. 為考量同學因個人生涯規劃，若參加「全民英檢」以外的英語檢定考試，例如適用於全球職場英文能力統一標準之TOEIC測驗及教育部所規定採計之其他英檢考試等。其考試成績如對應符合CEF B1級（全民英檢中級）以上者，免修英文實務。
description.en: The goal of this course is to help students enhance their English proficiency superior to the Intermediate Level of General English Proficiency Test. A student who completes this course will be able to perform routine daily communication such as travel, shopping, ordering a meal, etc. and will have better understanding in reading and writing.

name.en: Elective Curriculum of Liberal Arts Education

description.zh: 為了訓練學生獨立思考與判斷能力，培養健全人格，提升人文涵養，延續通識教育六大向度的核心課程，在各向度均規劃了一系列的博雅選修課程，提供學生更多的選擇，以建立學生開闊的視野及達成全人教育的精神。
description.en: To train students have the abilities of independent thinking and judgment, develop the healthy personality and Humanities conservation, and keep the six fields of core curriculum in general education. this course will design a series of optional curriculum on Erudition & Refinement in each field, and develop students the broader sight and reach the spirit of the holistic education.

description.zh: 先修課程:4402025或負責教授同意底盤動力系統，行駛阻力、驅動力、煞車制動傳動等之計算車懸吊系統分析（懸吊系統、汽車垂直振動分析、系統參數調整），汽車轉向系統，ABS 煞車系統，整合系統。
description.en: Traction Force, Driving Resistance, Power Balance, Performance Test, Fuel Economy, Engine and Transmission Matching, Braking Performance, Handling, Steering and Ride Characteristics.

description.zh: 先修課程:負責教授同意自動控制數學基礎，物理系統的數學模式，控制器的種類，時域分析，穩定性分析，根軌跡法，頻率領域的分析，控制系統的設計，Z 轉換，數位控制，電腦控制之介面及程式，現代控制理論與簡介。實習項目：MATLAB介紹與應用，暫態響應，PID控制的影響，Lead-Lag控制的影響，頻率響應，系統判別，控制器設計。
description.en: Mathematical Foundation of Automatic Control, Mathematical Model of Physical System, Controller Type, Time-Domain Analysis, Stability Analysis, Root Locus Method,  Frequency-Domain Analysis, Design of Control System, Z-Transform, Digital Control, Interface and Programmingof Computer Control, Theory and Introduction of Modern Control. Lab:Introduction and Application of MATLAB, Transient Response, Effect of PID Control, Effect of Lead-Lag Control, Frequency Response, System Identification, Controller Design.

description.zh: 先修課程:物理或負責教授同意不可壓縮流體，質量不滅，非黏性流體之運動，柏努力定律，線性及角動量定理及其應用，渦流與勢流，黏性流，納維爾－史脫克斯方程式及其應用，管中壓力頭損失及增加，邊界層與分離升力與阻力及雷諾方程式之應用。
description.en: Fundamental Concepts, Fluid Statics, Basic Equations in Integral Form for a Control Volume, Introduction to Differential Analysis of Fluid Motion, Incompressibility in Viscid Flow, Dimensional Analysis , Internal in Compressible Viscous Flow, External Incompressible Flow. Introductionto Compressible Flow.

description.zh: 先修課程:負責教授同意基本觀念及其領域、非線性代數之數值解法、聯立方程式之數值解、多項式內外插、微分、積分、常微分方程、起始、邊界值問題之數值解法。
description.en: Fundamental Concepts and Its Scope, Numerical Solution of Nonlinear Algebraic Equations and Sets of Equations, Interpolating Polynomials, Numerical Differentiation and Numerical Integration, Numerical Solution of Ordinary Differential Equations, Numerical Solution of Boundary-ValueProblems and Initial-Value Problems.

description.zh: 字彙, 文法, 閱讀, 解讀。
description.en: Vocabulary, grammar, reading, decipherment.

description.zh: 專題報告，專題演講，研究小組討論Case Study, Seminar
description.en: Case Study, Seminar

description.zh: 1. 機率空間2. 隨機變數、向量、程序3. 期望值，隨機序列的收斂性和大數法則4. 穩定性隨機程序5. 有用的隨機程序
description.en: 1. probability space2. Random variable, vectors and processes3. Expectation ,converges of random sequence and Law of large number4. Stationary processes and ergodic propertis5. Useful random processes

description.zh: 線性空間分析，狀態方程式及響應，可控制性及可觀測性，穩定性分析，狀態回授及估測，控制器設計及應用，觀測器設計及應用，非線性系統，時變系統，控制理論的應用
description.en: Linear space Analysis, State equation and Response, Controllability and Observability, Stability Analysis, State Feedback and Estimation, Controller Design and Applications, Observer Design and Applications, Nonlinear systems, Time varying Systems, Applications of Control theory

name.zh: 個人化智慧型捷運車輛與運作系統
name.en: Personal Intelligent Rapid Transportation Vehicle and Operation System

description.zh: 本課程將未來個人化智慧型捷運車輛科技發展如何面對都市化人口集中、高車輛密度所造成之環境衝擊，能源短缺之節能需求，個人差異化之個人便捷智慧化車輛之需求，及與未來都會新交通網結合之最後一哩路之未來車發展之動向。課程中將以系統、組件、基礎學理介紹未來車之整車發展趨勢、動力種類及性能的追求方向、輕量化結構之材料創新、新能源之應用與系統管理科技之發展。本內容讓學生了解在未來的車輛發展變遷下其所應具備的基本知識。
description.en: This course introduces the "Personal Intelligent Rapid Transportation Vehicle" and the "Operation System". And it will drive to focus on the future vehicle technology development to face the challenges on the environmental impacts from the growth of the crowed mega cities, on the energy saving due to the shortage of the foil fuel, on the differentiation and ICT innovation from the young people, and on the metropolitan last-mile transportation solution to link with the public transportation system.This course contains numerous fundamental domain knowledge and technologies including vehicle system, powertrain module, energy module, lightweight chassis, environmental policy, infrastructure planning and innovative business model investigation, etc. Students will learn the fundamental knowledge of the future "Personal Intelligent Rapid Transportation Vehicle and Operation System" development.

description.zh: 本課程將以車輛之傳動系統設計與分析為主要內容，傳動系統之定義為從動力源至驅動輪間之各項組合，其中包括離合器、加力箱、變速箱、差速箱、傳動軸與最終傳動等組合，由於每種車輛行車特性之不同，因此前述之各項組合有不同之排列方式，傳動系統設計之優劣往往影響到車輛之行車性能。本課程將從車輛行駛阻力推演出傳統系統設計之理念及方法，並針對如何發揮動力源之最佳特性，搭配良好之傳動系統設計以達到較佳之行車性能為主要教學之目的。
description.en: Introduction to the vehicle drive-train design and analysis. Topics include definition for drive-train system、clutches、transfer case、manual transmission、automatic transmission、differential gear、transmission shaft  and final driver.  Fundamentals of vehicle tractive resistance will deduce the methodology of drive-train design.  The good drive-train design will result in optimal vehicle tractive performance.

description.zh: 本課程主要是針對研究所學生所開設，課程目標為介紹學生電力電子學的基本電路及分析切換式電源的操作原理。課程章節內容包含了電力電子系統介紹，二極體整流器，直流至直流切換式轉換器，切換式直流至交流變流器，零電壓及零電流切換，切換式直流電源供應器，電力調節器與不斷電系統，馬達驅動器介紹，家庭及工業之應用及 公用電力之應用。
description.en: This course is mainly designed for graduate students. The objective of this course is to introduce fundamental circuits of power electronics and analyze operation principles of switching mode power. This course includes Introduce to power electronic system, Diode Rectifiers, DC-DC Switch-Mode Converters, Switch-Mode DC-AC Inverters, Zero-Voltage or Zero-Current Switchings, Switching DC Power Supplies, Power Conditioners and Uninterruptible Power Supplies, Introduction to Motor Drives, Residential and Industrial Applications and Electric Utility Applications.

description.zh: 本課程從基礎聲學開始介紹電聲元件的原理，進而講授電聲元件揚聲器及麥克風、電聲元件的類比電路分析法、音箱設計、電聲元件的量測方法以及音箱設計軟體的應用，帶引學生進入電聲學的領域。
description.en: This course first introduces principles of electro-acoustic transducers from fundamental acoustics. Then topics in the lectures including introduction of moving-coil loudspeaker and microphone, analog circuits analysis method for  electro- acoustic transducers , loudspeaker enclosure design, measurement test of electro-acoustic transducers and the application of loudspeaker enclosure design software. The aim of this course is to bring students into the field of Electro-Acoustics.

This requirement applies to Freshman Sophomore and Junior students while it is an elective for senior students.  For Freshman level, Classes focus on basic physical strength training.  For Sophomore and Junior students, classes are interest-oriented, thus giving students the opportunity to select specific activities they are interested in. name.zh: 進階英文閱讀與聽講練習

description.zh: 教導學生閱讀囊括全球議題的文章，並藉由文章的內容作技巧的訓練，字彙的建構，語言的解析，及思維的啟發。課中延展活動將閱讀內容與聽力、會話、寫作做進一步的連結，並引導學生將所學做有效的應用。
description.en: The course provides students with explicit skills-based instruction in learning how to process, and decipher the readings that serve as springboards for reading skills development, vocabulary building, language analysis, and thought-provoking discussions. The readings include a variety of viewpoints on global topics centered around social issues, the environment, psychology, business, and technology.  Extension activities are designed to encourage students to go beyond the reading text, and to put what they acquire from the readings into listening, speaking and writing practices.

name.en: Core Curriculum of Liberal Arts Education：History

description.zh: 本課程主要是讓學生對歷史這門學科有一通盤、系統的認識，以便讓學生瞭解歷史的思維取向，增加個人的歷史意識。並在歷史學門的領域中，提供數門基礎及進階課程，供同學選修，以期同學從課程的學習中，理解台灣、中國乃至世界文明的進程與發展，剖析歷史學與現實的互動，提昇學生批判思考之能力。
description.en: This course focuses on getting the students familiar with the academic field of history in a more comprehensive and systematic view. The students are stimulated to think and make judgment with a view to "knowing the history," adding to a better sense of history. Further, they are guided to select some  courses in the field of history, including the formation and changes of the of Taiwan China and the World-as well as interactions between history and the reality-thus enhancing their critical ability to think and judge.

name.en: Core Curriculum of Liberal Arts Education：Society

description.zh: 為了培養學生有關社會、經濟與管理的基礎知識，特規劃了相關的核心課程，增進學生對個人與社會的認知，及對社會整體的分析與瞭解能力,進而?化社會適應能力。
description.en: To develop the basic knowledge of society, economic and management to our students, improve them the cognition of individual and society, and the abilities of analysis and understanding, then enhance the social adjustment ability.

description.zh: 先修課程:4401011或負責教授同意介紹結構體在受到張力、壓力、剪力、扭力及彎曲等外力狀態下之變形，分析應力，應變及變形，莫耳圓，壓力容器，樑，柱。
description.en: Introduction of the deformation, Strain and stress of structure (Beam, Column, Pressure vessel) under several different loading condition equations, Compression, Shear force, Torsion and Bending moment.

description.zh: 先修課程:4401011或負責教授同意力、質量與加速度，質點運動學，質點動力學，功與能，衝量與動量，剛體運動，剛體系的動力學。
description.en: Relations of Forces、Masses and Acceleration, Kinematics of Particles, Dynamics of Particles, Work and Energy, Impulses and Momentum, Kinematics of Rigid Bodies, Dynamics of Systems of Rigid Bodies.

description.zh: 電之基本概念，直流基本電路，電場與磁場，電磁效應，交流之基本概念，交流基本電路，電機基本原理，變壓器，三相感應電動機，單向交流電動機，同步電機，直流電機之分類及特性，直流電機之控制，伺服電動機之分類及特性，電機之維護。
description.en: Introduction to Electricity, DC Circuit Analysis, Electric Field and Magnetic Field, Magnetic Effect, AC Circuit Analysis, Principles of electrical Machinery, Transformers, Three-phase Induction Motor, Single-phase Induction Motor, Synchronous Electric Machinery, DC Electric Machinery, Control of DC Motor, Maintenance of Electric Machinery.

description.zh: C、QBASIC、FORTRAN或LISP，區段架構（變數、輸入／輸出），迴圈（ for,while,do,while ），選擇敘述（ if-else敘述，switch敘述），函數（函數的資料傳遞，外部變數），陣列與字串（陣列中元素之表達，字串），指標（指標與陣列，雙重指標：指向指標的指標），結構、等位以及 ROMBIOS，檔案（標準I/O，記錄I/O，隨機存取），如何設計一個大程式（分開編譯，記憶體式）。
description.en: Computer Languages: C, QBASIC, FORTRAN or LISP (Compiler or Interpreter) Including such as Statements of Flow Control: (Sequence, Selectionand Iteration), Basic Data Type and Input/Ouput Statement Subprograms(Parameters Called by Value and Address), Array, String and pointerStruct, Enum, Union and File How to Design a Large Program (Project,Memory Mode, Library).

description.zh: 先修課程:微積分或負責教授同意常微分方程式，線性常微分方程式，拉普拉氏轉換，級數及傅立葉級數，線性代數及矩陣，積分定理。
description.en: Ordinary Differential Equations, Laplace Transforms, Power Series, Linear Algebra, Matrices.

description.zh: 化學是富挑戰性且具教學難度之科目，使這個複雜的學科讓學生易於接受化學教育家的挑戰，特別是基礎化學。嘗試推展關鍵的化學概念，並以觀察現象為主，再討論理論模式，並用以解釋所觀測的現象是本課程的重點。希望學生實踐"如同一個化學家的思考方式"來仔細觀察，而不是跳入公式或模型中。此外，舉例證明化學在現實生活中的重要性與最新的應用及發展並以簡易明瞭的方式呈現於授課內容。
description.en: Chemistry is fascinating and important subject that is challenging to teach and even more challenging to learn. Marking this complex subject accessible to students without distortion is challenge of the chemical educator, especially at the introductory level.In this lecture I try to develop key chemical concept in the same way to show the observations first and then discuss the models that have been constructed to explain the observed behavior. I hope students will practice "thinking like a chemist" by carefully studying the observation to see if they can follow the thought process, rather than just jumping head to the equation or model that will follow.In addition, to demonstrate the importance of chemistry in real life, I have incorporated throughout the book a number of applications and recent advances in essay form.

description.zh: 本校體育課程目標為鍛鍊健全身心、促進身心健全發展、培養運動道德、發揚團隊精神及養成終身運動習慣。四技一年級實施普通班體育正課教學。四技二、三年級實施專項分組教學，由具有專長之教師授課。開課項目：籃球、排球、桌球、羽球、保齡球、射箭、高爾夫球、網球、體操遊戲、慢速壘球、太極拳、國際標準舞、體適能、國術。學生得按自己興趣選擇修習。本校體育課程目標為鍛鍊健全身心、促進身心健全發展、培養運動道德、發揚團隊精神及養成終身運動習慣。四技一年級實施普通班體育正課教學。四技二、三年級實施專項分組教學，由具有專長之教師授課。開課項目：籃球、排球、桌球、羽球、保齡球、射箭、高爾夫球、網球、體操遊戲、慢速壘球、太極拳、國際標準舞、體適能、國術。學生得按自己興趣選擇修習。
description.en: All students are required to attend two hours per week of Physical Education class. This requirement applies to Freshman Sophomore and Junior students while it is an elective for senior students.  For Freshman level, Classes focus on basic physical strength training.  For Sophomore and Junior students, classes are interest-oriented, thus giving students the opportunity to select specific activities they are interested in.  Choices include Basketball, Volleyball, Table Tennis, Badminton, Bowling, Archery, Golf, Tennis, Gymnastics, Slow pitch, Tai Chi Chuan, Ballroom Dancing, Physical Fitness and martial arts, to mention a few.

name.en: Elective Curriculum of Liberal Arts Education

description.zh: 為了訓練學生獨立思考與判斷能力，培養健全人格，提升人文涵養，延續通識教育六大向度的核心課程，在各向度均規劃了一系列的博雅選修課程，提供學生更多的選擇，以建立學生開闊的視野及達成全人教育的精神。
description.en: To train students have the abilities of independent thinking and judgment, develop the healthy personality and Humanities conservation, and keep the six fields of core curriculum in general education. this course will design a series of optional curriculum on Erudition & Refinement in each field, and develop students the broader sight and reach the spirit of the holistic education.

name.en: Elective Curriculum of Liberal Arts Education

description.zh: 為了訓練學生獨立思考與判斷能力，培養健全人格，提升人文涵養，延續通識教育六大向度的核心課程，在各向度均規劃了一系列的博雅選修課程，提供學生更多的選擇，以建立學生開闊的視野及達成全人教育的精神。
description.en: To train students have the abilities of independent thinking and judgment, develop the healthy personality and Humanities conservation, and keep the six fields of core curriculum in general education. this course will design a series of optional curriculum on Erudition & Refinement in each field, and develop students the broader sight and reach the spirit of the holistic education.

description.zh: 由介紹基本熱傳有關現象，配合熱力守恆有關公式之應用，討論各種熱交換環境下應考慮之因素，分析熱傳導、熱對流、熱輻射及相變熱傳之計算方法。並將要更深入地探討在各不同熱傳導系統內所可能形成之熱力分佈現象，以期學習者能以淺入深地對相關熱傳導系統工程設計上培養出最佳能力。
description.en: Introduction of basic heat transfer phenomena, using thermodynamic conservation equations to discuss the parameters under different heat exchange circumstances, heat conduction, heat convection, heat radiation and phase change are analyzed, discussion in depth on the heat transfer problems in application to cultivate heat transfer design capability.

description.zh: 本課程將介紹冷凍工程，以及其設計，內容涵蓋如下：冷凍工程原理，冷凍系統之設備，各種冷凍系統之設計，冷凍負荷計算，冷媒管路之設計與計算，冷凍庫之設計。
description.en: This course introduces the refrigeration engineering and its system design; the contents cover the following topics: the principles of refrigeration engineering, the equipment and designs of different refrigeration systems, refrigeration load calculations, design and calculation of refrigerant piping, and refrigeration storage design.

description.zh: 基本控制系統的動作方式、位置控制、比例控制、積分控制、微分控制、各種組合控制、氣壓控制裝置、電動及電子控制裝置、液壓控制裝置、空調設備上的各種控制包括溫度、壓力、風量、濕度等之控制。
description.en: To provide students with the concepts of control actions: two position control, proportional control, floating control, integral control, derivative control; to familiarize students with pneumatic control devices, fluid control devices, damper & valves, elementary control systems on HVAC & R systems, include: temperature control, humidity control, static pressure control, flow control and so on.

description.zh: 配電系統規劃及自動化，包括一次及二次系統的設計考慮，配電變壓器的應用，電壓降落及電力損失計算，電容器在配電系統上的應用，配電系統電壓調整，配電系統負載分析，配電系統故障分析。
description.en: Planning and automation of power distribution systems, including system design considerations, power transformer applications, voltage and power loss and calculations, modulations of power supply, load analysis, and failure analysis.

description.zh: 各種冷煤壓縮機簡介，容積式壓縮機效率分析，離心式壓縮機分析，各種送風機簡介，送風機應用，泵之應用分析。
description.en: Introduction to refrigerant compressors, efficiency analysis of volumetric compressors, analysis of centrifugal compressors, introduction to fans, applications of fans, and application of pumps.

description.zh: 本課程之目標為增進研究生之英文閱讀能力與寫作技巧。介紹英文科技論文的慣用語法、用字與閱讀技巧，並分析撰寫英文報告與學術論文之章法與組織要領。
description.en: Objective of this course is to improve reading ability and writing skill for graduate students.  This course introduces grammar, terms and phrases that are frequently used in English technical articles.  Structures of English essay and thesis will also be explained.

description.zh: 控制理論基礎，冷凍控制系統方式簡介，冷凍系統控制元件認識，冷凍循環運轉控制系統規劃，冷凍應用環境溫溼度及污染控制，除霜、防溼及防凍控制設計，冷凍應用節能控制系統規劃設計
description.en: Fundamentals of control logic, introduction to refrigerating control methods, controlled devices and controllers, control circuit design for refrigerating cycle operating, schematic design of space temperature, humidity and contaminants control, Defrost, frost and moisture control design, energy saving control system design

description.zh: 自動化應用基礎，自動化規劃設計︰1. 個體冷凍設備2. 冷凍系統運轉操作3. 冷凍倉儲管理自動化4. 低溫冷凍應用自動化
description.en: Fundamentals and design of automation applications include:1. Unitary refrigeration equipment.2. Refrigerating system operation.3. Refrigerated warehousing management.4. Low temperature refrigeration application.

description.zh: 「現代真空技術」課程概述真空技術廣泛應用在高科技產業中，如半導體、平面顯示器、光電、薄膜、低溫冷凍、太陽能、材料冶金、生物科技等。近幾年來由於高科技產業的蓬勃發展，帶動了真空產業的起飛，使得真空技術的發展一日千里，本課程除了介紹基本真空技術原理之外，另外將介紹目前在高科技產業中所使用的各項真空系統及相關零組件。課程內容包含有真空技術基礎、真空幫浦、真空計、真空材料與元件、抽氣過程與幫浦大小之選擇、真空系統、真空測漏技術與真空技術之應用。
description.en: The vacuum technology and industry are growing fast in the past two decades because of the highly growing of the high-tech industries including semiconductor, flat panel displayer, optics-electrics, thin film, cryogenic, solar energy, material, and biotechnology. The course will introduce the basic vacuum technology and the newly vacuum equipment and related vacuum components widely used in modern high-tech industrials. The contents of the course are basic vacuum technology, vacuum pump, vacuum gauge, material and component, pumping system, leak detection, and applications of vacuum technology.

description.zh: 本課程為研究所熱流科學基礎課程之一，內容主要包括質量、動量與能量守恆方程式的推導，以及它們的解析與近似解，應用範圍包含非旋轉流、低雷諾數流以及高雷諾數(邊界層)流等等。
description.en: This course is one of the fundamental courses in the thermofluid sciences for graduate students. Based upon the concept of conservation, the equations of mass, momentum, and energy will be derived. This course will deal with solutions of these equations, both exact and approximate. The application of solutions includes irrotational flow, low Reynolds number flow, and high Reynolds number (boundary layer) flow, etc.

description.zh: 介紹空調系統節能的理論與實用技術。內容包括：空調元件能源秏損分析，系統搭配之操作性能及總體熱效率評估，耗能因素改善方法與技術，節能設備之原理與設計技術。
description.en: The course is prepared for the theory and technology of ventilation energy conservation. The topics are: energy loss analysis of system components, survey of system cop and overall efficiency, improving methods and technology, and the fundamentals and design technology of energy conservation devices.

name.en: The technology and application of solar thermal energy system

description.zh: 本課程目的為訓練學生獲得在太陽熱能系統與製程應用領域上高階智識理論。課程教材含蓋數種太陽熱能轉換系統用以產生電能、熱水、冷暖氣與照明等用途，主要內容包括太陽輻射幾何學、追日型太陽能聚光器、太陽能史特靈發電系統、太陽能熱水器、太陽能冷暖氣系統、太陽能海水淡化、太陽能照明系統等等章節。期使學生未來能實際應用於各種不同太陽熱能轉換系統之規劃與設計。
description.en: This course aims to give graduate student a resource on the advanced principles and application of solar thermal energy system and processes. The material presented in the course covers several technologies for the conversion of solar thermal energy to provide electricity, hot water, heating, and desalination. The course outline mainly includes analysis of solar geometry and radiation, performance of sun-tracking solar concentrating collectors, solar stirling power system, solar water heating system, solar space heating and cooling system, solar optical lighting system. It hops that the student can apply the learned knowledge to the plan and design of many types of variable solar thermal energy system in year to come.

description.zh: 系統功能分析，空調系統設計概要，負荷計算理論，送風與風管系統分析，送水系統分析，冷卻水塔熱質傳分析，主機系統性能分析
description.en: System function analysis, introduction to system designs of air-conditioning, theories on cooling load calculation, air moving and duct system analysis, water system analysis, heat and mass transfer in cooling towers, performance analysis of chillers

name.zh: 電腦輔助能源與熱流科學分析
name.en: Computer-Aided Analysis on Energy ad Thermofluid Sciences

description.zh: 本課程適合修過工程數學及基礎熱流的碩博士班學生選修。授課內容主要是應用Matlab及CFD套裝軟體分析能源與熱流科學領域的相關問題，並著重於案例分析。課程內容主要包括利用數值分析解析邊界層問題、有限差分法求解穩態與暫態熱傳導以及二維強制驅動流問題，案例分析包括室內氣流運動、潔淨室氣流分佈、熱交換器性能分析、儲冰系統分析、電子散熱以及氫能系統等。
description.en: This course is suitable for the graduate students who have taken fundamental courses of engineering mathematics and thermofluid sciences. The objective of this course is to apply Matlab and CFD packages to analyze the problems related to energy and thermofluid sciences. Case study is the focus of this course. Course contents mainly include the application of numerical methods on solving boundary-layer problems, analyzing steady and transient heat conduction problems, and 2-D lid-driven flow problems by finite difference method. Case study covers room air flow motion, clean room simulation, heat exchanger performance, electronic cooling, thermal ice storage system and hydrogen energy, etc.
