description.en: All students are required to attend two hours per week of Physical Education class. This requirement applies to Freshman Sophomore and Junior students while it is an elective for senior students.  For Freshman level, Classes focus on basic physical strength training.  For Sophomore and Junior students, classes are interest-oriented, thus giving students the opportunity to select specific activities they are interested in.  Choices include Basketball, Volleyball, Table Tennis, Badminton, Bowling, Archery, Golf, Tennis, Gymnastics, Slow pitch, Tai Chi Chuan, Ballroom Dancing, Physical Fitness and martial arts, to mention a few.

description.zh: 課程重點：(1)藉由適合其程度的教材加強學生必備的基礎文法觀念和句型結構；(2)使學生確切把握閱讀要領以及充分瞭解寫作的各種技巧，重心在生字、片語、句法的解釋和基本寫作技巧的分析；(3)熟悉英語人士日常生活情境及與學生將來就業環境相關之會話及適當之應對方式；(4)透過練習加強聽、說、讀、寫的知能及表達。
description.en: This course is designed (1) to strengthen students' previously required knowledge in English with basic grammatical ideas and sentence patterns reviewed through reading materials appropriate to their levels; (2) to develop reading skill by giving explanation of difficult words, phrases, and syntax, as well as analysis of basic writing skill; (3)to  familiarize students with useful expressions in conversation and build up their confidence in cross-cultural communication; (4)to reinforce the competence and performance of listening, speaking, reading and writing by practice.

name.en: First step to achieving the goals of universities

description.zh: 大學入門是針對大一新生所開授之全校性課程。用以協助學生:(一)認識高等教育的理念、目的與價值(二)有效學習(三)涵養正視困境並妥適因應能力。藉以實踐自我鍛鍊，自我掌握，自我經營並建構宏觀視界的高等教育宗旨。
description.en: "First step to achieving the goals of universities" is a campus-wide course provided for all of the first-year students at this school. The course is designed to help first-year students to achieve the following aims and objectives:(1) understanding the basic idea, goals, and fundamental value of higher education at college level;(2) learning proper study attitudes and methods effectively;(3) cultivating the required abilities and skills of responding appropriately to setbacks and difficult situations in order to acquire self-knowledge, self-control, and self-management, so that they may construct the knowledge and imagination that are needed in planning for grand visions of achieving the goals of higher education.

description.zh: 本課程目標乃是協助學生透過有意義之社區服務活動，認識服務學習理念，從服務學習中體驗服務的意義，深化學習的領域、擴大自己的生活範疇與生命歷練。課程內容：包含三大類（一）志願服務基礎課程：選取志願服務相關主題，由授課教師於課堂上講述。可包含服務學習理論、內政部志願服務法所訂定之六大主題（志願服務的內涵、志願服務倫理、自我了解及自我肯定、志願服務經驗分享、志願服務法規之認識、志願服務發展趨勢），或非營利組織、服務機構之介紹等等。（二）社區服務：選擇服務機構前往服務，於本學期內完成授課教師所規定服務時數或內容。（三）課堂討論與反思：學生必須進行服務經驗分享與討論，並撰寫與繳交服務日誌、心得報告。
description.en: This course is geared to expand and intensify students' learning beyond classroom by introducing service learning as an integral part of holistic life learning experience. Apart from class work, students will be able to not only understand the significance of services and experience the true value of such learning through various forms of community work. The course is designed to deepen their learning and life experience.I. Core curricula of services: The course is structured on the framework of six themes in service learning by theory and practice as well as legal regulations regarding community services enacted by the Ministry of the Interior. The six themes respectively are: significance of service; standards of service; self-comprehension and affirmation; sharing service experience; service law and trends; and non-profit and service organizations.II. Community service: Students select or be arranged to service organizations and are responsible for completing service assignments

description.zh: 國文，是運用本國語言文字，蘊釀於欣賞文藝作品，充實文化內涵，增進思維能力與人文素養的一門課程。本課程分為大一上學期2學分，大一下學期2學分。大一上學期的授課內容，以文學名篇為範圍；希望藉此擴建學生深入品味文學趣味的能力，鍛鍊靈活的語文敏感度，默契文學創意，甚而嘗試創作。大一下學期的授課內容，以思想名篇為範圍；希望藉此啟發學生透轍分析各家學說思想，漫步哲人的宇宙天地，跟隨哲人的心路歷程，進而念茲在茲，從容內化，共饗取之不盡用之不竭的先驗與風範。
description.en: "Chinese" is the course where we make full use of our native languages to enjoy literary works, to enrich our cultural taste, to develop our thinking and even to elevate human cultivation.This four-credit course is set for the freshman students: with 2 credits in each of the two semesters of the school year. In the first semester, the course covers important articles in literature, in the hope for the student learners to cultivate better ability to taste literary works when they have more vivid sense on the language. With fuller knowledge on what literature is about, they are expected to try creative writings. For the second semester, the course is mainly focused on the writings on thoughts. It is our expectation that throughout the reading and analysis of various great schools of philosophy, the student learners are given the opportunity to explore the huge minds of philosophers, who will thus be imitated and followed. Through the internalization, the students might benefit themse

description.zh: 本課程希望在一學年中，能使學生對微分及積分有充分的瞭解、培養邏輯推理、啟發思考創造、強化計算演繹並注重應用與作圖，以建立同學未來學習工程數學及相關專業課程之數學基礎，充分達到學以致用的目的。課程內容包括：1.極限與連續，2.導數及其應用，3.不定積分與定積分，4.超越函數及其反函數，5.積分法則，6.不定型與瑕積分，7.定積分的應用，8.空間幾何與向量微積分，9.偏導數，10.重積分。
description.en: This course aims at developing comprehension of Derivation and Integral、activating capabilities of Logic Inference and Induction、enlightening confidence and independence、strengthening calculating abilities with an emphasis on its application and diagram、furnishing a sound basis for future specialty. The content includes: 1.Limits and Continuity, 2.Derivative and Application, 3.Indefinite and Definite Integral, 4.Transcendental Functions and their Inverses, 5.Techniques of Integration, 6.Indeterminate Forms and Improper Integral, 7.Application of Integration, 8.Basic Vector Analysis, 9.Partial Derivative, 10.Multiple Integration.

description.zh: 本校之普通物理課程專為工程科系背景之同學設計，主要的目的是鼓勵同學參與大自然運行奧秘、法則之探索，並供給爾後修習專業課程之堅實基礎。本課程之內容包含力學、熱力學、聲學、電磁學、光學及近代物理。教授者可按每週三小時、二個學期的時間設計、再參酌各系不同之需求、加強或節略某些章節。
description.en: The course is designed for the students with engineering background. The theme of this course is to encourage students to participate in the discovery of laws and wonder of nature, and to solidate the foundation for the particular courses of study for different departments. The contents of this course include mechanics, dynamics, thermodynamics, electromagnetics, optics, and foundation of modern physics, etc.. The lecturers will emphasize or abridge certain contents based on the individual needs of departments. For this course, there will be 3 credits for each of two semesters,  and 3 lecture hours per week.

description.zh: 本課程的目的是為了：1.驗證物理理論之真實性，2.培養同學認真的科學態度與方法，3.培養同學數據處理的能力，4.啟發同學自行設計解決量度問題的方法。課程之施行分為上下兩學期，每一學期為一學分三小時。上學期的內容偏重力學、波動、熱力、流力之實驗，下學期的內容則偏重電磁、光學、近物之實驗。
description.en: In this course there will be 1 credit for each of two semesters, and 3 laboraborial hours per week. The first semester experiments involve mechanics, dynamics, thermodynamics, and waves, etc.. The second semester experiments contains electromagnetics, optics, and modern physics, etc.. The purposes of this course are 1: to identify the physical laws, 2:to cultivate the ability of data reduction of students, 4: to instruct the students solving the problems of measurements of measurements by self-designments.

description.zh: 本課程將從基本空調相關之冷媒化學理論入門，藉由各種冷媒系統之氣、液相臨界溫度、壓力與比容積等性質，各純物質成份與混合物之熱力學性質、蒸氣壓與相變化焓值，標準自由能形成，熱容、表面張力、黏度、熱傳導、擴散係數以及相平衡等因素，探討比較各別冷煤系統化學上之外延及內含性質。此外亦配合相關課程進行實驗操作，加深學習效果。
description.en: This course presents a critical review of various estimation procedures for a limited number of properties of gases and liquids: Critical and other pure component properties, PVT and thermodynamic properties of pure components and mixtures, vapor pressures, and phase-change enthalpies, standard enthalpies of formation, standard gibbs energies, thermal conductivity, diffusion coefficients, and phase equilibrium. Comparison of experimental and estimated values are normal shown in tables to indicate reliability.

description.zh: 計算機系統之基礎觀念介紹及應用。主要內容包括：1.計算機系統簡介 2 .資料的表示法、數字系統、邏輯3.周邊裝置及儲存體 4. 程式語言與程式設計 5.作業系統 6.檔案與資料庫
description.en: This introductory course covers the fundamentals and applications of computers, including, 1.introduction to computer systems, 2.data representation, number systems, and logic 3.peripherals and storage, 4. programming languages and programming 5. operating systems 6..Files and database systems

description.zh: 內容包括各種能量形式、能源轉換、物質之熱力性質、熱力學第一定律。
description.en: To provide students with the concepts and abilities of analyzing energy forms, energy transformation, properties of substance and first law of thermodynamics.

description.zh: 本門課內容包括以下﹕能量與動力原理，燃料與燃燒簡介，鍋爐與熱交換器簡介，渦輪機與內燃機，核能與水力發電動力廠
description.en: This course is an introduction to the following topics﹔principles of energy and power, fuels and combustion, boiler and heat exchanger, turbine and internal combustion systems, nuclear and hydraulic power plants.

description.zh: 本課程著重冷凍系統和空調系統能源的分析，探討構成系統的主要元件－壓縮機、蒸發器和冷凝器的耗能，和各泵、冰水盤管、空調箱及風／水管路系統的能源耗損，進而對整個系統運轉時的效率予以檢討。最後提出各種改善方法，節約能源和減少電力契約容量的技術，以使學生具有節能省電的正確理論觀念和實務技術。
description.en: This lesson is focused on the energy analyses of refrigeration systems and air-conditioning systems. The operating defects of compressors, evaporators andcondensers are to be investigated. Also the energy consumption's of pumps, fan coils air-handling units and duct/water systems are studied. The over all performance of the entire system is thus discussed. Several methods to improve the shortages and the techniques to energy conservation and electricity demand cut-down will be proposed.The students should understand correctly the theory of energy conservation and thetechnology to improve the systems.

description.zh: 本校體育課程目標為鍛鍊健全身心、促進身心健全發展、培養運動道德、發揚團隊精神及養成終身運動習慣。四技一年級實施普通班體育正課教學。四技二、三年級實施專項分組教學，由具有專長之教師授課。開課項目：籃球、排球、桌球、羽球、保齡球、射箭、高爾夫球、網球、體操遊戲、慢速壘球、太極拳、國際標準舞、體適能、國術。學生得按自己興趣選擇修習。本校體育課程目標為鍛鍊健全身心、促進身心健全發展、培養運動道德、發揚團隊精神及養成終身運動習慣。四技一年級實施普通班體育正課教學。四技二、三年級實施專項分組教學，由具有專長之教師授課。開課項目：籃球、排球、桌球、羽球、保齡球、射箭、高爾夫球、網球、體操遊戲、慢速壘球、太極拳、國際標準舞、體適能、國術。學生得按自己興趣選擇修習。
description.en: All students are required to attend two hours per week of Physical Education class. This requirement applies to Freshman Sophomore and Junior students while it is an elective for senior students.  For Freshman level, Classes focus on basic physical strength training.  For Sophomore and Junior students, classes are interest-oriented, thus giving students the opportunity to select specific activities they are interested in.  Choices include Basketball, Volleyball, Table Tennis, Badminton, Bowling, Archery, Golf, Tennis, Gymnastics, Slow pitch, Tai Chi Chuan, Ballroom Dancing, Physical Fitness and martial arts, to mention a few.

name.zh: 進階英文閱讀與聽講練習

description.zh: 教導學生閱讀囊括全球議題的文章，並藉由文章的內容作技巧的訓練，字彙的建構，語言的解析，及思維的啟發。課中延展活動將閱讀內容與聽力、會話、寫作做進一步的連結，並引導學生將所學做有效的應用。
description.en: The course provides students with explicit skills-based instruction in learning how to process, and decipher the readings that serve as springboards for reading skills development, vocabulary building, language analysis, and thought-provoking discussions. The readings include a variety of viewpoints on global topics centered around social issues, the environment, psychology, business, and technology.  Extension activities are designed to encourage students to go beyond the reading text, and to put what they acquire from the readings into listening, speaking and writing practices.

name.en: Core Curriculum of Liberal Arts Education：Society

description.zh: 為了培養學生有關社會、經濟與管理的基礎知識，特規劃了相關的核心課程，增進學生對個人與社會的認知，及對社會整體的分析與瞭解能力,進而?化社會適應能力。
description.en: To develop the basic knowledge of society, economic and management to our students, improve them the cognition of individual and society, and the abilities of analysis and understanding, then enhance the social adjustment ability.

description.zh: 冷凍空調概論、基礎知識與定義、空氣熱力學、基本冷凍循環與應用分析、壓縮理論及壓縮機性能分析、冷凍空調系統組成-壓縮機、冷凝器、冷媒控制器、蒸發器、冷凍介質－冷媒、二次冷媒吸收劑及冷凍油、冷媒管路及配件、空調處理過程及空調維護分析。
description.en: Refrigeration & air conditioning Introduction Fundamentals & definitions Psychrometrics Basic refrigeration cycles & application analysis Compression cycle theory & performance of compressors Compression system compositions- compressor, condenser, refrigerant controls Cooling mediums- refrigerants, secondary refrigerants, absorbents, refrigeration oils. Refrigerant piping & accessories. Air conditioning processes & cycles analysis.

notes: 四能二和四機電二合開

description.zh: 教授電腦工程繪圖基礎，包括立體三維空間的投影觀念、幾何學製圖方法，訓練繪製草圖、各種物件之三視圖；並能正確標註尺寸，公差與配合，使具備繪製各式管路、鋼架、氣油壓及機械設備之相關標準工程圖的能力。
description.en: Instructing the basis of computer engineering drawing, including the concepts of orthographic projection of 3D space and the methods of geometry graphics. Training the skills to raw sketch, various 3D views. Learning to mark dimensions, tolerance and fittings correctly. This lesson also demands students to able to be familiarized the drawings of steel structures, hydraulic and fluid systems, and related mechanical devices.

description.zh: 本課程將介紹工程上、物理上系統解析的相關數學工具，內容包括：1.常微分方程式：一階，二階，及高階常微分方程，2.拉譜拉斯轉換，3.特殊函數。
description.en: This course intends to introduce the mathematical principles and practices that today's engineers need to know. The course contents are 1.Ordinary Differential Eqs: 1st order, 2nd order and higher order ODEs. 2. Laplace transform, 3. Special function.

description.zh: 網路拓樸理論及特立勤定理；節點與網路分析；迴路與切集分析；狀態變數法；自然頻率；網路函數；雙埠網路；計算機輔助分析（PSPICE）；傅氏分析；拉氏轉換。
description.en: 1. The power of single phase and poly- phase, and complex    frequency and power factor correction; the phasor    conception to the Damped sinusoidal forcing function.2. The resonant of frequency response, quality factor and    the width of a resonance     response curve of half-power    frequencies.3. Magnetically coupled circuits and Two-port networks.4. Fourier Analysis and Laplace Transform Techniques.

description.zh: 管路處理、焊接設備及焊接練習、空氣性質測定、冷媒性質測定、基本冷凍循環實習、冷凍系統處理、基本冷凍機電路實習、基本冷凍系統組件之配置。
description.en: To familiarize students with practice of working with tubing, using with oxyacetylene brazing equipment, air properties measurement, identifying refrigerant by T-P curve, evacuating a system, charging and testing a system, wiring of basic electrical circuit and control circuit.

description.zh: (1)基本電路元件介紹; (2)基本電路理論回顧; (3)半導體特性介紹; (4)半導體二極體電路分析技巧; (5)半導體二極體之應用:整流器,濾波器,剪波器,箝位器,倍壓器; (6)其他特殊二極體:發光二極體,齊納二極體,…; (7)雙極接合面電晶體工作原理; (8)雙極接合面電晶體直流偏壓電路; (9)雙極接合面電晶體交流小信號電路分析; (10)場效電晶體之分類:接合面型,金氧半增強型,金氧半衰減型,金氧半垂直型,金氧半互補型; (11)場效電晶體工作原理; (12)場效電晶體直流偏壓電路; (13)場效電晶體交流小信號電路分析
description.en: (1) Introduction to basic circuit components; (2)The review of basic circuit theories; (3)Introduction to the characteristics of semiconductors; (4)Circuit analysis techniques for semiconductor PN diode; (5)The applications of PN diode: Rectifier, Filter, Clipper, Clamper, and Voltage-doubler; (6)Special diodes: Light emitting diode(LED), Zener diode, etc.; (7)The operation principles of bipolar junction transistor(BJT); (8)DC biasing circuits for BJTs; (9)Small signal analysis for BJT circuits; (10)The classification of field effect transistor(FET): JFET, Enhancement-MOS, Depletion-MOS, VMOS, and CMOS; (11)The operation principles of FET; (12)DC bias circuits for FETs; (13)Small signal analysis for FET circuits

description.zh: 中文概述：專題報告、專題演講、研究小組討論。
description.en: Case study. Seminar. Group meeting.

description.zh: 本課程為訓練學生具有敏銳的觀察能力及細密的思考能力，以發現技職教育的相關問題，並擬定完善可行的研究計畫，遂行研究工作，經客觀分析程序，並作成研究論。課程內容括技職教育研究概論、研究設計、研究方法、取樣與量測、資料處理、報告撰寫。
description.en: This course is a survey of research methodology that is relevant to the technological education. It discusses how to design quantitative research, collect, and report the data. It also highlights the difference between quantitative research and qualitative research.

description.zh: 本課程在訓練學生熟悉統計方法與理論，使能利用已知的資料，經由整理、分析並作成合理解讀，作為教育相關研究工具。課程內容包括機率、抽樣分配與估計，假設考驗，相關迥歸分析、變異數分析等。
description.en: This course is designed to equip students with ability to analyze and interpret experiments and surveys. Course contains include probability concept, sampling distribution, interval estimation, hypothesis testing and analysis of variance.

name.en: Administration of Vocational and Technological School

description.zh: 本課程在探討學校行政理論的歷史背景、學校社會系統理論、學校科層體制、學校氣氛、學校領導、決策、溝通理論、學校效能等，並以技職學校作為討論主軸。
description.en: This course is to guide students to explore the historical background of the theories of school administration; theories of school social system; school departmental hierarchy; school atmosphere; school leadership; theories of decision and communication; studies of school efficiency. Students are expected to apply related theory to analyze VTE issues after the class.

description.zh: 探討網路教學與學習之相關原理，以及實務應用。內容包括有網路學習之優點、特性、限制、科技、媒體、平台、教材、教師角色與管理、學生角色與任務、實際案例、未來趨勢等。
description.en: To explore theories and practical application Web-based instruction and learning including WBL advantages, characteristics, limitations, technology, media, platforms, materials, teacher roles and management, student roles and tasks, practical cases, and future trends etc..

description.zh: 本課程檢視受到廣泛使用的主要教育評鑑模式，並熟悉教育評鑑模式的取向與實用技術。
description.en: This course is designed to review the most widely used model for educational evaluation, to conversant with approach and utility technique of evaluation models.

name.en: Theory and practice of Technical-Vocational Education

description.zh: 課程內容包括：技職教育的理論基礎、能力本位、建教合作、生計教育、職業輔導、技職課程與教學等理念與實務。
description.en: Course content include: theoretical foundations and developmental trends of technical and vocational education, competence-based instruction, cooperative education, career education, vocational guidance, technical and vocational education curriculum.

description.zh: （一）瞭解人力資源發展之定義、內涵與功能；（二）培養進行人力資源發展之基本能力。課程內容包括：人力資源發展之定義與內涵、人力資源發展之需求評估、人力資源規劃、學習理論、訓練方法、教材編撰、訓練發展評量及國際化人力資源發展等。課程實施方法為講解、討論、參觀訪問及專題討論。
description.en: The course aims to (1) understand the definition, essence, and function of human resources development, (2) cultivate the fundamental capability of human resource development. It covers the definition and essence of human resources development, demand evaluation of human resource development, planning of human resource, learning theories, training method; curriculum designing and compilation, evaluation of training development, and international human resource development. The course is conducted through lectures, discussions, field trip activities, and colloquia.

description.zh: 探討數位化課程網站的系統化設計方法與過程。內容包括課程網站的分析、規劃、設計、發展、測試、評估等，以及實際網站案例介紹等。
description.en: To explore systematic design methodologies and progress of figital course website analysis, planning, design, development, test, and evaluation, and practical cares of course website etc.

description.zh: 探討數位化測驗與評量之相關原理、設計、以及實務應用。內容包括有數位化測驗與評量之理論基礎、優點、特性、限制、科技、設計與發展、系統、教學管理、實際案例、未來趨勢等。另外尚包括數位化另類評量，如電子化學習檔案、數位化檔案評量、數位化概念圖、電腦化同儕互評等。
description.en: To explore theories, design and practical application of digital test and asessment including their theortical fundamentals, advantages, characteristics, limitations, technology, design and development, system, instructional management, practical cases, and future trends etc...Moreover, digital alternative assessments such as e-portfolio, digital portfolio assessment, digital concept map, and computer-based peer assessment are also included.

name.zh: 網路學習社群專題研究
name.en: Special Topic on Web-Based Learning Community

description.zh: 探討網路學習社群之相關原理，以及實務應用。內容包括有網路學習社群之理論基礎、優點、特性、限制、科技、媒體、環境、形成要素、成員角色與任務、線上討論與知識分享、成功因素、經營管理、實際案例、未來趨勢等。
description.en: To explore advnced issues on Web-based learning community (WBCL)including WBCL theoretical fundamental, advantages, characteristics, limitations, technology, media, environment, formed factors, member roles and tasks, online discussion, successful factors, operation and management, practical cases, and future trrnds etc..

description.zh: 縱覽教育經濟學理論基礎，研習教育經濟研究方法論，主題探討包含:台灣經濟成功的要件，經濟政策與發展軌跡及高科技的挑戰，重要論點在於如何結合技職教育融入台灣新興產業要求。
description.en: Overview of theories and research methodology in the economics of education. Topics include elements of success economic policies, economic policies, economic development, and challenges of hi-tech era in Taiwan, and discussion of issues on what elements impact Taiwan's economic development and how to combine the technical-vocational education with the development of Taiwan's new industry.

description.zh: 本課程將透過每週專題演講方式，讓學生了解有機材料之最新開發成品或最先進之研究成果。演講者之安排將以校外知名專家學者及校內各計畫執行者為主。
description.en: This course will provide important information regarding to the latest development or application on the organic materials. Speakers being invited are well-known scholars in organic area.  Graduate students or thesis advisors will also be invited to report any in interesting result from their graduate studies.

description.zh: 本課程是針對已修習一年的大學有機化學的同學，因此課程規劃成反應、機構與結構式等三個主要部分。修畢本課程的同學應已具有瞭解有機化學相關論文與研究成果的能力。
description.en: This course is designed for students who have taken one-year undergraduate organic chemistry course. It is divided into the three fundamental aspects of the study of organic chemistry:reactions, mechanisms and structure. A student who has completed this course should be able to approach the literature directry, with a sound knowledge of modern basic organic chemistry.

description.zh: 本課程主要探討高分子在溶液及固態時的物理化學現象及其應用。內容包括�溶液熱力學?高分子的微結構及定性。�溶液熱力學探討統計熱力學、晶格理論、Flory-Huggin理論、Flory-Krigbaum理論、相分離、θ-溫度、滲透壓、GPC測分子量、高分子膠體。?高分子之微結構包括有高分子之形狀、自由旋轉分子鏈距離、光散射、中子散射、排拒體積、碎形、霍氏光譜及核磁共振儀在高分子微結構之分析。
description.en: The course is to investigate the physical phenomena of macromolecules in the solution and solid state. It includes the solution thermodynamics and chemical microstructure of polymer chains.The solution thermodynamics is to study lattice theory, statistical thermodynamics, Flory-Huggin theory, Flory-Krigbaum theory, phase separation, θ-temperature, Osmometry, GPC, and polymer gels.Light scattering and Neutron scattering are used to characterize the polymer microstructure. Polymer radius of gyration, freely rotating chains, excluded volume, fractal, and scaling are also discussed. Finally, spectroscopy methods are used to study polymerization models and microstructure.

name.en: Analysis and Identification of Organic Materials

description.zh: 本課程包含材料的結構鑑定和材料的性質分析。材料的結構鑑定方法有：元素分析、吸收光譜法、振動光譜法、核磁共振光譜法、質譜法、x-射線光譜法和電子顯微鏡法。材料的性質分析包含：材料熱性質(DSC, TGA, TMA,DMA)和材料機械性質(伸張、壓縮、剪力強度等)。
description.en: The materials of the course include structure identification and property analysis of materials. Methods of structure identification  of materials are : elemental analysis, absorption spectroscopy, vibration spectroscopy, nuclear magnetic resonance spectroscopy, mass spectrometry, x-ray spectroscopy and electron microscopy. Metheds of property analysis of materials are : thermal properties of materials (DSC,TGA,TMA,DMA) and mechanical properties of materials (tensile, compression and shear strengths).

description.zh: 高分子流變學本課程以講述高分子流體之黏性及彈性為主。內容包括:(1) 黏彈性簡介(2)時間溫度轉換(3)非結晶區之玻璃轉移點(4)橡膠理論(5)黏彈模型(6)介電鬆弛等專題。
description.en: This course will extensively study the viscosity and elasticity of polymeric materials. The main contents include(1) Phenomenalogical Treatment of Viscoelasticity(2) Time-Temperature Correspondence(3) Transitions and Relaxation in Amorphous Polymers(4) Rubber Elasticity(5) Viscoelastic Models(6) Dielectric Relaxation

description.zh: 本課程探討液晶之形成原理及其在高科技之應用，其內容包括從液晶之熱力學探討液晶形成之原理，低分子量液晶在顯示器(STN LCD, TFT LCD)之應用，液晶配向膜，液晶補償膜，彩色濾光片之原理及應用，鐵電式液晶在光電之用途。最後研究主鏈和側鏈型的液晶高分子，如層列型、膽固醇型，這些材料在高科技及非線性光學上之發展。
description.en: The course is to elucidate the physics and chemistry of liquid crystal material. It includes application of liquid crystal as display derivces, liquid crystal display compensator, color filter, STN LCD, TFT LCD, and ferroelectric liquid crystals. Finally the potential application of the liquid crystal in nonlinear optics and high-tech industries will be discussed.

description.zh: 研究生相較於大學期間訓練的最主要差別在於其必須從事個人的學術研究。因此，研究生須要資訊與洞察力以達成獲得較高學位之論文寫作能力。故本課程主要內容包括：  一、 研究的特性  二、 智慧收集-「什麼」的問題  三、 研究-「何故」的問題  四、 良好研究的特質  五、 研究的基本類型  六、 從事研究的技能  七、 研究倫理  八、 研究設計練習
description.en: The necessity for personal academic research is the key cultural change that postgraduate students will encounter compared with their undergraduate days. Thus, postgraduate students need information and insights to develop the capacity to operate successfully achieving a higher-level degree. To examine these concerns, the course includes:1. Characteristics of research2. Intelligence-gathering-the "what" questions3. Research-the "why" questions4. Characteristics of good research5. Basic types of research6. The craft of doing research7. Research ethics8. Research design practice

name.en: A Briefing on Architecture Design Course (I)

description.zh: 總課程目標： 在學員原有專業基礎上，增加其深度與廣度，包含自實質與非 實質環境之探討與實踐等之能力。 研一課程目標： 了解理論與實踐之理性關係，其對象應包含自實質至非實質環 境。 課程概要： 利用不同設計課題就學員原有專長實際操作其自理論至實踐之 因果關係。此階段較偏向對目標之了解，就各學員所選定課題 完成一設計成果及完整探討與實踐之過程書面資料，以接受目 標檢驗。
description.en: Goal for the Course : Base on the professional knowledge, the disciples learn to enhance the depth and width of ascertainment and practice in both substantial and non-substantial environments. 1st GradeThrough manipulation of different design topics, the disciples learn to understand the relational relationship between theory and practice in both substantial and non-substantial environments. A complete presentation which includes design result and a report of the process of the ascertainment will be required for evaluation.

description.zh: 本課程區分為四個實習，共一學年之都市設計實習，每學期應從事幾項實習，依該學期之情況而定：(一)大型基地開發之建築規劃與都市設計實習：參照台北市都市發展局擬定之「都市設計與土地使用開發許可」之審議標準，練習建築、敷地與都市設計三者整合關係之設計實習。(二)都市更新地區都市設計實習：以台北市更新地區為範例，選定基地範圍從事都市更新地區之改造，建立地區未來像，並擬定都市設計準則。(三)都市計畫通盤檢討地區都市設計實習：依據都市計畫通盤檢討第八條規定，都市計畫通盤檢討地區必須依據該地區之交通、產業、文化、生態及基地等因素，擬定都市設計準則；以台北市都市計畫通盤檢討為例，練習都市設計準則之訂定，或以都市計畫細部計畫為例，研擬土地使用分區管制與設計準則。(四)新發展區都市設計實習：選定一個地區，可能是擴大都市發展地區或新市鎮、新社區之規劃設計實習。
description.en: There are four exercises for one academic year. The exercises to be undertaken  depend on when and how it is appropriate:(1)	Exercise on building planning and urban design for large-scale land development project(2)	Exercise practice on urban design for district renewal planning(3)	Exercise of overall review district urban design out of the total urban design	(4)	Exercise on urban design for new development area

description.zh: 本課程為工程技術組必修，分為綠建築、建築構法、數位媒體、建築生產、建築在利用、環境控制等專題，每學期視任課老師專長輪流開設兩至三個專題，採用分組方式個別指導，每位學生必須修習兩個不同專題。本課程將針對建築實務中所面對之技術課題進行個案研究並模擬操作其設計至細部設計階段。
description.en: This is a design studio class, focused on the technical side for topics as Green Building, Building Systems, Digital Design Media, Building Production, Building Reuse, Environment Control, and others were be included. There will have only two or three topics in each semester, depends on the teacher's specialty, and each student needs take two topics in one year.

description.zh: 本課程授課主要內容分為三部分：第一部份為都市防災概論，此部分主要針對國內外文獻作一回顧，進而瞭解都市防災整體架構，區分為（1）文獻回顧；（2）防災基本計畫；及（3）防災整體架構等。期使國內都市計畫能逐步邁向防災都市計畫，以建立『安全都市』為目標。此部分的主要內容區分為：（1）都市災害風險理念的形成；（2）防災都市計畫與地區防災系統規劃；（3）都市計畫防災系統規劃原則；（4）都市計畫防災作業準則內容架構；（5）都市計畫防災作業準則；（6）安心都市計畫的形成與實現。第三部分為實務操作部分，以草屯鎮為例，藉九二一大地震的實例，深入探討災情調查的方法，實際調查狀況及研訂災後重建的程序與計畫內容，期望成為國內都市重建計畫的範例，主要內容區分為：（1）緒論；（2）重建理論；（3）草屯鎮現況發展；（4）災情調查方法與重建程序之建立；（5）災情調查分析與重建計畫內容研訂等。
description.en: The subject will be presented in three partsPart One - (1) Literature retrospection; (2) Fundamental planning for disaster prevention; (3) An integrated disaster prevention organization.Part Two -The major contents to be addressed include (1) Formation of urban disaster cataclysm and risk; (2) Urban disaster prevention plan and regional disaster protection system planning; (3) Principles for planning disaster prevention system in urban plan; (4) Operational standards and organization for urban disaster prevention; (5) Operational guidelines for urban disaster prevention; (6) Realization and formation of trouble free urban plan.Party Three -. The major contents are (1) Introduction; (2) rehabilitation theory; (3) Current development in Tsaotun City; (4) Establishment of damage survey method and rehabilitation procedures; (5) Detail analysis of damage survey report and preparation of rehabilitation plan content.

description.zh: 本課程的目的是研究人與環境互動的關係，介紹環境心理學發展的過程及相關的理論。並藉由觀察與評估現有生活環境中的行為，增進我們對環境心理學中在理論與經驗上不同取向的瞭解。課程內容包括1.緒論2.研究方法及理論架構 3. 建成環境，由家環境到城市空間4.社會行為及實質環境5.自然環境與行為6.使用者用後評估7. 結論
description.en: The purpose of this course is to explore the interaction relationships between human and environment, introducing the development and theory of environmental psychology. Via observing and evaluating the behavior of present living environment, enhance our knowledge about environmental psychology through various approaches to theories and experiences. The course includes:1. Introduction  2. Research methods and theory framework 3. The built environment from home environment to city space 4. Social behavior and the physical environment 5. The natural environment and behavior 6. Post-occupancy evaluation 7. Conclusion

description.zh: 本課程主要探討台灣現行依據都市更新條例進行之都市更新實務之相關議題，透過理論與實務操作研討熟悉台灣都市更新操作機制及趨勢。主要內容包括如下：都市生命力再開發之契機與課題、都市再開發之目標、策略公部門執行都市更新之手段策略與課題民間團體執行都市更新之手段策略與課題現行都市更新手段之探討中國都市更新執行機制與成效都市更新規劃實務-都市更新概要計畫都市更新規劃實務-都市更新事業計畫都市更新規劃實務-容積獎勵之爭取（公共公益設施）日本推動都市再開發之相關配套措施（金融融資政策之探討）民間團體主辦都市更新與權利變換概說、不動產證卷化與信託
description.en: This course regards relative issues of urban revitalization implementation according to the Urban Renewal Act in Taiwan. This course consisted of several parts as below: Introduction of Urban Renewal Act the issues & strategies of Urban Renewal of government the issues & strategies of Urban Renewal of private sector the methods & strategies of urban renewalthe effects & authority of urban renewal in Mainland China the implementation of urban renewal-urban renewal brief the implementation of urban renewal-urban renewal planthe implementation of urban renewal-Floor Area Bonusthe implementation of urban renewal-Rights Concession plan he implementation of urban renewal-Investment Trust、Trust Funds

name.zh: 創意城市與城市規劃專論
name.en: Special Topics on Creative City and City Planning

description.zh: 目前全世界超過一半以上的人口生活在城市，人數仍快速增加中，相伴而來的環境、經濟、社會與治理問題將如何處理？因此城市轉型是城市要繼續成長的必要過程，許多案例顯示創意城市是城市轉型的典範，可以作為城市轉型與再生的契機。創意城市是近年來先進國家鼓勵領導者、產業、市民從己身城市內思考、規劃、發揮創意與實現城市創新的觀念，以啟發城市找到自身的發展潛能，結合當地文化資產及地方特色，經由城市發展規劃提升創意經濟及城市的競爭力。本課程以文化創意、產業創新及城市規劃為主軸，包括研究創意城市定義、特徵、條件、構成、指標、類型、評估的基礎，進而探討與文化創意、產業創新、城市發展規劃的關連，並參考國內外城市的創新與再生案例，他們是如何在城市議題上思考、規劃與執行富有創意的行動，又如何將行動運用於城市規劃。課程經由互動分析創意城市與城市規劃的關連及作法，討論可供借鏡的發展策略與方案。
description.en: The creative city is crucial to urban transformation in the future of our city. It means to encourage leaders,industries, and citizens to think, plan, create and realize urban innovation, inspired by the city to find their own development potential, combined with local cultural assets and characteristics, to enhance the creative economy through urban development planning and the city's competitiveness. The course aims at framing cultural creativity, industrial innovation and urban planning as main thoughts on the basis of research. Literature review including definition, characteristics, conditions, indicators, types of assessment, and then to explore with the cases of innovation and regeneration around the world. How they think urban issues, planning and implementation on creative actions, and how the actions used in urban planning.Courses via interactive analysis among the creative city,urban planning and practices,to figure out development strategies and programs available to learn.

description.zh: 本校體育課程目標為鍛鍊健全身心、促進身心健全發展、培養運動道德、發揚團隊精神及養成終身運動習慣。四技一年級實施普通班體育正課教學。四技二、三年級實施專項分組教學，由具有專長之教師授課。開課項目：籃球、排球、桌球、羽球、保齡球、射箭、高爾夫球、網球、體操遊戲、慢速壘球、太極拳、國際標準舞、體適能、國術。學生得按自己興趣選擇修習。本校體育課程目標為鍛鍊健全身心、促進身心健全發展、培養運動道德、發揚團隊精神及養成終身運動習慣。四技一年級實施普通班體育正課教學。四技二、三年級實施專項分組教學，由具有專長之教師授課。開課項目：籃球、排球、桌球、羽球、保齡球、射箭、高爾夫球、網球、體操遊戲、慢速壘球、太極拳、國際標準舞、體適能、國術。學生得按自己興趣選擇修習。
description.en: All students are required to attend two hours per week of Physical Education class. This requirement applies to Freshman Sophomore and Junior students while it is an elective for senior students.  For Freshman level, Classes focus on basic physical strength training.  For Sophomore and Junior students, classes are interest-oriented, thus giving students the opportunity to select specific activities they are interested in.  Choices include Basketball, Volleyball, Table Tennis, Badminton, Bowling, Archery, Golf, Tennis, Gymnastics, Slow pitch, Tai Chi Chuan, Ballroom Dancing, Physical Fitness and martial arts, to mention a few.

name.zh: 進階英文閱讀與聽講練習

description.zh: 教導學生閱讀囊括全球議題的文章，並藉由文章的內容作技巧的訓練，字彙的建構，語言的解析，及思維的啟發。課中延展活動將閱讀內容與聽力、會話、寫作做進一步的連結，並引導學生將所學做有效的應用。
description.en: The course provides students with explicit skills-based instruction in learning how to process, and decipher the readings that serve as springboards for reading skills development, vocabulary building, language analysis, and thought-provoking discussions. The readings include a variety of viewpoints on global topics centered around social issues, the environment, psychology, business, and technology.  Extension activities are designed to encourage students to go beyond the reading text, and to put what they acquire from the readings into listening, speaking and writing practices.

name.en: Core Curriculum of Liberal Arts Education：Philosophy

description.zh: 哲學既是一門兼具理想性與現實性的基礎學科，又是一種既有趣又深刻的一種思想活動。 它所探討的目標都是和人類自身與他們所生活的周遭世界密切相關的一些基本問題；這些基本問題至少包括：宇宙、知識、公平正義、道德、宗教、語言、心靈、社會、教育、愛情，和生與死。 從事哲學思考，就是對上述問題，進行一種反省。 這種反省，能夠讓我們明白形成這些問題背後的一些基本原則，以及解決這些問題的一些可能方案的理由根據和獲致這些解決方案的應有程序。 由於哲學是著重思考與反省的活動，學習哲學其實不僅僅可以幫助我們掌握和人類自身與生活世界相關問題的一些根本知識，更能培養一個負責任的社會公民不可或缺的一種思維能力和反省態度。
description.en: Philosophy is not only a fundamental subject with both ideals and practical value, but also an interesting thinking activity of depth.  The topics it discusses concern some basic questions for we human beings and the world around us.  These basic questions at least include: the universe, knowledge, equality and justice, morality, religion, language, mind, society, education, love, and life and death.  Thinking things philosophically is to reflect upon these basic questions.  The reflection of this sort leads us to understand not only the basic principles behind these questions,   also the reasons and procedures of the possible solutions to these questions.  Given philosophy is such an activity based on thinking and reflection, learning philosophy hence can help us grasp the required knowledge concerning ourselves and our living world, and more importantly, prepare a thinking ability and reflecting attitude that are needed for us to succeed in becoming responsible social citizen.

name.en: Core Curriculum of Liberal Arts Education：Society

description.zh: 為了培養學生有關社會、經濟與管理的基礎知識，特規劃了相關的核心課程，增進學生對個人與社會的認知，及對社會整體的分析與瞭解能力,進而?化社會適應能力。
description.en: To develop the basic knowledge of society, economic and management to our students, improve them the cognition of individual and society, and the abilities of analysis and understanding, then enhance the social adjustment ability.

name.zh: 新聞英語及聽力訓練（一）

description.zh: 本課程利用新聞教材加強英語字彙能力及聽力技巧, 	內容採用電台、報紙、電視的時事、深度報導和全球議題以增強學生英語知識。同時, 學生亦可獲得各種有用的聽力技巧以加強英語聽力。
description.en: This course is designed to increase vocabulary power and develop listening skills in English through up-to-date news. Current events, in-depth reports as well as global issues from radio, newspapers and T.V are provided to enrich the student's English knowledge. Effective listening skills are reinforced to enhance the student's listening comprehension.

description.zh: 本課程旨在進一步加強學生的口語表達溝通之能力，經由合宜的活動設計，如小組討論與英語談話情境的塑造，如面談，學生將獲得充分機會以演練聽講的技巧。
description.en: This course is designed to develop oral communication skills at a higher level.  Stimulating themes and authentic content will be used to engage students and generate lively conversation, such as though-provoking newspaper, magazine articles, and video films. Activities include task-based pair and small-group discussion for maximum practice and personalization.

description.zh: 本課程旨在提昇學生撰寫結構完整段落和短文之能力, 並著重如何重寫、摘要、 轉述、 陳述、筆記、編排、起草、修改等相關技巧。
description.en: This course is expected to expand students' writing capacity and experience by helping them to formulate, organize, and present ideas clearly in well-formed paragraphs and compositions.  Students will learn about rewriting, outlining, paraphrasing, synthesizing, documenting, note-taking, writing the draft and editing their own work.

name.en: British and American Literatures and Cultures

description.zh: 本課程引導學生熟悉變遷中之英美文學作品典律，並探討其形成之歷史文化背景及隨變遷所產生之時代意義。課程中將討論與作品相關之社會、政治、文化、心理、哲學、理論等議題，使學生能瞭解欣賞選讀作品，並銳化其思辯能力及分析技巧。學生須於課前詳讀作品，並於課堂上參與討論。
description.en: This course is intended not only to familiarize students with the evolving canon of British and American literatures, but also to investigate its contextual historical and cultural meanings, past as well as present. It aims to sharpen students' critical thinking ability and analytical reading skills by engaging them to discuss social, political, cultural, psychological, philosophical, and theoretical issues that are relevant to their understanding and appreciation of the selected literary works. Students are required to peruse the assigned weekly readings and participate in class discussion.

description.zh: 本課程涵蓋的主題包含語音，句法，語意，心理語言，社會語言，語言學習等簡介，作為更進一步語言（母語／外語）學習，教學，研究的基礎。
description.en: This course covers the basic ideas on the following sub-topics: phonetics & phonology, syntax, semantics, psycholinguistics, sociolinguistics and language acquisition, serving as a stepping stone for further research on language learning (native or foreign), teaching or other language-related study.

description.zh: 本課程旨在引導學生閱讀英美短篇故事，探討其敘事技巧、情節、人物、觀點和語言等，如何在故事中建構意義，並著重故事所傳達的文化意涵。
description.en: This course will guide students to read short fiction written by British and American authors.  By reading a wide range of short stories, we will examine how such narrative techniques as plot, character, point of view and language construct meaning in stories.  We will also examine what these stories tell us about the cultures that produce them.

description.zh: 課程橫跨英國文學的歷史，由中世紀到現代， 選讀英國文學史中最經典、最耐讀、可讀性最高的作品。務求由社會背境、歷史脈絡、和哲學思潮各方面理解作品。目標除了對英國文學史，不同文類（詩、戲劇、小說）和文學技巧有較全面的認識外，更可以提升理解其他文學作品的能力。
description.en: This course offers a directed sampling of a range of literary texts across the history of British literature, from the medieval to the modern period. Canonical works of different literary genres (poetry, drama, novel) will be discussed in relation to the social, historical and philosophical backgrounds. Upon completion of the course, participants should have a basic understanding of the history of British literature, and be able to identify their corresponding styles and literary devices, social and religious issues, and philosophical thoughts.

description.zh: 本課程使學生具有基礎日語能力，並加強會話及閱讀能力訓練。
description.en: The focus of this course is to enable students to have basic Japanese abilities and to strengthen the training or drilling of conversation and reading comprehension of the Japanese language.

description.zh: 本課程使學生具有基礎法語能力，並加強會話及閱讀能力訓練。
description.en: The focus of this course is to enable students to have basic French abilities and to strengthen the training or drilling of conversation and reading comprehension of the French language.

description.zh: 本課程使學生具有基礎西班牙語能力，並加強會話及閱讀能力訓練。
description.en: The focus of this course is to enable students to have basic Spanish abilities and to strengthen the training or drilling of conversation and reading comprehension of the Spanish language.

description.zh: 本課程使學生具有基礎德語能力，並加強會話及閱讀能力訓練。
description.en: The focus of this course is to enable students to have basic German abilities and to strengthen the training or drilling of conversation and reading comprehension of the German language.

description.zh: 本校體育課程目標為鍛鍊健全身心、促進身心健全發展、培養運動道德、發揚團隊精神及養成終身運動習慣。四技一年級實施普通班體育正課教學。四技二、三年級實施專項分組教學，由具有專長之教師授課。開課項目：籃球、排球、桌球、羽球、保齡球、射箭、高爾夫球、網球、體操遊戲、慢速壘球、太極拳、國際標準舞、體適能、國術。學生得按自己興趣選擇修習。本校體育課程目標為鍛鍊健全身心、促進身心健全發展、培養運動道德、發揚團隊精神及養成終身運動習慣。四技一年級實施普通班體育正課教學。四技二、三年級實施專項分組教學，由具有專長之教師授課。開課項目：籃球、排球、桌球、羽球、保齡球、射箭、高爾夫球、網球、體操遊戲、慢速壘球、太極拳、國際標準舞、體適能、國術。學生得按自己興趣選擇修習。
description.en: All students are required to attend two hours per week of Physical Education class. This requirement applies to Freshman Sophomore and Junior students while it is an elective for senior students.  For Freshman level, Classes focus on basic physical strength training.  For Sophomore and Junior students, classes are interest-oriented, thus giving students the opportunity to select specific activities they are interested in.  Choices include Basketball, Volleyball, Table Tennis, Badminton, Bowling, Archery, Golf, Tennis, Gymnastics, Slow pitch, Tai Chi Chuan, Ballroom Dancing, Physical Fitness and martial arts, to mention a few.

description.zh: 課程重點：(1)藉由適合其程度的教材加強學生必備的基礎文法觀念和句型結構；(2)使學生確切把握閱讀要領以及充分瞭解寫作的各種技巧，重心在生字、片語、句法的解釋和基本寫作技巧的分析；(3)熟悉英語人士日常生活情境及與學生將來就業環境相關之會話及適當之應對方式；(4)透過練習加強聽、說、讀、寫的知能及表達。
description.en: This course is designed (1) to strengthen students' previously required knowledge in English with basic grammatical ideas and sentence patterns reviewed through reading materials appropriate to their levels; (2) to develop reading skill by giving explanation of difficult words, phrases, and syntax, as well as analysis of basic writing skill; (3)to  familiarize students with useful expressions in conversation and build up their confidence in cross-cultural communication; (4)to reinforce the competence and performance of listening, speaking, reading and writing by practice.

name.en: First step to achieving the goals of universities

description.zh: 大學入門是針對大一新生所開授之全校性課程。用以協助學生:(一)認識高等教育的理念、目的與價值(二)有效學習(三)涵養正視困境並妥適因應能力。藉以實踐自我鍛鍊，自我掌握，自我經營並建構宏觀視界的高等教育宗旨。
description.en: "First step to achieving the goals of universities" is a campus-wide course provided for all of the first-year students at this school. The course is designed to help first-year students to achieve the following aims and objectives:(1) understanding the basic idea, goals, and fundamental value of higher education at college level;(2) learning proper study attitudes and methods effectively;(3) cultivating the required abilities and skills of responding appropriately to setbacks and difficult situations in order to acquire self-knowledge, self-control, and self-management, so that they may construct the knowledge and imagination that are needed in planning for grand visions of achieving the goals of higher education.

description.zh: 本課程目標乃是協助學生透過有意義之社區服務活動，認識服務學習理念，從服務學習中體驗服務的意義，深化學習的領域、擴大自己的生活範疇與生命歷練。課程內容：包含三大類（一）志願服務基礎課程：選取志願服務相關主題，由授課教師於課堂上講述。可包含服務學習理論、內政部志願服務法所訂定之六大主題（志願服務的內涵、志願服務倫理、自我了解及自我肯定、志願服務經驗分享、志願服務法規之認識、志願服務發展趨勢），或非營利組織、服務機構之介紹等等。（二）社區服務：選擇服務機構前往服務，於本學期內完成授課教師所規定服務時數或內容。（三）課堂討論與反思：學生必須進行服務經驗分享與討論，並撰寫與繳交服務日誌、心得報告。
description.en: This course is geared to expand and intensify students' learning beyond classroom by introducing service learning as an integral part of holistic life learning experience. Apart from class work, students will be able to not only understand the significance of services and experience the true value of such learning through various forms of community work. The course is designed to deepen their learning and life experience.I. Core curricula of services: The course is structured on the framework of six themes in service learning by theory and practice as well as legal regulations regarding community services enacted by the Ministry of the Interior. The six themes respectively are: significance of service; standards of service; self-comprehension and affirmation; sharing service experience; service law and trends; and non-profit and service organizations.II. Community service: Students select or be arranged to service organizations and are responsible for completing service assignments

description.zh: 國文，是運用本國語言文字，蘊釀於欣賞文藝作品，充實文化內涵，增進思維能力與人文素養的一門課程。本課程分為大一上學期2學分，大一下學期2學分。大一上學期的授課內容，以文學名篇為範圍；希望藉此擴建學生深入品味文學趣味的能力，鍛鍊靈活的語文敏感度，默契文學創意，甚而嘗試創作。大一下學期的授課內容，以思想名篇為範圍；希望藉此啟發學生透轍分析各家學說思想，漫步哲人的宇宙天地，跟隨哲人的心路歷程，進而念茲在茲，從容內化，共饗取之不盡用之不竭的先驗與風範。
description.en: "Chinese" is the course where we make full use of our native languages to enjoy literary works, to enrich our cultural taste, to develop our thinking and even to elevate human cultivation.This four-credit course is set for the freshman students: with 2 credits in each of the two semesters of the school year. In the first semester, the course covers important articles in literature, in the hope for the student learners to cultivate better ability to taste literary works when they have more vivid sense on the language. With fuller knowledge on what literature is about, they are expected to try creative writings. For the second semester, the course is mainly focused on the writings on thoughts. It is our expectation that throughout the reading and analysis of various great schools of philosophy, the student learners are given the opportunity to explore the huge minds of philosophers, who will thus be imitated and followed. Through the internalization, the students might benefit themse

description.zh: 本課程旨在培養學生熟悉日常生活英語會話及以正常速度聽講之能力。課程內容取材自學生周遭所熟悉事務, 藉由媒體傳播素材來訓練學生經常聽講之能力，並在課堂中研討其內容以達到運用之目的。
description.en: This course is designed to familiarize students with daily spoken English as well as listening and speaking skills. The content includes a wide variety of authentic multimedia materials-printed audio and video texts.  This gives students an opportunity for both recognition of different speaking styles and an in-depth, culture-rich understanding of the topics from multiple perspectives. Real-life situations are rehearsed in the classroom, with role-plays, situational activities, excerpts from newspapers and magazines and interviews with real people. Speaking practices based on day-to-day language are emphasized in class.

description.zh: 本課程藉由不同情境之英語錄影帶, 以及專題的語彙題目來提供一個英語談話的情境使學生能學習合宜的詞句。小組討論、角色演練、口頭報告皆為主要教學技巧，俾能增強學生之聽說能力。
description.en: This course aims at providing an English-speaking environment to allow students learn about the speaking strategies and common expressions used in different situations through viewing video films and oral practice. Small-group/pair discussion and role-playing are also parts of the methodologies.

description.zh: 本課程分為兩部分：（1）英文文法觀念的溫故知新，並引導學生將正確的文法觀念運用在閱讀與寫作上，學生可加強基本句型練習、句子改正及句型修正。相關討論包括直述句、引述句、句型變化與修飾;（2）英語修辭法：聽講溝通的有效原理原則。課堂討論主題包括：指稱、一致、倒裝等修辭觀念。修習本課後，學生對出現在相同邏輯意義語境中， 利用不同表達方式以凸顯各種語意的方式與內涵，當有更進一步的體認。
description.en: This course is divided into two parts: (a) The first part is designed for the students to  familiarize themselves with English grammatical framework in relation to reading and writing. A review of grammatical ideas at high level is reinforced by correcting sentence errors, and revising awkward usage of words or sentence structures. The main subjects include English sentence structures, verbal usages, conjunctions, and sequences. Related topics for class discussion cover direct and indirect speech, sentence transformation and modification of sentences; (b) The second half of the course focuses on English rhetoric--principles of effective written and spoken communication. Topics for class discussion include reference, coherence, reverse structures and some related rhetorical concepts. It is hoped that the students will know better the significance brought about by the variations of different expressions that occur in the similar linguistic contexts.

description.zh: 本課程透過希臘英雄的偉大冒險故事以及希伯來聖經傳統中的聖哲事蹟來探索早期西方文明的兩大源頭（希臘與希伯來文化）所呈現出的主要風貌。
description.en: The main features of two great sources of early western civilizations, that is (1) Greek mythology and tragedies, and (2) Hebrew Biblical tradition, will be introduced to the students in the most exciting stories about Greek heroes and heroines as well as Biblical figures and events.

description.zh: 本課程精選有關教育與文化之文章，引導學生從閱讀中印證，比較各種文化和教育現象，並鼓勵學生從各種不同角度蒐集資料，俾使課堂討論呈現時代性與多元化的觀點。
description.en: This course is intended to help students develop their English proficiency through readings and discussions on discourses of education and culture.  Students are encouraged to react to the experiences described, relate them to their own lives and express their feelings and thoughts through interactive speaking activities.

description.zh: 當代英美流行小說,例如:帶珍珠耳環的少女,時空旅人之妻,姊姊的守護者,暮光之城系列等等,主題推陳出新,內容扣人心弦,有的反應當前的文化議題,有的表現出創新的文學想像,在在都激發著同學們閱讀原文小說的興趣.又由於小說的書寫語言為當今英語世界所使用,沒有年代隔閡,所以原文流行小說也是優良的英語學習材料.在字彙,片語,句型,段落及文章結構,到故事情節發展與深入探討主題的每個層面上,都提供了豐富的素材,供同學們學習觀摩.因此,本課程將挑選不同類型之時下英美流行小說四本,每月一本,規劃進度,在課堂上進行導讀與討論,並加強字彙,句型,與文章結構上的分析,幫助同學們在英語書寫,閱讀技巧,跨文化了解與思辨能力上,獲得最大的進步!
description.en: Contemporary popular novels originally written in English, such as the Girl with a Pearl Earring, the Time Traveler's Wife, and the Twilight, have a strong appeal to readers worldwide, but non-native English speakers often enjoy these works in translated versions or film adaptations.  To encourage our students to read these popular English novels in the original language, the instructor will choose four novels of various subject matters and use them as effective teaching materials in the classroom. The objectives are (1) to enrich students' cultural background knowledge of the English speaking world today, (2) to cultivate students' life-long reading habit of keeping up contemporary materials, and (3) to strengthen their critical thinking as well as language skills, especially reading and writing, through line-by-line close readings in the context and guided discussions on the narrative structures of the whole fiction.

name.zh: 研究方法-應用語言學(一)

description.zh: 本門課之目的是讓學生熟悉研究方法設計。主題涵蓋研究計劃之準備及撰擬 ;主要研究方法，如調查研究法、相關研究法、實驗研究法、個案研究法、人種誌研究法，行動研究法，觀察研究法和內容分析研究法；質性和量化資料之搜集與分析；敘述統計和推論統計。
description.en: This course familiarizes students with the procedures of research in education and applied linguistics. Topics will include the nature and process of research; survey research; experimental research; correlational research; case study; grounded theory research; ethnographic research; narrative research; action research; data collection and data analysis; descriptive statistics; and sampling and inferential statistics.

name.zh: 研究方法--文化研究應用(一)
name.en: Research Methods in Applied Cultural Studies

description.zh: 「研究成果具有足以影響意見和行動的力量，因此有責任感的作者會以謹慎細心的態度撰寫之」。(MLA Handbook for the Writers of Research Papers, xiv). 本課程以人文學科領域通用的MLA系統為基礎，加強學生對論文撰寫規範的認識，並經由研究過程的實踐和論文的撰寫體認學術研究的目的及價值。課程開始時學 生須選擇一較為廣泛的主題，學習如何抽絲剝繭，找出核心的問題，進一步釐清研究的重點所在，然後經過仔細研究搜尋，最後以論文報告呈現成果。透過此一過 程，學生將體認到學術研究有嚴謹明確的規範，需經過一步一步的印證，方能寫出合乎專業水準的研究論文或報告。
description.en: "Because research has the power to affect opinions and actions, responsible writers compose their work with great care." (MLA Handbook for the Writers of Research Papers, xiv). This course will define for students the rules, practices, purposes, and value of scrupulous scholarship and careful documentation in accordance with the MLA system shared by a wide community of researchers world-wide. Beginning with the selection of a general topic, moving toward a specific research question and then researching and documenting the answer to that question will be a step-by-step process with clear guidelines resulting in the student's knowledge of how to produce a paper acceptable to scholars world-wide.

description.zh: 應用語言學屬於邊緣交叉學科，與其他學科如語言學、心理學、教育學、人類學與社會學之間存在密切的關係。本課程著重在介紹第二語言與外語習得、第二語言與外語教學法、言談分析與社會語用學及社會文化學理論的研究，並探討這些領域與語言教學與學習之間的關連。本課程涵蓋各種不同觀點的理論與應用，回顧方法論的演進歷史，尤其強調現今廣受認同的方法論。
description.en: Applied linguistics is a large interdisciplinary field of study related to a range of academic fields, including linguistics, psychology, education, anthropology, and sociology. This course focuses primarily on research in the areas of second/foreign language acquisition, second/foreign language pedagogy, discourse analysis, and sociopragmatic and sociocultural theory, as well as their relevance to language teaching and learning. We will cover theories and applications from a variety of perspectives, tracing the history of methodologies with special emphasis on those currently in widespread use.

description.zh: 科學與技術是了解這個世界和我們自己一項強而有力的工具，而許多作家們對於這樣的情況也在他們的作品中給予各式各樣的回應。在這個課程中我們將學習到作家們如何在他們的作品中使用文學藝術技巧來詮釋與解讀科技與現代文學的相互作用；人類與大自然的關係；以及人類當前的處境。修習這門課程的學生並不需要具備對科學有嚴格的基礎訓練與知識，只要具備強烈的好奇心和求知慾。在課程的一開始我們將藉由閱讀相關作品讓大家熟悉一些重要的議題。課程的中心主題除了針對科學技術與文學的相互關係外，我們也將焦點放在分析文學作品上。我們將繼續探索文學形式與內容的關聯。同時，我們也將利用現代科技在課堂上練習文學作品的即興創作。學生們一開始分析一段正文的內容。然後他們利用這些片段重新組合成一篇新的文本。接著，在這些文本內建立新的超連結︰每當文本被閱讀時，讀者能有多種選擇來閱讀並且使正文成為一個完全新的實體。
description.en: Science and technology are powerful modes of knowing about the world and ourselves, and the rich and varied responses of writers to these ways of knowing. The writers whose works we'll be looking at use art to question the ways that science and technology interact with and alter our understanding of the world, human nature and the human condition. People do not need a formal background in science to enjoy and excel in this course, just a lively intellectual curiosity. A few background essays will help you understand many of the scientific concepts and attitudes we will encounter in the literature we read. While the course does have a central thematic interest in science and technology, our main focus will always be on analyzing literature and its interaction with science and technology. We will continually ask how form, or the construction of a literary work, relates to content, or the meaning of a literary work. This means our main focus will be to analyze the techniques that writers

description.zh: 在《電影》(一九二六) 一文裡，維吉尼亞o吳爾芙曾說：文學作品與其改編電影的關係，就如不幸的受害者與貪婪的掠奪者或寄生蟲之間的關係一般。電影業已經建立了一項傳統，將文學作品作為滋養其文化與美學內涵的材料來源。然而，對吳爾芙而言，這種傳統卻為電影業與文學作品帶來了災難性的結果。如她所言：「正當眼睛與大腦欲攜手合作卻徒勞無功之際，他們同時亦遭受到無情地剝離。」儘管吳爾芙也許對於文學作品與其改編電影的關係過於悲觀，然而，她的話有時聽來卻也千真萬確。在本課程裡，我們將探討改編自文學作品的電影之局限和缺點，以及其潛力和長處等問題。我們將研究，在文學作品之中得依賴讀者想像力才能生動傳達的微妙心理，電影裡的聲音與視覺效果須如何將之傳遞?文學與電影在處理象徵及思想的方法上，有何不同?還有，改編自文學作品的電影如何偏離文學原作之主題或結構，以便迎合當代觀眾之美學、心理、社會、政治、以及文化等層面的期待？本課程將研究之文學作品與改編電影將於下列作品中選出，但是不局限於下列作品：Joseph Conrad, Heart of Darkness (1899)Francis Ford Coppola, Apocalypse Now (1979)Rudyard Kipling, Kim (1901)John Howard Davie
description.en: In "The Cinema" (1926), Virginia Woolf observes that the relationship between works of literature and their film adaptations is like that between unfortunate victims and their rapacious predators or parasites. The cinema has established a tradition of feeding on works of literature as a source of cultural and aesthetic nourishment. But the results for her are "disastrous to both." As she puts it, "Eye and brain are torn asunder ruthlessly as they try vainly to work in couples." Although Woolf might have been over pessimistic about the alliance between works of literature and film adaptations, yet her words ring true at times. In this course, we will explore the limitations and shortcomings as well as the potentialities and strengths of the film adaptations of literary works. We will examine how cinematic sound and visual effects convey psychological subtleties, whose rendition in literature relies heavily on words that come alive only in our imagination; how symbols and thoughts are tr

description.zh: 本課程著重分析中英文之句型, 語法, 慣用語等表達方式及比較其異同之處,並以密集練習及詳細解說交替, 使學生在兩種語言思考間運用自如。
description.en: This course focuses on the presentation of basic syntax, common expression, sentence structure, and an analytical comparison between the methodologies of English and Chinese translation, accompanied with frequent writing practice on students' part.

description.zh: 本課程旨在強化學生口語表達及溝通能力，開拓知識領域以及培養學生的國際觀。由逐步短句，段落至長途步口譯，循序漸進。從入門訣竅如讀稿技巧，筆記要領密集訓練及模擬演練。範圍涵蓋經貿，金融，時事，科技，產業等。
description.en: This course aims to strengthen students' oral expression and communicative abilities in English, broaden knowledge and international views. The course is designed to train the students gradually by using the techniques of Consecutive Interpretation, which starts from short sentences and paragraphs and leads to longer passages. For example, the techniques in sight translation, note-taking and various simulation drills are intensely practiced in class. It ranges from commercial & trade, banking affairs, current events, technologies and production.

name.en: Skills and Practicum of Escorting English

description.zh: 本課程提供在各種場合中口譯的應用。如伴隨工廠參觀，出席展覽會場，開幕演說，及外賓接待，採取密集的口語演練，並訓練隨行解說的技巧。
description.en: This course provides an application of Interpretation for different occasions. These situations include a factory visit, an exhibition presentation, an opening address, a foreign-visitors reception and a banquet attendance. This course aims to build up the techniques and cultivation of Escort Interpretation through intensive oral training.

description.zh: 研讀戲劇作品，注重作品所反映的人文與社會環境的互動。上課方式以評析和討論為主，以加強口語表達能力及文學賞析能力，並以戲劇演練提升語言學習效果。
description.en: This course is intended to acquaint students with western plays which focus on the interaction between culture and society.  In addition to developing students' speaking ability through discussion, particular attention is given to the appreciation of literature.  Students are encouraged to perform some of the plays to enhance their proficiency in language and their interest in literature.

description.zh: 本校體育課程目標為鍛鍊健全身心、促進身心健全發展、培養運動道德、發揚團隊精神及養成終身運動習慣。四技一年級實施普通班體育正課教學。四技二、三年級實施專項分組教學，由具有專長之教師授課。開課項目：籃球、排球、桌球、羽球、保齡球、射箭、高爾夫球、網球、體操遊戲、慢速壘球、太極拳、國際標準舞、體適能、國術。學生得按自己興趣選擇修習。本校體育課程目標為鍛鍊健全身心、促進身心健全發展、培養運動道德、發揚團隊精神及養成終身運動習慣。四技一年級實施普通班體育正課教學。四技二、三年級實施專項分組教學，由具有專長之教師授課。開課項目：籃球、排球、桌球、羽球、保齡球、射箭、高爾夫球、網球、體操遊戲、慢速壘球、太極拳、國際標準舞、體適能、國術。學生得按自己興趣選擇修習。
description.en: All students are required to attend two hours per week of Physical Education class. This requirement applies to Freshman Sophomore and Junior students while it is an elective for senior students.  For Freshman level, Classes focus on basic physical strength training.  For Sophomore and Junior students, classes are interest-oriented, thus giving students the opportunity to select specific activities they are interested in.  Choices include Basketball, Volleyball, Table Tennis, Badminton, Bowling, Archery, Golf, Tennis, Gymnastics, Slow pitch, Tai Chi Chuan, Ballroom Dancing, Physical Fitness and martial arts, to mention a few.

name.en: Elective Curriculum of Liberal Arts Education

description.zh: 為了訓練學生獨立思考與判斷能力，培養健全人格，提升人文涵養，延續通識教育六大向度的核心課程，在各向度均規劃了一系列的博雅選修課程，提供學生更多的選擇，以建立學生開闊的視野及達成全人教育的精神。
description.en: To train students have the abilities of independent thinking and judgment, develop the healthy personality and Humanities conservation, and keep the six fields of core curriculum in general education. this course will design a series of optional curriculum on Erudition & Refinement in each field, and develop students the broader sight and reach the spirit of the holistic education.

name.en: Elective Curriculum of Liberal Arts Education

description.zh: 為了訓練學生獨立思考與判斷能力，培養健全人格，提升人文涵養，延續通識教育六大向度的核心課程，在各向度均規劃了一系列的博雅選修課程，提供學生更多的選擇，以建立學生開闊的視野及達成全人教育的精神。
description.en: To train students have the abilities of independent thinking and judgment, develop the healthy personality and Humanities conservation, and keep the six fields of core curriculum in general education. this course will design a series of optional curriculum on Erudition & Refinement in each field, and develop students the broader sight and reach the spirit of the holistic education.

description.zh: 本課程主要在培養各類型段落、短文的撰寫能力，包括描寫、敘述、說明及議論性質文章。
description.en: This course is intended for university-level EFL writing students with the aim of increasing their fluency in English writing. To achieve this goal, students in this course will have ample opportunities to write varying types of English paragraphs, for instance, paragraphs of definition and paragraphs focusing on cause and effect relationships. In addition, they will have plenty of opportunities to write various kinds of short English essays, including descriptions, narratives, and argumentative writings.

name.en: Reading and Discussions on Global Affairs

description.zh: 本課程旨在幫助學生經由閱讀與討論以了解全球共同面對的課題，包括：全球化的趨勢、文化衝突與恐怖主義、全球貧富差距、環境保護問題、基因工程所衍生的倫理道德問題等等。
description.en: Through reading and discussions, the students are guided to understand some of the most important issues that have affected the present world and its future.  These topics include globalization in world economy, health care problems, environmental protection, racial conflicts, and genetic engineering.

description.zh: 本課程旨在訓練學生公開表達之能力，內容包括語言表達基本原則與技巧、肢體語言與演講要領，備題演講及即席演講演練。
description.en: This course is designed to enable students to develop the principles and skills necessary for public speaking. Included will be guidelines for giving a speech and displaying body language, and practices for prepared speech and impromptu speech.

description.zh: 本課程介紹研究方法和論文寫作知識，期能培養學生獨立研究和撰寫學術報告、論文的基本能力。主要分為三部份：（一）研究內涵與步驟,（二）主要的研究方法,（三）如何撰寫英文論文及報告。涵蓋主題包括：運用圖書館資源選擇研究主題、研究計劃的撰寫、問卷調查法、訪問法、觀察法、田野工作研究方法、文獻資料分析法（內容分析法）、個案研究法、相關研究法、實驗法、文學研究法，研究報告論文格式與寫作要領，如何撰寫文獻探討，參考書目寫法等。
description.en: This course aims at providing students with the fundamental knowledge and competence that they will need in doing research and writing research papers.  Its main purpose is to familiarize students with methods, procedures, and techniques that are applicable to quantitative and qualitative research as well as to improve their ability to write research papers.  The main topics for instruction include: the research process; major research methods; and the structure of a research paper.  The research methods primarily studied include the experimental method, descriptive research, ethnography, case study, observation, survey research (questionnaire and interviews), content analysis/documentary analysis, and critical approaches to literature.

name.en: World Literatures and Cultures in English

description.zh: 本課程旨在藉由各種文化媒體（如文學作品，書報雜誌，期刊論文，電影等影音文字）引導學生選擇性地認識英國、愛爾蘭、美國、加拿大、非洲、澳洲、紐西蘭、印度、巴基斯坦、新加坡、香港、菲律賓、加勒比海等國家或地區的文學與文化。藉由認識上述這些國家或地區的英語文學與文化，擴展學生英語文應用的宏觀視野，並使之具備促進異國情感及文化交流的能力。
description.en: This course aims to introduce students to the selected literatures and cultures of English-speaking countries and areas such as England, Ireland, the United States, Canada, Anglophone Africa, Australia, New Zealand, India, Pakistan, Singapore, Hong Kong, the Philippines, and the Caribbean. In this course, world literatures in English, together with various cultural media (including newspaper, magazine and journal articles as well as Internet materials and films), will be examined to introduce students to Anglophone literatures and cultures. Students are expected to acquire via this course a nuanced, discriminating literary and cultural competency. With this cross-cultural literacy, they could help promote international understanding and global cultural exchange.

description.zh: 以對流行事物，如電影，音樂，廣告，服裝，電視，通俗小說等，在當代文化思潮中的影響，及其所扮演角色探討為經，並對於英語在各範疇中展現之語彙，修辭，語法，技巧之賞析為緯，引領學生進入一個交織著現代語文與現代意涵的世界。
description.en: This course aims at giving an approach to the study of television, popular music, popular literature such as magazines and best sellers, fashion and movies, as well as an examination into the influence of all aspects of our daily lives on our basic beliefs and values. It involves the use of methodologies from both the humanities and the social sciences in the effort to interpret expressive cultural forms. Students are encouraged to participate in discussion over selected topics from contemporary issues.

description.zh: 本課程使學生具有進階日語能力，並加強會話及閱讀能力訓練。
description.en: The focus of this course is to enable students to enhance their Japanese abilities and to strengthen the training or drilling of conversation and reading comprehension of the Japanese language.

description.zh: 本課程使學生具有進階法語能力，並加強會話及閱讀能力訓練。
description.en: The focus of this course is to enable students to enhance their French abilities and to strengthen the training or drilling of conversation and reading comprehension of the French language.

description.zh: 本課程使學生具有進階西班牙語能力，並加強會話及閱讀能力訓練。
description.en: The focus of this course is enable students to enhance their Spanish abilities and to strengthen the training or drilling of conversation and reading comprehension of the Spanish language.

description.zh: 專題報告、專題演講、研究小組討論
description.en: Case Study, Seminar, Group Meeting.

description.zh: 先修課程：負責教授同意。1.超音波技術簡介2.基礎彈性力學3.彈性動力學4.平面波5.平面波的反射6.平面波的折射7.表面波8.藍姆波(平板波)9.超音波於非破壞檢測之應用10.超音波於材料性質量測之應用11.超音波於醫學診斷與治療之應用12.超音波於感測器及通訊應用之應用13.超音波於加工應用之應用
description.en: 1.Introduction to ultrasonics 2.Basic elasticity for ultrasonics 3.Elastodynamics 4.Plane waves 5.Reflection of plane waves 6.Refraction of plane waves 7.Surface waves 8.Lamb waves 9.Ultrasonics in nondestructive testing  10.Application of ultrasonics to material characterizations 11.Application of ultrasonics in medical diagnostics and treatments 12.Application of ultrasonics to sensors and telecommunications 13.Application of ultrasonics to machining

description.zh: 簡介﹙廣義的逆向工程系統、狹義的逆向工程系統﹚，數位擷取設備﹙接觸式探頭、非接觸式探頭﹚，曲面模型﹙電腦圖學簡史、3D電腦繪圖、Bezier曲線、NURBS曲線曲面﹚，逆向工程軟體之功能，電腦輔助檢驗，軟硬體整合與實作。
description.en: Introduction, Digitizing Devices (Tactile Probes, Non-contact Probes), Surface Modeling (Computer Graphics, 3D Rendering, Bezier Curve, NURBS Surface),Curve and Surface Editing, Computer Aided Verification.

description.zh: 全球化製造體系的形成，使得合約製造商必須以更積極的態度，從策略面出發，藉由各種電腦與網路的技術，整合內部與外部的流程與資訊，打造數位化工廠。數位化製造的目的，是希望藉由資訊透明化，提升整個製造體系的競爭優勢。課程的設計，是以概念介紹的方式，說明數位製造的應用現況與相關技術。本課程的內容包括：數位化製造概論、數位化製造實例說明、商業模型分析、知識管理、企業知識入口網站、產品資料管理、交易系統、資料倉儲、企業資訊入口網站、工作流程管理、最新數位化相關技術介紹。
description.en: Globalization has lead contract manufactures more active on seeking new strategies to survive. To increase competition, new technologies, such as computer and network technology, have applied. Computer and network technology can integrate internal and external information to establish a so-called "e-factory." This course covers different issues related to e-Manufacturing, such as Concept of e-Manufacturing, Case Study, Business Model Analysis, Knowledge Management, Enterprise Knowledge Portal (EKP), Product Data Management (PDM), Concept of Trading Systems, Concept of Data Warehousing, Enterprise Information Portal (EIP), Workflow Management, State of the Art Technologies, etc.

name.zh: 高等材料性質學與實習
name.en: Advanced Properties of Materials and Related Practice

description.zh: 本課程將深入的討論材料之光電及表面性質，並經由實習實驗量測各種相關特性。尤其是在材料電子理論的應用方面。所涵蓋的主題包括有：電子理論、光學特性、繞射理論、表面科學、以及材料之磁性與熱力學性質。
description.en: After successfully completing this subject a student should be able to: (i) explain the fundamental aspects of electrical properties of materials, (ii) describe and understand energy method, (iii) describe and discuss nanoscale properties of materials, (iv) apply advanced properties of materials to engineering design problems, and (v) execute related measurements.

description.zh: 本課程主要介紹奈米結構材料之合成及其製程技術。內容大綱包括三部分：第一、奈米材料基本物理與化學特性，第二、奈米粉末和薄膜結構材料之化學合成，物理合成製程原理與特性，奈米塊體材料的性能與製備，第三、奈米結構材料應用。
description.en: This course is divided into three sections. The first four chapters deal with those chapters which are the principles of nanostructured Material. The next two chapters describe the engineering options currently available for the synthesis, processing and fabrication of nanostructured materials. The last two chapters deal with different application of nanostructured materials.

description.zh: 本校體育課程目標為鍛鍊健全身心、促進身心健全發展、培養運動道德、發揚團隊精神及養成終身運動習慣。四技一年級實施普通班體育正課教學。四技二、三年級實施專項分組教學，由具有專長之教師授課。開課項目：籃球、排球、桌球、羽球、保齡球、射箭、高爾夫球、網球、體操遊戲、慢速壘球、太極拳、國際標準舞、體適能、國術。學生得按自己興趣選擇修習。本校體育課程目標為鍛鍊健全身心、促進身心健全發展、培養運動道德、發揚團隊精神及養成終身運動習慣。四技一年級實施普通班體育正課教學。四技二、三年級實施專項分組教學，由具有專長之教師授課。開課項目：籃球、排球、桌球、羽球、保齡球、射箭、高爾夫球、網球、體操遊戲、慢速壘球、太極拳、國際標準舞、體適能、國術。學生得按自己興趣選擇修習。
description.en: All students are required to attend two hours per week of Physical Education class. This requirement applies to Freshman Sophomore and Junior students while it is an elective for senior students.  For Freshman level, Classes focus on basic physical strength training.  For Sophomore and Junior students, classes are interest-oriented, thus giving students the opportunity to select specific activities they are interested in.  Choices include Basketball, Volleyball, Table Tennis, Badminton, Bowling, Archery, Golf, Tennis, Gymnastics, Slow pitch, Tai Chi Chuan, Ballroom Dancing, Physical Fitness and martial arts, to mention a few.

description.zh: 課程重點：(1)藉由適合其程度的教材加強學生必備的基礎文法觀念和句型結構；(2)使學生確切把握閱讀要領以及充分瞭解寫作的各種技巧，重心在生字、片語、句法的解釋和基本寫作技巧的分析；(3)熟悉英語人士日常生活情境及與學生將來就業環境相關之會話及適當之應對方式；(4)透過練習加強聽、說、讀、寫的知能及表達。
description.en: This course is designed (1) to strengthen students' previously required knowledge in English with basic grammatical ideas and sentence patterns reviewed through reading materials appropriate to their levels; (2) to develop reading skill by giving explanation of difficult words, phrases, and syntax, as well as analysis of basic writing skill; (3)to  familiarize students with useful expressions in conversation and build up their confidence in cross-cultural communication; (4)to reinforce the competence and performance of listening, speaking, reading and writing by practice.

name.en: First step to achieving the goals of universities

description.zh: 大學入門是針對大一新生所開授之全校性課程。用以協助學生:(一)認識高等教育的理念、目的與價值(二)有效學習(三)涵養正視困境並妥適因應能力。藉以實踐自我鍛鍊，自我掌握，自我經營並建構宏觀視界的高等教育宗旨。
description.en: "First step to achieving the goals of universities" is a campus-wide course provided for all of the first-year students at this school. The course is designed to help first-year students to achieve the following aims and objectives:(1) understanding the basic idea, goals, and fundamental value of higher education at college level;(2) learning proper study attitudes and methods effectively;(3) cultivating the required abilities and skills of responding appropriately to setbacks and difficult situations in order to acquire self-knowledge, self-control, and self-management, so that they may construct the knowledge and imagination that are needed in planning for grand visions of achieving the goals of higher education.

description.zh: 本課程目標乃是協助學生透過有意義之社區服務活動，認識服務學習理念，從服務學習中體驗服務的意義，深化學習的領域、擴大自己的生活範疇與生命歷練。課程內容：包含三大類（一）志願服務基礎課程：選取志願服務相關主題，由授課教師於課堂上講述。可包含服務學習理論、內政部志願服務法所訂定之六大主題（志願服務的內涵、志願服務倫理、自我了解及自我肯定、志願服務經驗分享、志願服務法規之認識、志願服務發展趨勢），或非營利組織、服務機構之介紹等等。（二）社區服務：選擇服務機構前往服務，於本學期內完成授課教師所規定服務時數或內容。（三）課堂討論與反思：學生必須進行服務經驗分享與討論，並撰寫與繳交服務日誌、心得報告。
description.en: This course is geared to expand and intensify students' learning beyond classroom by introducing service learning as an integral part of holistic life learning experience. Apart from class work, students will be able to not only understand the significance of services and experience the true value of such learning through various forms of community work. The course is designed to deepen their learning and life experience.I. Core curricula of services: The course is structured on the framework of six themes in service learning by theory and practice as well as legal regulations regarding community services enacted by the Ministry of the Interior. The six themes respectively are: significance of service; standards of service; self-comprehension and affirmation; sharing service experience; service law and trends; and non-profit and service organizations.II. Community service: Students select or be arranged to service organizations and are responsible for completing service assignments

description.zh: 國文，是運用本國語言文字，蘊釀於欣賞文藝作品，充實文化內涵，增進思維能力與人文素養的一門課程。本課程分為大一上學期2學分，大一下學期2學分。大一上學期的授課內容，以文學名篇為範圍；希望藉此擴建學生深入品味文學趣味的能力，鍛鍊靈活的語文敏感度，默契文學創意，甚而嘗試創作。大一下學期的授課內容，以思想名篇為範圍；希望藉此啟發學生透轍分析各家學說思想，漫步哲人的宇宙天地，跟隨哲人的心路歷程，進而念茲在茲，從容內化，共饗取之不盡用之不竭的先驗與風範。
description.en: "Chinese" is the course where we make full use of our native languages to enjoy literary works, to enrich our cultural taste, to develop our thinking and even to elevate human cultivation.This four-credit course is set for the freshman students: with 2 credits in each of the two semesters of the school year. In the first semester, the course covers important articles in literature, in the hope for the student learners to cultivate better ability to taste literary works when they have more vivid sense on the language. With fuller knowledge on what literature is about, they are expected to try creative writings. For the second semester, the course is mainly focused on the writings on thoughts. It is our expectation that throughout the reading and analysis of various great schools of philosophy, the student learners are given the opportunity to explore the huge minds of philosophers, who will thus be imitated and followed. Through the internalization, the students might benefit themse

description.zh: 介紹會計學之基本觀念， 會計循環 - 包括分錄、過帳、試算、結算及財務報表之編製。逐一說明財務報表各個項目，最後並介紹財務報表之分析。修畢本課程之後能瞭解會計學之基本原理，會計資料處理及財務報表產生之整個過程，以及簡單之財務報表分析技術，並為未來之企業及財務相關課程打下良好基礎。
description.en: This course introduces the basic concepts of accounting. All the necessary processes are included as well the financial report analysis. After being taking this course, the student can understand the accounting concepts, accounting data process, generation of accounting report and techniques for analyzing the financial report.

description.zh: 本課程的重點在於闡述管理學之基本概念，主要的內容涵蓋四個領域：(1)瞭解管理學之理論與相關學者之研究報告；(2) 討論企業界管理應用實務案例；(3) 探討多國化管理之趨勢與差異及(4) 如何落實管理理論研討與趨勢。另外一有管理相關功能實務應用之討論與介紹。
description.en: The purpose of Management has four distinct objectives:(1) to introduce a new management paradigm；(2) to effectively combine the basic concepts of management and organizational behavior into a single volume, including the management functional and departmental descriptions；(3) to discuss business management applications in practice and (4) to effectively implement the management basic ideas. The planning, organization, decision, leadership and monitoring among variety culture will be covered and discussed in the class as well.

description.zh: 學習基本觀念及經濟理論及應用經濟學解決新問題及分析新議題，以新方法解答新議題及新方式表達新想法及舊議題。1.供給、需求及市場均衡。2.消費者及生產者的行為。3.市場結構。4.總體經濟議題。5.國內生產毛額及經濟成長。6.銀行體系。7.總體經濟政策。8.國際貿易及國際金融。
description.en: To learn basic concepts and theories of Economics. To apply economics to solve new problems and analyze new issues, ask new issues, formulate new ideas, and view old issues, in new ways.1.Supply, demand, and market equilibrium.2.Consumer's behaviors and producer's behaviors.3.Market structures.4.Macroeconomic issues.5.GDP and economic growth.6.Banking system.7.Macroeconomic policies.8.International trade and international finance.

description.zh: 本課程包含：計算機硬體結構、計算機作業系統、計算機軟體系統、程式語言、基本程式設計與應用、資料處理、檔案管理、資料庫管理系統、應用套裝軟體、資料通訊與網路等。
description.en: This course consists of: computer hardware structure, computer operation systems, computer software systems, programming languages, basic programming language and applications, data process, file management, database management systems, application package, and data communication and network etc.

description.zh: 本課程希望在一學年中，能使學生對微分及積分有充分的瞭解、培養邏輯推理、啟發思考創造、強化計算演繹並注重應用與作圖，以建立同學未來學習工程數學及相關專業課程之數學基礎，充分達到學以致用的目的。課程內容包括：1.極限與連續，2.導數及其應用，3.不定積分與定積分，4.超越函數及其反函數，5.積分法則，6.不定型與瑕積分，7.定積分的應用，8.空間幾何與向量微積分，9.偏導數，10.重積分。
description.en: This course aims at developing comprehension of Derivation and Integral、activating capabilities of Logic Inference and Induction、enlightening confidence and independence、strengthening calculating abilities with an emphasis on its application and diagram、furnishing a sound basis for future specialty. The content includes: 1.Limits and Continuity, 2.Derivative and Application, 3.Indefinite and Definite Integral, 4.Transcendental Functions and their Inverses, 5.Techniques of Integration, 6.Indeterminate Forms and Improper Integral, 7.Application of Integration, 8.Basic Vector Analysis, 9.Partial Derivative, 10.Multiple Integration.

description.zh: 主要介紹WORD及EXCEL商業應用軟體的面貌。因為WORD及EXCEL皆是集實用性及教育性於一身的整合性軟體，包括文書處理、資料庫、試算表、圖表等功能。同學專精這兩個軟體後，可嘗試完成各種商業實務的應用，而且也可以為學習更精深的專業軟體建立基礎。
description.en: This course mainly talks about the business application software-WORD and EXCEL. Since WORD and EXCEL are practical and educational software, the course would be very useful and helpful for the participants' future careers. After learning the software, the students can try to carry out business applications and do further study of advanced software.

name.en: Elective Curriculum of Liberal Arts Education

description.zh: 為了訓練學生獨立思考與判斷能力，培養健全人格，提升人文涵養，延續通識教育六大向度的核心課程，在各向度均規劃了一系列的博雅選修課程，提供學生更多的選擇，以建立學生開闊的視野及達成全人教育的精神。
description.en: To train students have the abilities of independent thinking and judgment, develop the healthy personality and Humanities conservation, and keep the six fields of core curriculum in general education. this course will design a series of optional curriculum on Erudition & Refinement in each field, and develop students the broader sight and reach the spirit of the holistic education.

description.zh: 本課程在使學生瞭解策略管理的意義及其演進, 如何建立公司策略以增加之競爭力。課程主要內容包括：1.策略管理的意義, 2.企業內外在環境分析, 3.策略制定, 4.策略執行與評估, 5.事業階層策略, 6.公司策略, 7.購併。
description.en: The objective of the course is to establish a set of frameworks for the formulation and implementation of strategy. Topics of the course include SWOT, strategy formulation, strategy implementation, business-level strategy, corporate-level strategy, and merger & acquisition.

description.zh: 本課程適用於一般大專之決策分析課程。其目的在說明決策理論之基本觀念，及其在真實世界裡相關決策問題之分析。本課程授課主題包括：不考慮機率之決策問題、與機率有關之決策問題、獲取額外資訊之決策分析、效益分析、遊戲理論。相關之授課內容包括：機率分配、期望值方法、貝氏分析、完全資訊與額外資訊之期望值。
description.en: This is an undergraduate course dealing with decision-making and analysis. The objective of this course is to interpret the basic Concepts of decision theory and its applications on some real world decision analysis problems. The main topics of this course include decision making without probability, decision making with probability, decision analysis with additional information, utility theory, game theory. The related studies includes probability distribution, expected value approach, Bayesian analysis, expected value of perfect information and sample information

description.zh: 建立學生對各類顧客關係管理相關議題之基礎理論架構觀念，奠定學生日後從事顧客關係管理分析研究工作時之需。課程中將以個案實例為主，並配合各種資料探勘套裝軟體，以應用的觀點使學生更容易接受了解線上分析、資料倉儲與資料探勘分析的功用。
description.en: This course includes the fundamental theory of data mining techniques and the various applications in different enterprises. These techniques will include classification, association rule, forecasting, pattern recognition, etc.

description.zh: 從企業CEO或經理人的觀點來操研討論國際商務談判的有關問題，旨在提供學生對國際性談判認識的了解，並熟悉談判的實務運用。課程重心涵蓋談判的本質與觀念性架構，談判的理論與模型，談判的規劃、執行與控制，談判的策略與技能。上課方式操研討論為主，並操分組報告與討論。
description.en: The viewpoint of business manager and CEO focus into the issues of International Negotiation. The objectives of this course are to provide understanding some of the core concepts of the negotiation and to acquaint application approach of the practice. The negotiation topics cover: (1) nature, conceptual, framework, theory and model and (2) to analyze, plan, strategy, tactics, and implement successful negotiation. This can povide groups discussion and improve speaking skills.

description.zh: 本課程從全球化觀念來探討品牌在公司經營中所應扮演的策略性角色，課程中以全新研究的品牌理論來探討全球品牌的重要關鍵議題，其中包括全球品牌與公司策略的關係與整合、整合品牌概念、新經濟時代的品牌觀念與全球營運模式、整合品牌的執行與評估。
description.en: This program is designed to help students learn about and apply the concepts and practices of global branding as they are used in a wide variety of settings in product and service firms, consumer and business markets, profits and non-profit organizations, domestic and global companies, and small and large business. Global Branding Management builds on Global branding Strategy, focusing on the major tactics and tools used by international marketers in managing their global marketing plans.
