description.zh: 先修課程：普通物理、工程數學。 從黑體輻射之頻譜分析開始，引入量子化的概念；進而推出物質與波動之二象性。經由波爾之半古典的氫原子模型，結合量子化的概念以解釋原子結構，並引入薛丁格方程式所求得之波函數與電子之空間機率的關係。再由原子進而推廣至分子及固態物理之能帶理論，應用能帶理論於解釋固態晶體之光、電及熱學等特性，並介紹半導體之應用的基本原理。
description.en: From the analysis of the spectrum of black-body radiation, the concept of quantization is introduced and the duality of matter and wave is also introduced. Combining the idea of quantization and the semi-classical hydrogen model of Bohr, the structure of atom is described. Solving the Schrodinger equation, the deduced wave function is related to the probability of finding the electron in space. The concept of atom is expanded to the molecular and the energy band theory of solid state physics. The energy band theory of solid state physics is applied to account the optical, electrical, and thermal properties of solid states, also the fundamental principles of semiconductors are introduced.

description.zh: 線性電路；電算放大器；二極體；非線性電路應用；接面場效電晶體（JFET）；金屬氧化物半導體場效電晶體(MOSFET) ；雙極性接面電晶體（BJT）；差動放大器；多級放大器。金氧半電晶體；雙接面電晶體；差動及多極放大器；功率放大器；頻率響應；回授；類比積體電路；濾波器；調諧放大器
description.en: frequency response,feedback and stability,differential and multistage amplifier,operational amplifier,analog integrated circuits.

description.zh: 基本儀器介紹；電子零件之認識；二極體電路（特性）；運算放大器；電晶體電路（特性）；A/D ，D/A 轉換器；類比乘法器。運算放大器應用；線性電壓調整器；電壓參考及電流源；電壓比較器；電壓控制振盪器；鎖相迴路；頻率－電壓轉換器；類比－數位轉換器；數位－類比轉換器；特殊裝置語言合成電路。
description.en: instrumentation, passive component,diode,transistor, operational amplifier,voltage regulator,voltage reference & current source, A/D & D/A converters,voltage controlled oscillator,PLL.

description.zh: 本課程介雷射之基本特性及雷射光在光學上的應用，內容包括雷射之時間與空間特性、雷射之模態、干涉、繞射、偏振及透鏡之各種像差等實驗。
description.en: This course introduces the fundamental characteristics of lasers and the applications of lasers in optics. It includes the experiments of the temporal and spatial characteristics of lasers, the mode distribution of lasers, interference, diffraction, and the abberations of lenses.

description.zh: (1)生醫與光學基礎(2)電子膠囊、內視鏡 (3)顯微鏡相關 (4)光學單離 (5)光學嵌住 (6)雷射美容治療相關 (7)光譜分析 (8)光動力治療、光觸媒法 (9)光學斷層掃描 (10)表面電漿子技術 (11)螢光光電檢測 (12)生物晶片(13)放射線影像
description.en: (1) Basics of bio-optics (2) Optical measurement in Medical engineering(3) Microscopy (4) Micro and nano technology in Laser capture microdissection (5) Laser trapping (6) Laser and skin effects(7) Spectral technology (8) Photodynamic Therapy(PDT) and Photodynamic diagnosis(PDD) (9)Optical Coherence tomography(10) Surface plasmons (11) Fluorescence sensing technology, spectroscopy and pharmacy analysis (12) Biochip Technology(13) Bio-imaging

description.zh: 邀請校內外學者專家至校針對某一專長領域進行專題演講，讓學生藉由聽講及心得報告之寫作，開展視野，並與時代之脈動相契合。
description.en: Invited speakers from different disciplines give speech in their specialized area. Thus students can broaden their eyesight and also keep updating the technology and its applications of the generation.

description.zh: 本課程將有系統的介紹專業英文論文的寫作格式，以及文件編修的技巧，且用深入淺出的例子作為示範，並輔以實際寫作練習與錯誤訂正。學員學習研究論文組織寫作﹐包含修改本身論文結構之基本技巧﹐正確組織文章的各個片段﹐避免口語用字寫字的陋習﹐使所作之文章能掌握其涵意﹐亦即能更有效率的利用英文寫出科技論文之佳作。
description.en: The goal of English Thesis Writing is to help students developing the writing skills through the manipulation of scientific and technical data. Students will learn a variety of rhetorical principles that guide the writing process, apply these principles to scientific and technical writing, and write papers in their own academic fields. Lectures on the writing principle, students' presentations on the reading sections and follow-up activities, pair and individual work on writing practice will be the major activities in the class.

description.zh: 本課程將涵蓋以下幾項範圍：染色体結構,DNA複製與轉錄,蛋白質結構、功能、輸送、合成與分解、真核與原核細胞基因調控、分子發育學、跳躍基因、癌症與免疫生物學等。並引導學生探討幾個相關分子生物化學較深入的知識。包括:蛋白質接受器、生物膜、生物代謝和基因調控、人類疾病的生物化學及分子生物和生物技術。
description.en: Lectures are concerned with number of selected topics in molecular biochemistry.: structure and coding capacity of DNA chromosomes; DNA replication; transcription, protein synthesis; protein structure and function; protein transport; protein degradation; receptors; biological membranes; prokaryotic and eukaryotic regulation; metabolic and genetic regulation; transposable elements and genetic engineering; cancer and immunobiology, biochemistry of human diseases and the techniques that underpin the developments of molecular biology and biotechnology.

description.zh: 此課程包含幾大方向： 1.	醫工簡介 2.	常用之醫學材料 甲、	金屬 乙、	高分子 丙、	陶瓷 3.	奈米技術 4.	材料測試 甲、	物理/機械測試 乙、	細胞測試
description.en: The content of the lecture includes:1.Introduction to biomedical engineering2.commonly used medical materials: metals, polymers, ceramic3.nano-technology4.materials testing: physical/mechanical tests,iocompatibility tests

description.zh: 每週三小時一學分的專業必修課，旨在教導碩一新生學習各種生化工程相關的實驗原理與操作技術，以增進學生在未來進行生化實驗研究的知識與技巧；此外，課程中安排工廠參觀實習，結合學術與產業，豐富學生視野，促進學生對產業界的瞭解。
description.en: The three-hour per week course is designed to teach the 1st year graduate students a variety of biochemical engineering principles and hands-on skills to strengthen their knowledge and skills of the field; The course comes with 1-2 visits to industrial plants to further enrich the students' understanding of the industrial process.

description.zh: 本課程是介紹基因工程學之基礎知識。內容包括寄主細胞的選擇：細菌、酵母菌、真菌等微生物或昆蟲細胞、哺乳類動物細胞等動物細胞或者是植物細胞。聚合連鎖反應、基因轉殖、質體轉型、病毒轉換、基因槍等常用的基因工程學之方法。
description.en: This course is to introduce basic knowledge of genetic engineering, including the selection of host cells, bacterial, yeast, fungi, insect cell, mammalian cell, or plant cell. The powerful methods of genetic engineering, including polymerase chain reaction (PCR), gene clone, plasmid transformation, virus transduction, and biolistics are also introduced in this course.

name.zh: 生物科技產品品質安全與管理法規
name.en: The Introduction to Quality,Safety and Regulation of Biology

description.zh: 生物科技產業已是二十一世紀世界各國的重要產業，我國亦視生技產業為繼電子產業後的新興產業，然而生物科技產業與其他科技產業的差異，在於用於人體或具醫療用途的生技產品，除了品質管理外，更須考慮安全與效能，我國與世界各國對於生技產品大都以建置相當程度的法規環境，以有效的管理生技產品並確保人之安全。因此，對於生技產品特有的管理制度以及安全與效能等特殊需求若無正確的認識，將非常不利產業發展。本課程將以疫苗、血液製劑、基因工程製劑、診斷試劑、人體細胞組織產品等目前已研發成熟與正發展中的生技產品為例，從產品設計、品質與製程管制、效能與安全評估、法規環境與管理制度到我國管理方式，以深入淺出的方式做完整的介紹，此外，課程中也將針對生技產業面臨的生物安全問題及其需要的設施、生技產業的挑戰與機會等議題，進行充分的講述與討論。透過此課程，期望學生建立在生技產品品質管理、製程管制、安全評估及產品登記等方面的基本概念，以培養生技產業目前極度缺乏的製程規劃人材。
description.en: In the 21th century, the bio-technological industry has been the important industry in the world.  It is also the most emergent sunrise industry following the electronics industry in Taiwan.  The bio-technological industry is very different from the other technological industries.  The biological products intended for human therapeutic use have to face the needs of safety and efficacy except product quality.  Taiwan government and other countries have established the regulatory framework for biological products to ensure their safety and efficacy.  Therefore, the realization of the management system for biological products is very useful to industry development.This course uses the examples of vaccines, blood products,  recombinant DNA products, diagnostic devices and human cell and tissue-based products to introduce the design control, quality control, process control, evaluation for safety and efficacy and regulatory framework in Taiwan.  The course also discusses the issues of fac

description.zh: 本課程涵蓋以下範圍：人類基因之組成、基因表達與疾病之關係、基因不穩定性與疾病之相關、家譜基因、遺傳基因特色、 癌症基因、與致病基因尋求方法介紹: 核酸雜交法、定序分析、聚合?鏈反應、體外基因誘變等.
description.en: Lectures are concerned with the following topics: Organization of the human genome, human gene expression, instability of the human genome, genes in pedigrees, genetic mapping of mendelian characters, molecular pathology, cancer genetics. The methods are used to search the possible disease-cause gene, will be introduced as following: physical and transcript mapping, nucleic acid hybridization assays, PCR, DNA sequencing and in vitro mutagenesis etc.

description.zh: 本課程說明如何利用質量及動量守恆建立可以描述速度、應力及壓力等流體系統物理量間關係之統制方程式。其內容包括：線及角動量守衡、應力張量、平滑近似理論、非穩態流動、邊界層近似法、線性穩定度理論及紊流系統。
description.en: We will learn how fundamental principles such as conservation of mass and momentum lead to equations that govern or describe the interrelationships of velocity, stress, pressure, and so on. Content includes macroscopic balance for linear and angular momentum, the stress tensor, lubrication approximation, unsteady flow、the boundary layer approximation, linear stability theory, and turbulent flows.

description.zh: 邀請校內外學者專家至校針對某一專長領域進行專題演講，讓學生藉由聽講及心得報告之寫作，開展視野，並與時代之脈動相契合。(在職專班)
description.en: Invited speakers from different disciplines give speech in their specialized area. Thus students can broaden their eyesight and also keep updating the technology and its applications of the generation.

description.zh: 本課程旨在教導學生瞭解各類化工程序模式的建立以及其求解的方法。內容包括：輸送動態方程式之建立，線性、非線性、矩陣、微分方程等之轉換及求解。
description.en: The goal of process simulation is to develop numerical analysis techniques that allow students to simulate the behavior of a chemical process. The contents involving：the development of dynamic equations of transport, the transformations and solutions of linear, nonlinear matrix, and differential equations.

name.en: Special Topics on Characteristics of Polymers

description.zh: 介紹高分子分子結構、型態學、流變學、化學性質、熱性質、機械、電學及光學等特性之分析方法及實例。
description.en: This course will cover the examples of analysis of the mechanical, thermal, electrical, optical and chemical properties, and the structure, morphology, and rheology of polymers.

description.zh: 生物電化學可以獲得更多先進的訊息，其中包括生化反應、形態學，以及物理、化學和電學等相關性質。運用相關的技術方法，例如電化學工具，可用以研究異相與均相反應，亦可獲得諸多界面間的化學活性和圖譜以利用於微裝置的發展。對生物分析而言，生物電化學感測器具有最大的再現性，並能夠成功的引用於電活性生化物種、母體材料，以及其規格上。生物電分析方法包括最先進和有用的方法，其中大部分皆建立在此領域的的基礎上。
description.en: Bioelectrochemistry can be investigated to get more and more advanced information about biochemical reaction, morphology, and physical, chemical, and electric properties. The techniques have been used in a variety of ways, for example, as an electrochemical tool to study heterogeneous and homogeneous reactions, for high-resolution imaging of the chemical reactivity and topography of various interfaces, and for microfabrication. For bioanalysis, bioelectrochemistry sensors have maximum reliability and can be successfully employed in electroactive biomaterials, matrix materials, and their size. Bioelectroanalysis include descriptions of the most advanced and successful methods, which in large part build on the fundamentals will be described.

name.zh: 太陽光電池應用與展望
name.en: Technical progress and future prospect on solar photovoltaic

description.zh: 本課程在教授學生太陽能光電科技及能源相關產業及製程技術之實務知識。課程設計將著重基礎太陽能光電科技知識的建立,首先介紹太陽能光電科技所應具備之基本知識,並教授能源材料的基本特性及原理以及目前應用概況.藉由說明太陽能電池之設計原理與效率提高準則為出發點，教導學生了解太陽能光電科技所應用到之材料基本特性及相關製作程序。本課程將由本校專任教師配合企業講師和技術實務專業教師演講,透過實例之講解及工廠參觀，引導學生了解應用領域及製造產業。期盼培育學生迅速進入太陽能光電及能源材料相關產業工作能力與競爭力。
description.en: The course is to provide the core knowledge for the development of solar energy technology. It intends to educate and train students with the fundamental theories and technical application of solar energy and solar- cell fabrication technology. The future prospect of photovoltaics will be revealed to help students understand strong demands in solar industries. The experienced industrial lectures will present the potential marketing, working principles of solar devices, and progress in commercialization of solar cells. Students will also be given the opportunities to on-site visit the solar-related industries.

notes: 四化四甲乙丙和化工所合開

description.zh: 本課程將簡介醫學基礎與臨床知識，並對目前臨床使用之生醫材料作廣泛的介紹，與現今生物科技相結合，激發學生對於基礎研究及臨床科學的創意與思考。涵蓋科別將以牙科、骨科及整型外科為主。
description.en: This course will introduce basic medical and clinical knowledge. Those biomaterials that have been clinically applied will be focused. The aim is to inspire students' innovation and thinking about clinical science, through combining concepts of biotechnology with biomedical knowledge. Dentistry and orthopedics will be the major departments summarized.

description.zh: 專題報告、專題演講、研究小組討論。
description.en: Case Study. Seminar. Group meeting.

description.zh: 本課程主要介紹薄膜製作有關的基礎理論與技術。講述內容包括真空技術，薄膜基礎，薄膜製作技術，蝕刻技術，薄膜評估方法以及薄膜技術的應用等。讓學生認識薄膜在高科技產業上的應用與其重要性，製作薄膜的方法與技術以及其未來的發展。
description.en: This course is a special topics of Thin films technology and Thin film materials science. 2. Vacuum science and technology 3. Thin film evaporation processes 4. Discharge, plasma, and ion-surface interaction 5. Plasma and ion beam processing of thin films 6. Chemical vapor deposition 7. Substrate surfaces and thin film nucleation 8. Film structure 9. Characterization of thin films and surface 10. Interdiffusion, reactions, and transformations in thin films 11. Mechanical properties of thin films.

description.zh: 1.X光之本質 2.晶体幾何及倒置晶格3.晶體立體投影 4.X光繞射原理5.X光繞射實驗方法(繞射儀，Laue照相法，粉末法) 6.X光繞射之應用(包括晶體結構之鑑定，晶格常數之量測，相圖測定，序化一非序化轉換及化學成分分析等)
description.en: 1.Properties of X-Ray 2.Crystallography and Reciprocal Lattice 3.Projections of Crystals 4.Principles of X-Ray Diffraction 5.Experimental Methods (Diffractometer Methods, Powder Photographs and Laue Pholtographs)6.Applications of X-ray Diffraction (Orientation and Quality of Single Crystal,  Structure of Polycrystalline Aggregates, Determine of Crystal Structure and Precise Parameter Measurements, Chemical Analysis, Phase Transformations etc.)

description.zh: 1.電子光學簡介 2.穿透式電子顯微鏡之結構與成像原理 3.電子繞射理論 4.電子繞射圖型及缺陷分析方法 5.掃瞄式電子顯微鏡之結構與成像原理6. EDS及WDS之X光光譜分析
description.en: 1.Introduction to electron optics2. Electron Beam and Their Interaction with Specimen3. Electron Diffraction4. The Transmission Electron Microscopy (TEM)5. The Scanning Electron Microscope (SEM) 6. Chemical Analysis in the Electron Microscope

name.en: Topic of Powder Science and Technology

description.zh: 本課程主要是開設給已經修過"粉体工程"的學生，進階對粉体科學中粒子的物理與化學性質，成堆粉末的構造特性，力學、熱學、電學、光學等的性質，粉体群與流体間的運動現象與關係，以及粉粒的生成與消滅的過程與變化等做深入的說明，讓學生有更進一步對粉体的認識。
description.en: This course is a special topics of powder science and technology.

description.zh: 超硬材料是一種越來越普及的新興材料。超硬材料可以作成精密加工工具及多種高價值產品。是提升一國競爭力不可或缺的尖端材料。超硬材料包括鑽石及立方氮化硼。本課程將介紹世界各國最先進製造超硬材料方法，包括超高壓技術及鑽石膜技術。而目前日新月異之超硬材料之發展及應用，亦作進一步介紹。
description.en: This course is to introduce the Hard materials.

description.zh: 本課程在討論生醫工程之性質與應用在整形外科,骨科和牙醫界。課程內容包括生醫工程之發展,牙醫材料之應用,複合材料在生醫工程之應用,生醫陶瓷,生醫材料之腐蝕機制以及生醫材料之工程問題。
description.en: The topics of this course include the engineering of bio-materials, and their applications in the orthopedic and dental fields. The course contains the development of biomaterials, the application of materialsfor dentistry and dental surgery, composite materials in biomedical engineering, bioceramics, corrosion mechanisms of metallic biomaterials and engineering problems associated with materials.

name.en: Special Topics of Materials Science and Engineering

description.zh: 本課程主要針對非材料系背景之研究生開設， 對各種材料（金屬、陶瓷、高分子、複合材料）之基本原理，性質及應用，做概要性的介紹。內容包括材料之晶體結構與晶體缺陷，固體材料之原子擴散，相圖與相變化，材料製程及應用，材料之物理性質（光性質、電性質、磁性質及熱性質）.
description.en: Special topics in 1.The structure of crystalline solids. 2.Imperfections in solids. 3.Phase transformation and phase equilibrium. 4.Strengthening mechanism of materials. 5.Metal alloys 6.Ceramics 7.Polymers

description.zh: 期望學生對各種儲能材料(包括水溶液系統電池、非水溶液系統電池、鋰電池、超高電容器、儲氫合金等)基本認識，進而了解各種能源材料之電池應用、材料結構、合成與電化學特性。本課程內容含有: (1)課程簡介, (2)電化學基本原理與應用, (3)水溶液系統電池分類與應用,(4)非水溶液系統電池分類與應用, (5)鋰電池原理、反應機構、市場、應用、構造與製造流程, (6)鋰電池正極材料分類、材料結構、合成與應用, (7)鋰電池負極材料分類、材料結構、合成與應用, (8)電解液材料與高分子電池特性, (9)隔離膜材料功能與製作, (10)薄膜電池, (11)超高電容器材料原理與應用, (12)儲氫合金材料與應用
description.en: The aim of the "Energy Storage Material and Application" class is designed for students to get the basic understanding for the energy storage devices and materials. The energy storage devices contain the aqueous electrolyte system battery, non-aqueous electrolyte system battery, lithium battery, super capacitor and hydrogen storage alloy. The reaction mechanism, application, material structure and electrochemical property of energy storage devices are also studied in this class. The class includes :  1.Course troduction,2.Electrochemical Theory and Application,  3.Types and Applications for Aqueous System Battery , 4.Types and Applications for Non-Aqueous System Battery,  5.Theory, Reaction Mechanism, Market, Application, Structure and Process for Lithium Batteries,  6.Material Structure, Synthesis and Application of Various Cathode Materials, 7.Material Structure, Synthesis and Application of Various Anode Materials, 8.Electrolyte Material and Polymer Battery, etc.

description.zh: 加強學生之學習研究心得報告，集體討論，以訓練學生研究之能力。
description.en: Group Discussion. Literature Study, Seminar, Group meeting.

description.zh: 本課程將有系統的介紹專業英文論文的寫作格式，以及文件編修的技巧，且用深入淺出的例子作為示範，並輔以實際寫作練習與錯誤訂正。學員學習研究論文組織寫作，包含修改本身論文結構之基本技巧，正確組織文章的各個片段，避免口語用字寫字的陋習，使所作之文章能掌握其涵意，亦即能更有效率的利用英文寫出科技論文之佳作。
description.en: The goal of English Thesis Writing is to help students developing the writing skills through the manipulation of scientific and technical data. Students will learn a variety of rhetorical principles that guide the writing process, apply these principles to scientific and technical writing, and write papers in their own academic fields. Lectures on the writing principle, students' presentations on the reading sections and follow-up activities, pair and individual work on writing practice will be the major activities in the class.

description.zh: 1.X光之本質 2.晶体幾何及倒置晶格3.晶體立體投影 4.X光繞射原理5.X光繞射實驗方法(繞射儀，Laue照相法，粉末法) 6.X光繞射之應用(包括晶體結構之鑑定，晶格常數之量測，相圖測定，序化一非序化轉換及化學成分分析等)
description.en: 1.Properties of X-Ray 2.Crystallography and Reciprocal Lattice 3.Projections of Crystals 4.Principles of X-Ray Diffraction 5.Experimental Methods (Diffractometer Methods, Powder Photographs and Laue Pholtographs)6.Applications of X-ray Diffraction (Orientation and Quality of Single Crystal,  Structure of Polycrystalline Aggregates, Determine of Crystal Structure and Precise Parameter Measurements, Chemical Analysis, Phase Transformations etc.)

description.zh: 1.電子光學簡介2.穿透式電子顯微鏡之結構與成像原理3.電子擾繞射理論4.電子繞射圖行及缺陷分析方法5.掃瞄式電子顯微鏡之結構與成像原理
description.en: 1.Introduction to electron optics2.The electron Microscope3.Scanning Electron Microscopy(SEM)　(1)Electron beam-specimen interaction　(2)Image formation in the SEM4.Transmission Electron Microscopy(TEM)　(1)Diffraction Theory  (2)Contrast Theory5.Specimen Preparation

description.zh: 相圖及相變化熱力學,多元溶液及部份莫耳熱力學。以熱力學分析.設計及電腦模擬冶金方法。
description.en: The thermodynamics of phase diagrams and phase transformations. Solution thermodynamics of multi-compoment and partial molar properties. Applications of thermodynamics to the analysis, design and computer simulation of metallurgical processes.

description.zh: 一、系統、相、成份、自由度、Gibbs相律及其應用二、一成份系統相圖熱力學。三、二成份系統相圖熱力學。四、三成份系統相圖熱力學。五、相變化動力學簡介。六、相圖測定簡介。
description.en: 1.System、 phase 、component 、freedom 、Gibbs Law and its application2.One component system3.Two component system4.Three component system。5.The kinetics of phase equilibrium (transformation)6.Phase diagram determination

description.zh: 討論有機化學與環境、浮選及再生技術等方面有關的部份。主要在使用到的有機化學藥劑，如介面活性劑。
description.en: The organic chemicals, such as surfactants, which are used for environmental, floatation, and recycle techniques will be discussed in this course.

name.zh: 界面活性劑原理與應用
name.en: The Principles and Applications of Surface Active Agent

description.zh: 本課程將介紹界面活性劑的種類及其化學製程、界面活性劑於界面之吸附現象、微胞形成原理與應用、表面改質技術、發泡劑的應用等。
description.en: This course will introduce (1)characteristic features of surfactant and its preparation (2)adsorption of surface-active agents at interfaces (3)micelle formation by surfactants (4)modification of surface properties by surfactants (5)foaming and antifoaming by aqueous solutions of surfactants.

description.zh: 修習本課程宜具備土壤力學、岩石力學、工程地質基本概念。大地工程包含土壤工程、岩石工程及工程地質。本課程偏重與大地工程相關之調查、規劃、設計、研究、分析、試驗等相關的案例討論。高等大地工程(一)主要課程單元包括:[1]基礎工程案例、[2]邊坡特性分類、[3]邊坡特性調查、[4]邊坡安定分析、[5]邊坡工程整治、[6]邊坡工程案例等。
description.en: Students who having the basic course trainings of soil mechanics, rock mechanics, and engineering geology are welcome. Major topics of Advanced Geotechnical Engineering [I] consist of (1) Case studies of foundation problems, (2) Landslide Types, (3) Investigation of landslide features, (4) Stability analysis of slope, (5) Mitigation of unstable slope, (6) Engineering case studies.

description.zh: 探、取樣及地球物理方法，十字片剪力儀、孔內側壓力儀、平鈹膨脹                                          儀、階段平鈑膨脹儀、孔內直接剪力儀、平鈑載重試驗、基椿載重試驗                                          、地錯抗拔試驗、現場透水試驗探討，岩石直剪、平鈑、岩石裂縫、孔                                          內應力、岩栓抗拔、隧道浮空等量測探討，鋼筋計、水壓計、土壓計、                                          沈陷計等監測儀器之運用說明。
description.en: advanced engineering geology , sampling and physical method, application of                                          instrument and test like pressurement , vane shear instrument , dilationter . in-situ                                          permeability test, direct shear instrument, foundation loads test, rock direct shear                                          test, rock cleft, pressure meter, steel bar instrument , piezometer, soil pressurement

description.zh: 石油地質組著重於石油探勘中長期的效益，以提高探勘成功率為宗旨，作先導性之研究，支援現場單位解決地層對比、岩相組織、有效孔隙的問題。盆地分析、石油系統的研究、加強礦區經濟分析，提供探勘策略，促使降低探勘風險。
description.en: Principles of origin, migration, and accumulation of oil and gas. The laboratory introduces the procedures used for exploration, and development of hydrocarbon resources.

description.zh: 資源工程導論為資源工程的入門學科，其範圍包括天然的金屬、非金屬、礦物與石油、天然氣、建築用砂石、石材與水等原生資源，以及工商業及一般生活的廢棄物或其附帶產生的可再生資源。期對初學者有一整體的基本概念。
description.en: This is a general introduction class to provide student basic knowledge about resources engineering which include metal, nonmetal, minerals, petroleum, natural gas, aggregates, dimension stone and water resources.

description.zh: 本課程提供所有博士生共同參與研究討論的園地。將進行設計專題報告、專題演講、研究小組討論。
description.en: This course is a joint seminar for all the doctoral students, which will be progressed by paper presentation of special topics on design issues, giving lectures, and group meeting.

description.zh: 城市是有機體，是文明的象徵，更是文化薈萃的結點，因此城市的文化內涵、生活百態、環境紋理、經濟發展、社會互動與城市治理及發展規劃息息相關。經由實證研究得知城市轉型是是國家現代化過程中的必然現象與必須面對的問題，亦即如何由傳統社會走向現代化社會、從農業社會走向資訊化社會、從封閉型社會走向開放型社會的變遷和文化發展的挑戰。這些挑戰與城市文化內涵、產業經濟空間規劃及都市治理模式息息相關。先進國家常以創意城市作為城市再生與轉型的契機，藉由城市再生的整體創意與創新策略，將產業創新與文化創意作為環境再造、產業再結構、治理機制調適、公共設施服務與社會活力的內涵，藉以振興產業及強化競爭力。本課程以產業創新及城市創意為主軸，內容將包括研究創意城市的理論與實務，如定義、特徵、條件、構成、指標、類型、評估的基礎認識，進而探討與產業創新、城市發展規劃的關連，並參考國內外案例，研析其優缺點及自省我們的境況與條件，最後經由課程互動，研討可供我們借鏡的可能方向與作法。
description.en: The city is an organism, a symbol of civilization and the cultural nodes. Thus the city's cultural connotations, life styles, environmental textures, economic development, social interaction, which are closely related to urban governance and development planning. Through empirical research, urban transformation is an inevitable phenomenon in the country's modernization process. That is challenges from a traditional society to modern society, from an agricultural society to an information society, from the closed society towards an open society, which are closely related to urban culture, spatial planning of industrial economy and urban governance.For some advanced countries, they have been trying to reach creative cities as the opportunities of urban regenerations and transformations. They aim to revive the industry and strengthen competitiveness by the way of overall creativity and innovation strategies of urban regeneration, environmental improvement, industrial restructuring, the

description.zh: 本課程之目標在於從科學哲學層次、研究方法層次、與實際操作層次探討設計研究的本質，內容包括界定設計研究問題、選用適當的量化或質性研究方法與特定工具、研究結果詮釋、案例解析、以及論文寫作等，俾使同學具備研究之基礎觀念以及進行創作或理論論文寫作之能力。研究方法一強調量化研究，課程內容包含研究的基本概念、文獻探討、研究問題、研究變項、研究假設、研究設計、資料蒐集與分析、研究工具、研究樣本、研究倫理與研究論文撰寫等。教學以課堂講授與論文研討與發表為主要方式，並以隨堂測驗、報告與分組討論與發表為評量依據。
description.en: The aims of this course are to explore the nature of design research at the three various levels of scientific philosophy, research methods, and practical execution. The contents involve the introduction of defining the design problems, selecting the quantitative or qualitative research methods and specific instruments, interpretation of research results, case studies, as well as writing a thesis.This research methods one focus on quantitative research that content details includes fundamental concept of research, literature review, research problem, research variables, research hypothesis, research design, data collection and analysis, research instruments, research samples, research ethics and writing up. The teaching methods include lectures, paper discussion and presentation based on the course assessment of assigned project, panel discussion and individual/group presentation.

name.en: Special Topics on Interactive Media Design (I)

description.zh: 本課程之目標在於研討互動設計、互動媒體、互動藝術之相關研究專題，以文獻研讀、論文研讀討論以及個案研究為重點，藉由密集討論、書面報告以及設計專題之之研究與實作，學生可以有效率地交換意見，獲得更深入而廣泛的體驗，並具備研究、分析、實作之能力。本所以結合電子資訊、機電、人文、設計與藝術等各領域的學生，以整合培育互動媒體設計專業人才，因此，本課程之另一主要學習目標為建構一多元領域交互學習的環境，以專題導向式為學習模式，可分別組合具設計、藝術、資訊、機電等專長的研究生，協同完成互動媒體設計專題的研究，或是透過互動媒體設計個案研討、互動媒體設計專題創作的方式進行。教學將以課堂講授、論文研討與發表以及專題實作為主，並以報告、分組討論與發表以及實作作品為評量方式。
description.en: This course is to explore the fields of interaction design, interactive media and interactive art and focus on the literature study, paper discussion and case studies. With panel discussion, research report and design practice, graduate students can be able to learn the ability of research, analysis and practice by effectively exchange opinions and personal experience. The aim of graduate of interactive media design is to integrate different disciplines from computer science, mechatronics, human-culture and design and art so as to foster the professional of interactive media design. Therefore, one of the aims of this course is to construct  multi-disciplines learning environment which perform a topic-oriented study model. This study model formulates the graduate students of design, art, information and mechatronic disciplines to collaborate an interactive media design project. It may execute interactive media design by working with the form of case study or design creation. The teachin

name.zh: 互動媒體設計專題講座

description.zh: 為掌握產業界的技術新知、學術界的專業研究、藝文界的脈動等，本課程講座將廣邀互動媒體設計的專家或學者，參與專題討論，就互動設計、互動媒體、互動藝術等面向，分別以宏觀的政治、社會、文化、科技、環境等角度剖析，另以微觀角度深入個案研究作探討，藉此議題討論互動媒體設計的現況與未來發展趨勢。教學評量將以各項的主題式討論報告為主。
description.en: To understand science and technological information from business, professional research from academic and issues from art and cultural fields, the seminars on interactive media design should be invited these fields of expertise and scholars to participate the topic discussion. With the macro-perspective of politics, social, culture, technology and environment, the seminar focuses on the dimension of interaction design, interactive media and interactive art. Besides, the seminars explore case studies with micro-perspective to discuss interactive media design existing and future development. The assessment includes thematic discussion and final report.

description.zh: 本課程規劃的目標為以互動設計的理論為基礎，實務導向為原則，使學習者能將學術界的理論與產業界的實務加以結合以充實對於互動設計具有全面性的了解。學習的內容包含互動設計系統構成要素、理論與實務基礎、互動設計方法與技術、科技支援與應用、認知心理、情境設計以及電腦支援協同合作等單元，各單元並包含不同互動設計個案的研討，使理論能與實務進行驗證。課程亦安排至相關領域業界的參訪，以加深對於互動設計實務的印象與了解。
description.en: The course aims to develop broad understanding on interaction design for students, based on theory and practice course structure. Course topics include essential factors of interactive system, interaction design theory and practice, interaction design methods and techniques, technical support and application, cognitive psychology, scenario design and CSCW. Course also incorporates case studies and company visits to enhance the understanding of integrating theory and practice.

description.zh: 本課程之目標在於介紹人本設計 (User-Centered Design, UCD) 之理論與應用。藉由本課程的學習，學生能習得互動設計過程中所需要之關鍵概念-以使用者為中心之設計，課程以人-機-境之架構為基礎進行相關知識之講授，並透過案例之研討了解其應用。課程內容包含使用者經驗與需求、互動環境、使用性設計與評估、以使用者為中心之創新產品設計與開發、設計心理學以及通用設計等。教學將以課堂講授、專家座談、個案研討等方式進行，並以報告繳交以及分組討論與發表為評量方式。
description.en: This course is focused on introducing the theories, application and research of User-Centered Design (UCD). In this course, students can understand the key element, UCD, of interactive design. This course is set up under the structure of Human-Machine-Scenario theory and case study. The contents include user experience and requirements, interactive scenario, usability design and evaluation, user-centered product design and development, design psychology and universal design. The course is preceded by means of lecturing, professional seminar and case study, and evaluated by students' reports, group discussion and presentation.

description.zh: 當今動畫市場已朝多元發展，網路遊戲中的動畫創作深獲電腦族的喜好，本課程旨在講授動畫的企劃與設計，以及其製作原理與應用。透過對網路、動畫、遊戲、及其他數位媒體的討論，使同學了解動畫的設計製作流程、腳本撰寫、軟體應用等。本課程內容包含分析動畫角色表現技法，動畫創作的原理與軟體自我的應用，並以各類動畫範例觀摩，分析企劃，劇本，鏡頭運鏡，最後將創意具體化，建立獨立製片的能力。
description.en: Animation has been introduced in multiple usages, particularly in internet game creation. This course is focused on the introduction of animation planning and design, as well as its principle and application. Through the study on the internet, animation, game and other digital media, students can understand the design process of animation, story drafting and software application. The contents include the analysis of animation role, presentation technique, animation making principle, software application and case study to understand the planning, scenario, snapshot. It is expected that students can be capable of executing creation through the animation technology.

description.zh: 本課程將探討互動科技運用於當代表演藝術之可能性與相關發展，並介紹互動表演形式與美學、電腦視覺與電腦聆聽、即時影像處理、即時音訊合成等，藉由實際展演計畫之提案與執行，透過跨領域合作，讓學生有機會將互動科技與表演藝術結合。「互動表演藝術 I 」將注重表演計畫之提案與發想、表演之腳本安排、舞台設計、聲音製作與成音系統設計等。
description.en: This course will explore the potential of incorporating interactive technology in performing arts and will also review the existing repertoire. In addition, topics about the form, the aesthetics of interactive performing arts, computer vision, computer listening, real-time video processing, and real-time audio synthesis will also be covered. Students will be asked to bring forth their proposal of interactive performing arts and to realize their work through formal presentation combining interactive technology and performing arts.  "Interactive Performing Arts I" will deal mainly with performance proposals, scenario planning, stage design, sound production and system design.

description.zh: 年來，在世博和花博兩大活動的帶動下，讓跨領域整合的「展示科技」成為新的研究焦點；新型態的展示手法，可以被應用在博物館及展場、商業空間、互動式機台、行銷活動和數位藝術。依照需求的不同，可以把展示科技分成『會場環境』和『觀眾體驗』兩類，前者就像是基礎建設、活動系統和周邊系統，而後者則是為觀眾創造全新體驗。而本課程則是為了掌握產業界相關的技術新知、學術界的專業研究與藝文界的脈動，本課程將廣邀展示科技的專家或學者，參與專題討論，就展場設計、互動技術、視覺呈現等面向，翻轉你與展示物的關係，體現創意展現的軟實力。
description.en: The promotion of Expo and Flora Expo in recent years makes the display technology a new focus in study. New pattern of display techniques can be applied to museum, exhibition, commercial space, interactive machinery, marketing and digital art. Depending on different needs, the Display Technology can be divided into two categories, which are "the environment of exhibition" and "the experience of audience". The former is like fundamental constructions, movable system, and peripheral system; the latter is like building a new and fresh experience for the audience. To understand science and technological information from business field, researches from academic field and issues from arts field, this course should be invited the expertise and scholars to participate the topic discussion.

description.zh: 本課程主要在介紹互動媒體設計與製作時所需要的資訊技術與應用程式。本課程的內容包含了解目前發展互動科技應用時可使用之應用程式與系統的概念、元件及操作原理的介紹。並透過基礎元件設計的應用與實作，培養學生透過應用程式與腳本語言程式的撰寫。有別於資訊相關科系程式設計的課程，本課程將發展包含程式應用概念介紹、程式撰寫邏輯思維訓練、以及互動程式撰寫的模組，學生可依自己的興趣以及投未來生涯規劃需求，選擇不頭的學習模組，以培養未來互動科技發展所需的跨領域專業知識。另本課程也結合業界的資源與師資，協助學生深入了解未來互動科技技術與程式應用的發展趨勢。
description.en: This course provides an introduction to the principles of information technologies and programming coding skills that can be used in interaction design element of the multimedia production process. Course activities are focused on programming coding skills training and the descriptions, contents, principles and applications of the changes to the digital technologies of interaction design and their future trends. This course encourages students to critically engage with interdisciplinary approaches to information technologies and interaction design in a context of peer support and feedback, in order to forge their own unique personal skills. These skills are then applied to a real-world design project in which students work with a project, with advice and input from industry professionals.

notes: 限15人修習（與資工所合開）

description.zh: 本課程的目的在於培養學生具備以下的能力：1. 使學生具備能夠把「抽象概念」轉換成實務設計的基本能力。2. 培養學生有美感欣賞與基本應用技巧的能力。3. 訓練學生具有獨立思考與解決問題的視覺構成能力。4. 具備認識感官資訊處理過程以及傳遞原理的基本能力。5. 能了解視覺、聽覺以及空間互動資訊如何運作以及應用的能力。6. 學習如何運用相關的方法、整合相關專業知識與技能於資訊設計上。
description.en: This course is expected to train students to be equipped with the following abilities: 1. Ability to transforming the abstract ideas into practical design. 2. Ability of aesthetic appreciation and basic application skills. 3. Visual construction ability of independent thinking and problem-solving. 4. Understanding of perceived information processing and communication principle. 5 Understanding of knowledge and application of visual, acoustic and spacial interaction information. 6. Learning how to apply relevant methods and integrate knowledge and techniques to practical information design.

description.zh: 本課程之目的在探討如何運用科學與系統化的方式解決管理上的問題。整個過程包括：資料蒐集與問題分析、數量模式的建構、問題求解、成本效益分析、系統規劃設計與執行等步驟。課程內容主要以應用案例說明為主，讓同學瞭解理論如何與實際問題結合，也會介紹最佳化計算軟體來求解數學模式並輔助說明所得數據之意涵。
description.en: The purpose of this course is talking about how to utilize scientific and systematical approaches to solve management problems. The solution process includes data collection and problem investigation, model formulation, optimal solution derivation, cost and efficiency analysis, system implementation and execution etc. This course mainly contains various application cases. Accordingly, participant can understand how to apply theoretical methods on solving real problems. Computational software is also utilized to solve the formulated models and analyze and interpret the obtained solutions.

description.zh: 本課程探討資訊系統在現代組織中所扮演的角色，課程重點將放在企業電子化和電子商務，同學在修課過後將具備相關知識。課堂中的資訊實務技術演練，將有助於同學有效率地解決相關問題。
description.en: This course provides the knowledge you need to understand the role of information systems in modern organizations, with particular focus on E-commerce and E-business. Along with skills learned in your functional area, knowledge from this course will help you effectively use information technology for solving business problems.

description.zh: N
description.en: The purpose of this course is try to help students prepare to operate in and contribute to the 21st century. Regardless of whether a person intends to work in a business, for the government, or in a nonprofit organization, the concepts, strategies, and techniques of effective marketing are relevant. This course is:Providing from fundamental concepts through the major tasks associated with marketing to the strategic role of marketing in an organization.Bringing early attention to the global nature of marketing.Emphasizing the similarities as well as the differences between consumer and business marketing.Combining demand forecasting with its logical antecedents-segmentation, targeting, and position.Covering marketing research, after students have been exposed to consumer and business markets and segmentation.Integrating planning, implementation, and evaluation to provide a broad strategic context after students have a grasp of what marketing entails.

description.zh: 本課程教導學生管理一項專案時，有關時間及成本的估計、進度表與預算的編列、以及其他監督控制一項專案進行之相關技巧與應用。專案計劃書的發展、專案投資的可行性分析、專案的風險評估、專案的介面管理，以及專案團隊與專案經理在一家公司組織內的地位和角色亦將加以討論。
description.en: This course teaches students the estimations of time and cost when managing a project, the development of project schedule and budget, and other relevant skills in monitoring and controlling the project. The development of project proposal, feasibility study of project investment, project risk assessment, project interface management, and the role of project manager in a project team within an organization will also be discussed.

description.zh: 本課程介紹電子化管理如何使企業能1)強化企業效率並簡化企業流程；2) 強化與企業夥伴之合作效率；及3)爭取企業之策略競爭優勢。本課程介紹下面3種類型之e化管理系統：1)功能性e化管理系統；2) 企業整合e化管理系統 - 企業資源規劃；及3)跨企業整合e化管理系統 - 供應鏈管理系統及客戶關係管理系統。
description.en: This course objective is to provide students with knowledge of how modern information technology can help enterprise to 1) improve its efficiency and streamline its business processes. 2) enhance collaboration with its business partners, and 3) gain strategic advantages in the highly competitive business environment. This course will cover 3 major areas of electronic management systems: 1) Functional management systems 2) Enterprise management systems - ERP, and 3) Inter-enterprise management systems - supply chain management system and customer relationship management system.

description.zh: 專題報告 專題演講 研究小組討論
description.en: Case Study, Seminars, Group meeting

description.zh: 邀請校內外學者專家至校針對某一專長領域進行專題演講，讓學生藉由聽講及心得報告之寫作，開展視野，並與時代之脈動相契合。
description.en: Invited speakers from different disciplines give speech in their specialized area. Thus students can broaden their eyesight and also keep updating the technology and its applications of the generation.

class.name: 能源光電外國學生專班

description.zh: 生質能源(bioenergy)指的是儲存在現有(活著或剛失去生命)的動植物體的能量。生質能源的來源，主要是植物將太陽能經由光合作用轉換成葡萄糖，在進一步合生物高分子衍生物(如多醣體(polysaccharides)) 。新一代生質能源技術強調環保技術，整合跨領域之技術，包含應用分子生物技術所發展出之基因轉殖、醱酵控制及生物觸媒技術-利用生物酵素進行催化化學反應達成環保及高效率與節能之目的。本課程將介紹動植物的多醣體種類及如何運用新興生物系統學的技術開發生質能源。
description.en: Bioenergy is referred to the energy stored in living or recently living biological organisms, such as animals, plants and microbes. The source of bioenergy can be traced back from plants harvesting the sunlight and converting it to glucose, then to other biopolymers such as polysaccharides. The technologies for developing bioenergy, with an emphasis on environmentally compatible, consist of gene cloning technology from molecular biology and enzymatic control and catalytic chemistry (i.e. green chemistry).  The course is an introduction course on the types of polysaccharides in animals and plants, how scientist use system biology to develop bioengergy.

class.name: 能源光電外國學生專班

description.zh: 本課程介紹如何將電化學技術應用於生物燃料電池上。生物燃料電池的觸媒主要是由酵素或是微生物甚至是生物細胞所組成，反應過程區分為電子直接轉移(mediatorless)與間接轉移(mediator)，並介紹此各種生物燃料電池的原理及應用，個別討論電池之反應過程、電池電極材料、電化學修飾電極及各種不同電池電解質溶液等個別元件。
description.en: The aim and purpose of this course is to introduce and expand the electrochemistry to develop the biofuel cells. Generally the catalysts of biofuel cell are composed by enzymes, microbial, creature cells and the bio-reduction process. In the biofuel cells the reaction process can be distinguished into mediator less and mediator transfer process. In this course, we will introduce the principle, reaction process and the application of biofuel cells. Especially, a detailed study about the utilization of film modified electrodes and different electrolyte solutions for the development of biofuel cells.

class.name: 能源光電外國學生專班

name.en: Electrical Magnetic and Optical Properties of Materials

description.zh: 介紹材料的電性質、介電性質、磁性質及光學性質，包括 1.晶格與晶體結構 2.晶格振動 3.材料的能帶結構 4.常溫與低溫的霍爾效應 5.材料的光電效應 6.光、電、磁場對材料的影響
description.en: This course is a special topics of Optical，Electrical and Magnetic Properties of Materials, including: 1.Lattice and crystal structure;  2. Lattice vibration; 3.Band structure; 4. Hall effect-At room and low temperatures; 5. Optoelectronic effects of materials; 6. Effects of optical, electric, and magnetic fields on materials

class.name: 能源光電外國學生專班

description.zh: 主要內容包含：企業研究的本質、研究流程、研究問題與假設、文獻評論、資料收集、操作性定義、測量、理論架構模型化、研究設計、量化與質化研究、個案研究法、資料分析與解釋、研究報告撰寫。
description.en: The course mainly discusses concepts of business research methods. The contents will include following topics：（1）the nature of business research, （2）elements of research and research process, （3）research problem and hypothesis,（4）literature review, （5）research design, （6）research proposal, （7）case study, （8）analysis and the interpretation of data, （9）quantitative and qualitative research,(10) research report.

name.en: Introduction to Services and Technology Management

description.zh: 本課程包含2大部份，服務與創新管理及智慧財產權與科技法律。服務與創新管理旨在了解服務與創新管理之意義、方法與現況，內容包含服務之本質、創新之意義、服務與創新管理之方法、科技之應用、服務與創新管理現況介紹等。智慧財產權與科技法律旨在了解如何以智慧財產權來保護科技研發成果，內容包括智慧財產權法規介紹與專利運用策略實務。
description.en: This course contains two major parts, service and innovation management and Intellectual property and technology law. Service and innovation management is to demonstrate the definition, the methodologies and the state of the art of service and innovation management, including the nature of service, innovation, the tools for service and innovation management, technology application and current development of service and innovation management. Intellectual property and technology law is to demonstrate understanding how to protect R & D achievements with intellectual property rights. This course includes intellectual property laws and patent strategies practice.

description.zh: 本課程主要邀請學術界或企業界的學者專家，從理論或實務的角度，經由演講介紹近代的服務與科技管理專題，促使學生更深入及廣面瞭解管理現狀或趨勢。
description.en: This seminar course invites guest speakers from well known companies to share their experiences of service and technology management and provide students the updated practices and management trends in the field.

description.zh: 本課程之目的在尋求以數量模式求出相關作業問題之最佳解，並介紹學生瞭解作業研究的本質，數量規畫方法及機率型態問題等。本課程包括下列主題：線型規畫、網路分析、動態規畫、遊戲理論、整數規畫、非線型規畫、馬可夫鏈、等候線理論、存貨理論、預測、馬可夫決策過程、可靠度、決策分析及系統模擬等。
description.en: Linear programming、network analysis、dynamic programming、game theory、(non)Integer linear programming、markov chains (markovian decision process)、queueing theory、inventory models、forecasting models、decision analysis and system simulation.

description.zh: 本課程旨在探討全球產業實務運作情形，以促進學生了解實務現況。議題包含全球科技產業研討、國際服務產業研討等。
description.en: This course provides topics on global industry practice. Related issues are global technology industry study, international service industry study, etc.

notes: 須修習過本所開設之產業實務研習課程才可修

name.zh: 智慧財產權商品化應用

description.zh: 本課程主要內容有1.智財權組合2.商品化考慮因素3.商品化過程
description.en: This course will emphasize on 1. Combination of intellectual properties 2. Factors affect the commercialization process and 3. Commercialization process.

description.zh: 本課程是針對創業與創新管?的進階課程，目的是以創業與創新管?及案例討論方式，幫助學生熟悉創業與創新相關能力。本課程主要介紹創新管理的基本理論及概念。主要內容涵蓋六項: 創新的管理，策略思維，公司內部創業，創新系統， 全球化與創新，組織與創新. 創業管理內容如下; 1.創業前的主要功課,產業分析鎖定及環境2.創業的成功失敗因素分析 3.創業前的SWOT分析 4.創業專業知識->財務規劃及理財篇 5.創業專業知識->行銷管理篇 6.創業專業知識->資訊管理篇 7.創業專業知識->生產管理及產品研發 8.創業專業知識->人力資源及組織規劃 9.企業營運計畫書撰寫 10.企業營運財務試算 11.企業創業實務篇->加盟連鎖管理12.企業創業實務篇->個店經營管理
description.en: This is an advanced course to innovation and entrepreneurial management concepts. The objective is to help students become familiar with innovation and entrepreneurial management through innovation and entrepreneurial management theories and cases. The contents of this course consist of six parts: 1) Technological Innovation Models, 2) Strategic Issues Related to Innovations, 3) Technical Entrepreneurship, 4) Innovation Systems, 5) Globalization and Innovation, and 6) Organizational Issues. The entrepreneurial management include: 1. Environmental analysis. 2. The key factor to successfully start an enterprise. 3. SWOT analysis. 4. Financial forecast and financial management. 5. Marketing management. 6. Informational management. 7. Manufacturing management and new product design. 8. Human resources and organization management. 9. Start-an-enterprise operating program. 10. The try-balance-sheet of starting an enterprise. 11. Case study of a famous successful joined-ventured company.

description.zh: 本課程能讓學生了解雲端服務之相關管理議題.研究議題包含三類(Saas, Paas,及Iaas)雲端服務之營運模式、公有雲及私有雲、雲端創新服務應用、資安議題, 雲端服務成功關鍵因素、及國內外案例等
description.en: This course will cover related study issues about clouding service. The research issues include three clouding service operation models (Saas, Paas, and Iaas), public clouding and private clouding, innovation service application, security management issues, the successful key factors of clouding service, and case study.

notes: 服科所與最後一哩課程合開,限30人

description.zh: 本課程講授如何使用Westlaw International資料庫進行IP研究。主要的專利資料庫的檢索方式也會展示。在每堂課前，學生必須要閱讀教材。課堂參與是必須的。其他資訊請見英文課程摘要。
description.en: This course is intended to expose students to various research skills for studying IP issues. Primarily, this course teaches how to use the Westlaw International database to do IP research. The framework of the database is based on the legal research methodology applied to American law. So, the basic knowledge of the American legal research methodology will be introduced. In addition, this course will demonstrate major patent databases to students. Students will be assgined to one research project. Students are required to study reading materials before each class. Class participation is also required.

description.zh: 本課程重點在於台灣專利法的主要法律議題，包括產業利用性、新穎性、進步性、可實施性、說明書支持性、請求項不明確性、請求項解釋、侵權行為、救濟手段、專利授權、強制授權、專利訴訟之展開和舉發。本課程教材包括專利法教科書、智慧局頒發的專利審查基準和智慧財產法院裁判。
description.en: This course focuses on the main legal issues of the Taiwan Patent Law including industrial utility, novelty, inventive step, enablement, written description, claim indefiniteness, claim interpretation, infringement, remedies, patent licensing, compulsory licensing, initiation of patent litigation, and opposition. The class materials include a patent law textbook, patent examination guidelines issued by the Taiwan Intellectual Property Office and recent decisions from the Taiwan Intellectual Property Court.

description.zh: 為保障著作人著作權益，調和社會公共利益，促進國家文化發展，國家特制定著作權法；本課程重心在於介紹我國著作權法之內涵，包含該法所保護之「著作」範圍、權利人及著作權範圍、著作權管理及權利侵害之救濟等，除講授理論外，同時搭配案例解析，以期讓同學對著作權法有最完整之了解。
description.en: Copyright Act is specifically enacted for the purposes of protecting the rights and interests of authors with respect to their works, balancing different interests for the common good of society, and promoting the development of national culture. This course introduces the main meanings, concepts and contents of the Copyright Law. Including the scope for copyright protection, the kinds of works that qualify for copyright protection, the rights granted to copyright owners, the management of copyright, and remedies for right infringement. The discussion in the course covers theory and examples, to enhance a deeper understanding of Copyright for the students.

description.zh: 為保障商標權及消費者利益，維護市場公平競爭，促進工商企業正常發展，國家特制定商標法，本課程以介紹我國商標法為重點，主要內容包括商標規範之基本原理、商標之構成要素、商標之分類方式及各類型商標之特性與功能、申請商標註冊之程序、商標註冊之審查及核准、商標權之取得及行使、異議程序及紛爭處理、權利侵害之救濟等。
description.en: Trademark Act is formulated to safeguard trademark rights and the consumers' interest, maintain fair competition of markets, and facilitate normal development of industries and commerce. This course is focusing on the introduction of Trademark Act. Topics will mainly include the basic principle of trademark standard, the integrant part of trademark, the characteristic and the function of trademark, the application procedures, examination and approval, acquisition of the trademark rights and exercises, the procedure of opposition and the dispute processes, remedies for right infringement and so on.

name.en: Intellectual Property in Mergers and Acquisitions

description.zh: 本課程旨在使學員掌握(1)併購法規架構、 (2)併購實務、 (3)併購英文，中長目標為：培育併購律師、法務長、財經法官。
description.en: This course is to achieve the following purposes:(1)	To understand the structure of M&A laws.(2)	To be familiar with M&A practice.(3)	To be fluent in M&A EnglishFor the mid-long term goals, this course is to cultivate M&A lawyer, chief legal officer and financial-economic law judge.

description.en: The goal of this course is to help students enhance their English proficiency superior to the Intermediate Level of General English Proficiency Test. description.zh: 本課程始自ㄧ系列關於「古代哲學」的演講，特別著重於自然主義哲學家的思想，如泰利斯、巴門尼德斯、赫拉克利圖斯，與德摩克利圖斯。藉此讓我們得以瞭解下述議題: 宇宙的基本物質、變化問題，與原子論。接下來，我們會探討希臘哲學，著重於:辯士學派、蘇格拉底、柏拉圖，與亞里斯多德。我們接著探討希臘化時期的學說: 如犬儒主義、斯多葛主義、伊比鳩魯學派、新柏拉圖主義，與神祕主義。最後我們轉向中世紀哲學，再接著探討文藝復興與巴洛克時期的思想。
description.en: The course starts with a series of lectures on ancient philosophy with an emphasis of thoughts presented by the Naturalistic philosophers who initiate our research interest in the Nature and our surroundings such as Thales, Parmenides, Heraclitus, and Democritus.  By doing so we would learn the following important topics such as the basic matter of the universe, the problem of change, and atomism.  We then shall move onto Greek philosophy with a particular look at the following philosophers: the Sophists, Socratics, Plato, and Aristotles.  Afterwards, we will study the theories and accounts during the Hellenistic period such as Cynicism, Stoicism, Epicureanism, Neo-Platonism, and Mysticism. We then will turn to Medieval philosophy, followed by a close look at thoughts appeared in the Renaissance and Baroque era.

name.en: Core Curriculum of Liberal Arts Education：Philosophy

description.zh: 哲學既是一門兼具理想性與現實性的基礎學科，又是一種既有趣又深刻的一種思想活動。 它所探討的目標都是和人類自身與他們所生活的周遭世界密切相關的一些基本問題；這些基本問題至少包括：宇宙、知識、公平正義、道德、宗教、語言、心靈、社會、教育、愛情，和生與死。 從事哲學思考，就是對上述問題，進行一種反省。 這種反省，能夠讓我們明白形成這些問題背後的一些基本原則，以及解決這些問題的一些可能方案的理由根據和獲致這些解決方案的應有程序。 由於哲學是著重思考與反省的活動，學習哲學其實不僅僅可以幫助我們掌握和人類自身與生活世界相關問題的一些根本知識，更能培養一個負責任的社會公民不可或缺的一種思維能力和反省態度。
description.en: Philosophy is not only a fundamental subject with both ideals and practical value, but also an interesting thinking activity of depth.  The topics it discusses concern some basic questions for we human beings and the world around us.  These basic questions at least include: the universe, knowledge, equality and justice, morality, religion, language, mind, society, education, love, and life and death.  Thinking things philosophically is to reflect upon these basic questions.  The reflection of this sort leads us to understand not only the basic principles behind these questions,   also the reasons and procedures of the possible solutions to these questions.  Given philosophy is such an activity based on thinking and reflection, learning philosophy hence can help us grasp the required knowledge concerning ourselves and our living world, and more importantly, prepare a thinking ability and reflecting attitude that are needed for us to succeed in becoming responsible social citizen.

name.en: Elective Curriculum of Liberal Arts Education

description.zh: 文化專題（一）課程培養同學認識臺灣不同族群的生活文化，介紹各領域與各時期的文化特色，包括：原住民各族文化、荷西鄭氏時期的多元文化、農業移墾文化、日治臺灣的近代文化、臺灣近代社會變遷、當代文藝發展與變遷、大眾文化與全球化。
description.en: This course is designed to cultivate the students' understanding of life culture from different groups in Taiwan. Students will learn the introduction of cultural feature from each areas and periods. These cultural features include the aboriginal culture, the multicultural when Taiwan is under Dutch and Spanish rule and in the Zheng period, the culture of reclaiming agriculture, the modern culture when Taiwan is under Japanese rule, the society transition of modern Taiwan, the development and transition of the modern literature and art, popular culture and globalization.

description.zh: 中國文化淵遠流長，歷數千年而不衰，涵蓋範園既廣且深。本課程授課內容，是透過物質生活(衣、食、住、行)，集體生活(社會、政治組織)，精神生活(文學、藝術、哲學、宗教信仰)等之介紹，讓學生對中國文化有更進一步的認識與了解。授課方式以口頭講授為主，討論及書面報告為輔，使得上課方式更為生動與活潑。
description.en: Chinese culture is a time-honored history, and never fades after undergoing several thousand years. The scope of Chines culture is immeasurable and deep. The contents of this course including the introduction of material life (clothing, food, housing and transportation), collective life (society, politics, and organization), and spiritual life (literature, art, philosophy and religious belief). Students will obtain further cognition and acquaintance about Chinese culture. The teaching mode is by giving students a lecture orally, and students have to discuss and hand in written reports. The teaching style is more vivacious.

description.en: This course is a strategy and general project management for students interested in pursuing careers in the cultural and creative industry. The course starts from the basic concepts and functions in the advertising, such as the development of product strategy, market size estimation, competitor identification and analysis, consumer behavior research, SWOT, 3Cs, and so on. This course aims to guide students equipped with innovation thinking and marketing sense. Additionally, the course drives students to look through potential opportunities in the creative industry and to implement new and interesting ideas.

description.en: "First step to achieving the goals of universities" is a campus-wide course provided for all of the first-year students at this school. The course is designed to help first-year students to achieve the following aims and objectives:(1) understanding the basic idea, goals, and fundamental value of higher education at college level;(2) learning proper study attitudes and methods effectively;(3) cultivating the required abilities and skills of responding appropriately to setbacks and difficult situations in order to acquire self-knowledge, self-control, and self-management, so that they may construct the knowledge and imagination that are needed in planning for grand visions of achieving the goals of higher education.

description.zh: 國文，是運用本國語言文字，蘊釀於欣賞文藝作品，充實文化內涵，增進思維能力與人文素養的一門課程。本課程分為大一上學期2學分，大一下學期2學分。大一上學期的授課內容，以文學名篇為範圍；希望藉此擴建學生深入品味文學趣味的能力，鍛鍊靈活的語文敏感度，默契文學創意，甚而嘗試創作。大一下學期的授課內容，以思想名篇為範圍；希望藉此啟發學生透轍分析各家學說思想，漫步哲人的宇宙天地，跟隨哲人的心路歷程，進而念茲在茲，從容內化，共饗取之不盡用之不竭的先驗與風範。
description.en: "Chinese" is the course where we make full use of our native languages to enjoy literary works, to enrich our cultural taste, to develop our thinking and even to elevate human cultivation.This four-credit course is set for the freshman students: with 2 credits in each of the two semesters of the school year. In the first semester, the course covers important articles in literature, in the hope for the student learners to cultivate better ability to taste literary works when they have more vivid sense on the language. With fuller knowledge on what literature is about, they are expected to try creative writings. For the second semester, the course is mainly focused on the writings on thoughts. It is our expectation that throughout the reading and analysis of various great schools of philosophy, the student learners are given the opportunity to explore the huge minds of philosophers, who will thus be imitated and followed. Through the internalization, the students might benefit themse

description.zh: 「文化事業概論」是新興科系的新課程，由於如今所謂「文化事業」，其範疇大都已與「文化創意產業」疊合，只是性質上講求經濟價值外，不偏廢文化、美學、社會等價值。 本課程採取主題介述方式，並邀請各項產業的專業人士進行講座，而實地參訪與場景演練也是重要的教學活動。課程進行首先論議「文化」、「文化政策」、「文化發展」與「國際文化生態」等諸項文化相關議題；其次，依次介述「文化事業」各範疇、內涵，及其發展現況；最後將討論「高品質的文化服務」與「從業人員的素養」。
description.en: "Introduction to the Cultural Vocation" is a new course of the emerging department in universities. The scope of the nowadays so-called "Cultural Business" has more or less been overlapped with "The Business of Culture and Creativeness" with the essence of emphasis not only on the economic values but also on those of culture, esthetics and society. The course will be focused on introductory methodology through main topic discussions by inviting professionals from different realms of industries for panel symposiums. In addition, on-site visits and case simulations are also to be included as important educational activities. The initial courses will be discussions on cultural relevant topics such as "Culture", "Cultural policies", "Cultural Development" and "International Cultural Systems". Further various scopes and contents of "Cultural Vocation" and status quo of its development will be introduced and discussed.

description.zh: 本課程旨在引導學生了解中國文學之演進歷程，認識各文體之興衰流變，熟悉各時代之文學風尚，以及重要作家之創作成就；並藉以培植學生融通宏博之文學眼光。為了讓同學能熟悉各朝代的文學特徵，本課程將會揀選代表性的作品來作介紹。如此一來，同學在瞭解中國文學的傳承與流變之際，還能懂得欣賞各朝文學之美。
description.en: This course aims to guide students to understand the history of Chinese literature, and the rise and fall of each style of Chinese characters , also to get familiar with the important writers, and to have mircoview in literary field.In order for students to be familiar with the literary characteristics of each dynasty, this course will select representative articles to be introduced. As a result, students not only could understand the transmission and evolution of Chinese literature, but also could appreciate the beauty of the literature in each dynasty.

name.en: Western Aesthetics and History of Art

description.zh: 課程以研討西洋美學與藝術概論為宗旨，並藉由藝術品、鑑賞與審美三項元素深入了解這二個學門之間的互輔關係。課程介紹除了專業知識的取得，也包含了美的認知。藝術品是創作者以審美的方式呈現社會生活與個人心靈活動的成果；如果藝術鑒賞是一種審美享受，那麼藝術鑒賞可被視為一種藝術再創造活動。這其中的美學除了創作者的審美活動、形象性、情感、想象、虛擬以及物質符號性，也包括鑑賞者的本質、個體性、藝術鑒賞的體驗性與直感性。藉由這些項目的探討並認識西洋美學與藝術。
description.en: Human beings are animals of the story. As long as there are people, there will be stories. As soon as a child sat on his mother's lap, the story is his way of understanding the world. Human civilization for thousands of years circulated tirelessly through the accumulated stories. From both the East and the West, the Plato and China's "Book of Poetry", even the Analects of Confucius, Zhuangzi, mythology, Buddhism, or the Greek philosophy of "Dialogue" all recorded with the form of stories. The influence of the story not only became the rule of history and an important tool of social and moral teachings, they also became the anti-mainstream values expressions. The story even forms meanings in personal investigations. Moreover, in today's information society, story is no longer the power of writers and artists, the story has become the skills of leadership and charisma, and the power of the plot has become the key to the construction of marking brands.

description.zh: 作為一個文化人，除了必須具備敏銳的觀察力外，還需要培養閱讀與思考的能力，如此才能在文獻及資料的基礎上，對所觀察到的文化現象做出得體的詮析與釐清。而在反思、整理過後，若能將心中的概念或想法，以清楚的文字流暢地表達出來，方能達到文化傳播的效果，亦即從input走向 output，讓無形的理念能化為具體有形的文字。而為了協助同學順利聯結閱讀與討論這兩端，小組或課堂的討論是必需的，因為透過彼此意見的交換，一來能看到自身思考的盲點，二來能開拓視野，讓整體的概念更加清晰與完整。
description.en: As a person in cultural related field, besides possess sharp outsight, need to cultivate the abilities of reading and thinking, so that can make proper annotations and analyses about observed culture. After reviewing, internalization, can express the concept or idea smoothly with clear characters, can get the result of culture spreading, namely move towards output from input, and convert the invisible idea into the concrete and tangible characters. And in order to assist students to bind between reading and discussion , there are essential to have discussions on group or classroom , because through the opinions exchanging process, not only people can see the their blind spot in thinking , but also can open up the view of thinking, let the integral concept to be more clearer and intacter.

description.zh: 研究光的特質，了解攝影的原理，利用攝影的器材、設備、透過攝影的技法，表現攝影的藝術價值，達到攝影創作的目的。
description.en: This course makes students familiar with the nature of light, the principles and the techniques of photography. Through the practice of equipments and tools of photography, the students can learn how to create and express the artistic value of photography.

description.zh: 網路與多媒體課程的目的在介紹網路環境中常用的軟體如：Netscape、Internet Explorer、Email、BBS、Gopher、FTP、Telnet…等。以及多媒體在處理文件、聲音、影像、圖片等資料所應用的各種軟硬體及技術，包括：1.基本語音處理技術；2.基本影像處理技術；3.多媒體硬體介紹；4.多媒體軟體介紹。
description.en: The Network and Multimedia course is to introduce the software most used in internet, such as: Netscape, Internet Explorer, Email, BBS, Gopher, FTP, Telnet, and so on. And how does multimedia process the documents, audio, video, graph, and picture data. This course will also focuses on the following topics: 1. Basic audio information processing techniques. 2. Basic video information processing techniques. 3. Multimedia hardware introduction. 4. Multimedia software introduction.

description.zh: 本課程旨在介紹設計的本質、設計的基本要素，包括線、形、空間、紋理、質感、明暗與色彩，從實作中實驗各種材料的特性，練習平面及立體的構成以達到設計感的養成與創造力的激發；為來自不同背景的新生掌握視覺設計之基本語言，奠定美術與設計的基礎。
description.en: This course aims to introduce the essence and the basic elements of design. In includes line, shape, space, texture, light, shade and color. In order to stimulate students' creativity and develop their sense of design, students have to test the feature of varied materials, and exercise the form of two-dimensional and three-dimensional. Besides, students who are with different backgrounds will be established the base of art and design, and they will learn the basic language of visual design in the course.

description.zh: 故事，讓世界充滿了魅力 。 一個人，一個景，一剎那的印象，一段文字的愛戀，甚至只是一個微笑……都是故事的元素，哈佛大學教授Howard Gardnerh曾說：「講故事是最簡單，卻最具有凝聚力的工具。」但是如何將故事與創意具體的表達出來，不但需要大量的閱讀，從故事中汲取更多的啟發與思考，並且掌握故事的「類型」與「母題」，學習以邏輯方式組織想法，進而加強基本的文字與口語傳播的能力，都是本課程的目標；因此「故事原理」的課程設計，將理論與實務並重，包含：（一）各類故事原型的分析及討論。（二）故事文本的延伸閱讀和理論教學。（三）創意技術與經典故事改寫與應用。
description.en: N

description.zh: 本校體育課程目標為鍛鍊健全身心、促進身心健全發展、培養運動道德、發揚團隊精神及養成終身運動習慣。四技一年級實施普通班體育正課教學。四技二、三年級實施專項分組教學，由具有專長之教師授課。開課項目：籃球、排球、桌球、羽球、保齡球、射箭、高爾夫球、網球、體操遊戲、慢速壘球、太極拳、國際標準舞、體適能、國術。學生得按自己興趣選擇修習。本校體育課程目標為鍛鍊健全身心、促進身心健全發展、培養運動道德、發揚團隊精神及養成終身運動習慣。四技一年級實施普通班體育正課教學。四技二、三年級實施專項分組教學，由具有專長之教師授課。開課項目：籃球、排球、桌球、羽球、保齡球、射箭、高爾夫球、網球、體操遊戲、慢速壘球、太極拳、國際標準舞、體適能、國術。學生得按自己興趣選擇修習。
description.en: All students are required to attend two hours per week of Physical Education class. This requirement applies to Freshman Sophomore and Junior students while it is an elective for senior students.  For Freshman level, Classes focus on basic physical strength training.  For Sophomore and Junior students, classes are interest-oriented, thus giving students the opportunity to select specific activities they are interested in.  Choices include Basketball, Volleyball, Table Tennis, Badminton, Bowling, Archery, Golf, Tennis, Gymnastics, Slow pitch, Tai Chi Chuan, Ballroom Dancing, Physical Fitness and martial arts, to mention a few.

description.zh: 課程重點：(1)藉由適合其程度的教材加強學生必備的基礎文法觀念和句型結構；(2)使學生確切把握閱讀要領以及充分瞭解寫作的各種技巧，重心在生字、片語、句法的解釋和基本寫作技巧的分析；(3)熟悉英語人士日常生活情境及與學生將來就業環境相關之會話及適當之應對方式；(4)透過練習加強聽、說、讀、寫的知能及表達。
description.en: This course is designed (1) to strengthen students' previously required knowledge in English with basic grammatical ideas and sentence patterns reviewed through reading materials appropriate to their levels; (2) to develop reading skill by giving explanation of difficult words, phrases, and syntax, as well as analysis of basic writing skill; (3)to  familiarize students with useful expressions in conversation and build up their confidence in cross-cultural communication; (4)to reinforce the competence and performance of listening, speaking, reading and writing by practice.

name.en: First step to achieving the goals of universities

description.zh: 大學入門是針對大一新生所開授之全校性課程。用以協助學生:(一)認識高等教育的理念、目的與價值(二)有效學習(三)涵養正視困境並妥適因應能力。藉以實踐自我鍛鍊，自我掌握，自我經營並建構宏觀視界的高等教育宗旨。
description.en: "First step to achieving the goals of universities" is a campus-wide course provided for all of the first-year students at this school. The course is designed to help first-year students to achieve the following aims and objectives:(1) understanding the basic idea, goals, and fundamental value of higher education at college level;(2) learning proper study attitudes and methods effectively;(3) cultivating the required abilities and skills of responding appropriately to setbacks and difficult situations in order to acquire self-knowledge, self-control, and self-management, so that they may construct the knowledge and imagination that are needed in planning for grand visions of achieving the goals of higher education.

description.zh: 本課程目標乃是協助學生透過有意義之社區服務活動，認識服務學習理念，從服務學習中體驗服務的意義，深化學習的領域、擴大自己的生活範疇與生命歷練。課程內容：包含三大類（一）志願服務基礎課程：選取志願服務相關主題，由授課教師於課堂上講述。可包含服務學習理論、內政部志願服務法所訂定之六大主題（志願服務的內涵、志願服務倫理、自我了解及自我肯定、志願服務經驗分享、志願服務法規之認識、志願服務發展趨勢），或非營利組織、服務機構之介紹等等。（二）社區服務：選擇服務機構前往服務，於本學期內完成授課教師所規定服務時數或內容。（三）課堂討論與反思：學生必須進行服務經驗分享與討論，並撰寫與繳交服務日誌、心得報告。
description.en: This course is geared to expand and intensify students' learning beyond classroom by introducing service learning as an integral part of holistic life learning experience. Apart from class work, students will be able to not only understand the significance of services and experience the true value of such learning through various forms of community work. The course is designed to deepen their learning and life experience.I. Core curricula of services: The course is structured on the framework of six themes in service learning by theory and practice as well as legal regulations regarding community services enacted by the Ministry of the Interior. The six themes respectively are: significance of service; standards of service; self-comprehension and affirmation; sharing service experience; service law and trends; and non-profit and service organizations.II. Community service: Students select or be arranged to service organizations and are responsible for completing service assignments

name.en: Core Curriculum of Liberal Arts Education：History

description.zh: 本課程主要是讓學生對歷史這門學科有一通盤、系統的認識，以便讓學生瞭解歷史的思維取向，增加個人的歷史意識。並在歷史學門的領域中，提供數門基礎及進階課程，供同學選修，以期同學從課程的學習中，理解台灣、中國乃至世界文明的進程與發展，剖析歷史學與現實的互動，提昇學生批判思考之能力。
description.en: This course focuses on getting the students familiar with the academic field of history in a more comprehensive and systematic view. The students are stimulated to think and make judgment with a view to "knowing the history," adding to a better sense of history. Further, they are guided to select some  courses in the field of history, including the formation and changes of the of Taiwan China and the World-as well as interactions between history and the reality-thus enhancing their critical ability to think and judge.

name.en: Core Curriculum of Liberal Arts Education：Nomocracy

description.zh: 本課程以民主、法治課程為核心，重在強化公民的素養，增進政治體制及法律運作實務等之相關課程。
description.en: Democracy and nomocracy are the core curriculum, focusing on enhancing the quality of citizens and promoting the related courses in  the political system, the operation of the law practices and so on.

description.zh: 介紹會計學之基本觀念， 會計循環 - 包括分錄、過帳、試算、結算及財務報表之編製。逐一說明財務報表各個項目，最後並介紹財務報表之分析。修畢本課程之後能瞭解會計學之基本原理，會計資料處理及財務報表產生之整個過程，以及簡單之財務報表分析技術，並為未來之企業及財務相關課程打下良好基礎。
description.en: This course introduces the basic concepts of accounting. All the necessary processes are included as well the financial report analysis. After being taking this course, the student can understand the accounting concepts, accounting data process, generation of accounting report and techniques for analyzing the financial report.

description.zh: 學習基本觀念及經濟理論及應用經濟學解決新問題及分析新議題，以新方法解答新議題及新方式表達新想法及舊議題。1.供給、需求及市場均衡。2.消費者及生產者的行為。3.市場結構。4.總體經濟議題。5.國內生產毛額及經濟成長。6.銀行體系。7.總體經濟政策。8.國際貿易及國際金融。
description.en: To learn basic concepts and theories of Economics. To apply economics to solve new problems and analyze new issues, ask new issues, formulate new ideas, and view old issues, in new ways.1.Supply, demand, and market equilibrium.2.Consumer's behaviors and producer's behaviors.3.Market structures.4.Macroeconomic issues.5.GDP and economic growth.6.Banking system.7.Macroeconomic policies.8.International trade and international finance.

description.zh: 本課程旨在介紹計算機系統之基礎觀念以及應用。主要內容包括：1.計算機系統簡介 2 .資料的表示法、數字系統、邏輯3.周邊裝置及儲存體 4. 程式語言與程式設計5. 軟體工程與系統開發工具6.資料結構與演算法 7.作業系統 8.檔案與資料庫 9.資料通訊與計算機網路10.人工智慧 11. 新興技術介紹
description.en: This introductory course covers the fundamentals and applications of computers. The major topics covered in this course are: 1.Introduction to computer systems 2.Data representation, number systems, and logic 3.Peripherals and storage 4. Programming languages and programming 5. Data structures and algorithms 6. Software engineering and system development tools 7. Operating systems 8.File and database systems 9. Data communication and computer networks 10. Artificial intelligence 11. Emerging techniques

description.zh: 介紹程式語言基本資料處理的概念， 包含基本輸入與輸出、程式的流程控制、函數的應用等指令之撰寫、程式之編輯、編譯、聯絡與程式之執行，並發展一套應用程式。
description.en: This course introduces the basic data processes of C++ language. They include input/output, program process control, application of functions, program editing and execution, and so on.

name.en: Elective Curriculum of Liberal Arts Education

description.zh: 為了訓練學生獨立思考與判斷能力，培養健全人格，提升人文涵養，延續通識教育六大向度的核心課程，在各向度均規劃了一系列的博雅選修課程，提供學生更多的選擇，以建立學生開闊的視野及達成全人教育的精神。
description.en: To train students have the abilities of independent thinking and judgment, develop the healthy personality and Humanities conservation, and keep the six fields of core curriculum in general education. this course will design a series of optional curriculum on Erudition & Refinement in each field, and develop students the broader sight and reach the spirit of the holistic education.

description.zh: 以工業設計的工作領域為範圍，藉由個案討論方式使學生熟練設計管理中有關方針之形成、計劃、聯繫、監督、評價、形象策略與控制、再教育、人事管理及合約等技術,設計的組織雖與決策，設計過程之管理，設計政策與產品策略之訂定，溝通技巧及設計之法律問題。。
description.en: This courses contents identifies specific topic areas: Nature of Design Work and its management, Quality by Design, Design in a Business Context, Legal Aspects of Design, Design Policy Making.

notes: 產品組(四創意四與四設四合開)

description.zh: 以專題設計方式，訓練學生獨立企劃、分析、評斷、組織、歸納與創新之思考，並實際演練完整之設計過程。學生經由分組或獨自完成一設計主題。上學期課程以題目界定、資料收集、分析調查、結論定義、構想發展及草模提交等為教學內容，下學期則進行細部設計、模型製作、專刊編輯、展示佈置以及設計報告提交等為教學內容,以培養專業設計之能力。
description.en: Studio in product design for the senior. Students are expected to exhibit a full range of professional competence and facility in designing advanced products and component complexes of broad scope. All phases of each project design are brought to a professional level under supervision of the director. This course puts emphasis on presentation techniques, including verbal, visual, and written. A project report is required.

description.zh: 以專題設計方式，訓練學生獨立企劃、分析、評斷、組織、歸納與創新之思考，並實際演練完整之設計過程。學生經由分組或獨自完成一設計主題。上學期課程以題目界定、資料收集、分析調查、結論定義、構想發展及草模提交等為教學內容，下學期則進行細部設計、模型製作、專刊編輯、展示佈置以及設計報告提交等為教學內容,以培養專業設計之能力。

Students are expected to exhibit a full range of professional competence and facility in designing advanced products and component complexes of broad scope. All phases of each project design are brought to a professional level under supervision of the director. This course puts emphasis on presentation techniques, including verbal, visual, and written. A project report is required.

description.zh: 探討家具製造之最新技術，側重量產設備及其與產品工程的關係。介紹木材加工原理及最新量產設備之性能，以便依據家具特徵如組件形狀，材料性質，及產量多寡等考量，提出有效率的加工計畫（製造流程）。講授家具製造作業程序（從原料接受、備料、細作、裝配以迄塗裝、包裝、發貨等其間之種種細節），特別是以計量的觀點來看家具製造問題，以避免發生瓶頸，製造系統整体概念之培養，尤為重點。
description.en: Survey of furniture manufacturing technology emphasizing mass production equipment and its relationship to furniture product engineering.This course provides students with an understanding of the principles of wood machining processes and the capabilities of modern production woodworking equipment. Students learn to develop efficient process plans (machining sequences) based on product characteristics such as part geometry, material composition, and production volume.Emphasis is on operations, and the integration of many types of equipment into a manufacturing system. This course specially requires the students to view the manufacturing process in quantitative terms.

notes: 家室組(四創意四與四設四合開)

description.zh: 本校體育課程目標為鍛鍊健全身心、促進身心健全發展、培養運動道德、發揚團隊精神及養成終身運動習慣。四技一年級實施普通班體育正課教學。四技二、三年級實施專項分組教學，由具有專長之教師授課。開課項目：籃球、排球、桌球、羽球、保齡球、射箭、高爾夫球、網球、體操遊戲、慢速壘球、太極拳、國際標準舞、體適能、國術。學生得按自己興趣選擇修習。本校體育課程目標為鍛鍊健全身心、促進身心健全發展、培養運動道德、發揚團隊精神及養成終身運動習慣。四技一年級實施普通班體育正課教學。四技二、三年級實施專項分組教學，由具有專長之教師授課。開課項目：籃球、排球、桌球、羽球、保齡球、射箭、高爾夫球、網球、體操遊戲、慢速壘球、太極拳、國際標準舞、體適能、國術。學生得按自己興趣選擇修習。
description.en: All students are required to attend two hours per week of Physical Education class. This requirement applies to Freshman Sophomore and Junior students while it is an elective for senior students.  For Freshman level, Classes focus on basic physical strength training.  For Sophomore and Junior students, classes are interest-oriented, thus giving students the opportunity to select specific activities they are interested in.  Choices include Basketball, Volleyball, Table Tennis, Badminton, Bowling, Archery, Golf, Tennis, Gymnastics, Slow pitch, Tai Chi Chuan, Ballroom Dancing, Physical Fitness and martial arts, to mention a few.

name.zh: 進階英文閱讀與聽講練習

description.zh: 教導學生閱讀囊括全球議題的文章，並藉由文章的內容作技巧的訓練，字彙的建構，語言的解析，及思維的啟發。課中延展活動將閱讀內容與聽力、會話、寫作做進一步的連結，並引導學生將所學做有效的應用。
description.en: The course provides students with explicit skills-based instruction in learning how to process, and decipher the readings that serve as springboards for reading skills development, vocabulary building, language analysis, and thought-provoking discussions. The readings include a variety of viewpoints on global topics centered around social issues, the environment, psychology, business, and technology.  Extension activities are designed to encourage students to go beyond the reading text, and to put what they acquire from the readings into listening, speaking and writing practices.

name.en: Core Curriculum of Liberal Arts Education：Society

description.zh: 為了培養學生有關社會、經濟與管理的基礎知識，特規劃了相關的核心課程，增進學生對個人與社會的認知，及對社會整體的分析與瞭解能力,進而?化社會適應能力。
description.en: To develop the basic knowledge of society, economic and management to our students, improve them the cognition of individual and society, and the abilities of analysis and understanding, then enhance the social adjustment ability.

description.zh: 本課程講授家具工程製圖技術及相關知識，著重在家具工程製圖與一般工程製圖的主要差別，其能讓學生將所設計的家具產品以圖面表達其細部結構與工程要件。
description.en: This is the lecture of furniture engineering drawing technique and related knowledge, It emphases on the main difference between furniture engineering drawing and normal engineering drawing. The aim is for students to present thedetailed construction and main parts of their furniture design product by drawing.

description.zh: 行銷是由物品的流通及製造者對消費者或使用者所提供之服務等商業活動所構成的。包括產品、產銷地點、通路及價格等四個主要原理。行銷研究是幫助經營者去發展及研究市場並研擬更好之行銷計劃，包括四種主要活動：研究計劃、收集情報、分析及發表。
description.en: This course aims to provide the student with knowledge of marketing, including product strategy, physical distribution, channel and pricing. Case study and discuss through activities (planning, investigation, analysis and presentation) that carry out strategic marketing are employed from time to time.

description.zh: 講授並整合產品設計之基本理論、方法及程序。藉設計題目之演練，以分組討論之方式，引導同學學習組織表達及分析思考之能力；並以個別指導之方式，引導同學磨練創意之思考及熟練之表達技巧。
description.en: This course intergral the theoretical principle methodology and the process of produces design Guide the design student to work on design projects through group discussion and individual practice with creative thinking and presentation technique.

description.zh: 介紹傳統以及特殊加工法、製造法、金屬、非金屬材料之製造加工。
description.en: In the design and manufacturing of a product is is essential that the machine as wellas the process be understood, Manufacturing requires tools and machines that can produce products economically as well as accurately. Economy depends to a large extent on the proper selection of a machine or process that will give a satisfactory finished porduct. This course serves as an introduction to various manufacturing, foundry, special casting, and special working process.

description.zh: 室內建築基本知識及配置實務，包含平面、空間、量體、周遭環境、空調、燥音、功能、採光、色彩、表面材料等觀點。
description.en: The Course is divided into five units : 1). The Nineteenth Century : The Industrial Revolution was the major influence on architectural history development. Structures of this period were marvels of engineering using materials like iron, plate glass, and reinforced concrete in new types of construction. 2). description.zh: 本課程藉由家具相關設計競賽活動或產學合作計畫案，讓學生實際演練家具設計程序及創新方法。本課程同時配合家具材料、家具結構與實習、家具製圖、電腦輔助家具設計等課程，期能習得家具創新設計與產品工程的能力。
description.en: The course through furniture design contest or industry-academy cooperation project, let students practice the design procedure and creative methods. The course coordinate the other courses: furniture construction and practice, furniture drawing, computer aided furniture design etc, expect getting the capability of creativity design and product engineering.

description.zh: 課程講授家具結構之專業知識與應用技術，理論與實務並重。內容包括開發流程、產品工程、基本力學、木材特性、複合板特性、木材接合、機械扣件、框類家具結構特性、板類家具結構特性、殼類家具結構特性等。
description.en: This course is introducing the knowledge and technique of furniture construction, both theory and practicing. The contents include R&D procedure, product engineering, basic mechanics, characteristics of wood, characteristics of composite board,, wood joints, mechanical fasteners, characteristics of frame type furniture, characteristics of panel type furniture, characteristics of shell type furniture etc.

description.zh: 練習設計構想草圖速繪法；從基本幾何形體至複雜產品、空間循序漸進；常用材質（木質、金屬、透明材質、石材及皮革等）之表現技法；產品精描、透視圖法、三視圖、爆炸圖、組立圖等之精描，說明圖板及各種畫材（麥克筆、粉彩、色鉛筆及水彩）等之應用。
description.en: This course put emphasis on offering students having enough skills on :1.Abilities to sketch their idea visible to the others.2.Coloring design sketches to let the drawings have better comprehensibility.3.Good skill for Renderings. Medias for this course shall include markers, pastels water colors and color pencils.

description.zh: 練習設計構想草圖速繪法；從基本幾何形體至複雜產品、空間循序漸進；常用材質（木質、金屬、透明材質、石材及皮革等）之表現技法；產品精描、透視圖法、三視圖、爆炸圖、組立圖等之精描，說明圖板及各種畫材（麥克筆、粉彩、色鉛筆及水彩）等之應用。

description.zh: 本課程為產品設計專案程序之理論與實務設計與創造性思考，專案與程序，劇本法邏輯，目標澄清，設計研究與調查，構想展開與評估，細部改善，語意法，專案設計策略。
description.en: This course focuses on concept and methods on product design project. It includes: Design Logic, Scenario Planning, Expression, Legibility, Semantics, Problem Solving, Concept Generation Evolution, Technology and Market.

description.zh: 介紹陶瓷材料、不同成型技法、釉藥知識及燒窯過程。在課堂實習手捏成型、圈條成型、拉坏成型等多種不同成型方法及表面設計應用在陶瓷作品之練習。
description.en: This course aims to develop student's potential in ceramics and pottery making, and to encourage a practical and theoretical understanding of skills and techniques of pottery making process.

description.zh: 課程主要藉由Rhinoceros曲面軟體之泛用性，針對產品外觀造形設計之實務需求、學習正確之曲面軟體建模技巧與觀念、並能應用在其它相關設計領域；幫助學生創意發想與造型創作不設限，並大大縮短產品開發時程並提升工作效率。
description.en: To be an effective designer today, you need tools to quickly develop your designs and accurately communicate them to everyone in the product research, development, marketing, and manufacturing or construction process.This course introduces the computer aided modeling design，teach students how to use Rhinoceros software to create accurately and high quality surface model and document your designs ready for rendering, animation, drafting, engineering, analysis, and manufacturing or construction.

description.zh: 透過多類型之作業演練，分析及探討由視覺衍生之知覺性及感情效果於平面設計上之影響，開發一套可供工業設計運用的基本視覺設計原裡。
description.en: Through multiple creative design projects, analyzing and discussing visual cognition affect graphic design work, Develop a basic system of visual communication usage for industrial design.

description.zh: 本課程講授參數式3D模型建模之技能，透過3D參數建模軟體將家具各零組件繪製，及組裝圖的繪製，目的在於培養學生具有數位化表達能力，以利於家具設計時造型之編修、工程檢討與設計管理。
description.en: The course is introducing the 3d modeling skill. Through learn the furniture part and assembly design drafting to develop the ability of digital design. It can take advantage of a Digital Prototyping workflow to design and build better furniture in less time.
