description.en: This course is continuation of the "Financial Management". The purpose is to study financial problems confronting the corporation. The primary goal is to help the students develop an understanding of modern corporate finance theories and apply these theories to solve real world financial problems. In this way, the students will develop and enhance their ability to make intelligent financial decisions. Major developments in the theory of corporate finance and its applications will be thoroughly covered

notes: 四文二與最後一哩合開

description.zh: 本課程使學生對燃料電池的基本原理、關鍵技術、以及商品化發展與應用過程，有所瞭解並加以分析及探討。燃料電池是一種電化學的發電裝置，其運作原理係利用電化學反應將燃料內之化學能直接轉換為電能，因其在能量轉換過程中並不經過熱機過程，因此能量轉換效率較高。本課程之授課綱要可分為以下幾項：燃料電池簡介、燃料電池之效率、質子交換膜燃料電池、磷酸燃料電池、鹼性燃料電池、直接甲醇燃料電池、固態氧化物燃料電池、燃料電池的燃料供應、燃料電池之計算實例。
description.en: This course enables students to fully understand the basic principles of the fuel cell, key technologies, and the commercialization of the development and the application process, and to analyze and discuss the design of fuel cell system.Fuel cell is an electrochemical power generating device. It can directly convert the chemical energy of fuel into the electrical energy via the electrochemical reaction. Because it does not go through the process of thermal engine in the energy conversion process, and therefore a higher energy conversion efficiency. Teaching outlines of the course can be divided into the followings:Introduction to fuel cell, Fuel cell efficiency, Proton exchange membrane fuel cell, Phosphoric acid fuel cell, Alkaline fuel cell, Direct methanol fuel cell, Solid oxide fuel cell, Fueling fuel cell, Calculation example of fuel cell.

name.zh: 液氣壓混合動力車特論
name.en: Special Topics on Hydraulic and Pneumatic Hybrid Vehicle

description.zh: 傳統車輛卻往往因為間歇式行駛模式，最容易產生大量廢氣及油耗汙染。雖然純電動車具有高 效能與及低汙染的特性，但行駛距離的受限與電池價格昂貴。而油電混合車雖然可以達到環保節能的目的，但跟傳統車輛來比仍昂貴許多。液壓混合動力車仍以引擎作動，需要加速時與其他動力源交替使用，等液壓系統蓄能器用盡再回到傳統引擎運作，與泵浦馬達配合利用剎車產生的動力回收，此循環模式回收再利用，以達到節省耗油及降低污染功用，特論將討論其相關技術與理論。
description.en: The traditional vehicle is often in intermittent mode, most likely to produce a lot of pollution emissions and fuel consumption. Though an electric vehicle with high efficiency and low pollution characteristics, yet the range is limited and batteries are expensive. Hybrid cars can achieve the objective of environmental protection and energy saving, but they are still expensive compared to conventional vehicles. Hydraulic hybrid vehicles use engines and hydraulic motor/pump as alternate power source. The energy storage elements are high pressure hydraulic/pneumatic accumulators thanks.  With the aid of hydraulic motor/pump and high pressure hydraulic/pneumatic accumulators’ thanks, the brake-generated power recovery is achieved and reused in turn for acceleration. This special topic focus on the related technologies and theories.

description.zh: 本課程將以智慧財產局頒布之「專利審查基準」為藍本，依「先程序後實體」原則先就「程序審查」部分介紹專利申請之程式，再就專利申請之「實體審查」部分依序說明專利說明書暨圖式之構成、可專利類型、產業利用性、新穎性、進步性等專利要件，先申請原則、發明單一性、優先權、說明書及圖式之修正、分割申請及改請申請，以及專利權期間延長。
description.en: This course is to introduce the formality examination and the substantive examination based upon the "Patent Examination Guideline" issued by the TIPO, including the formality of the patent application, and the, utility, novelty, inventive steps, first-to-file, priority claim, amendment, divisional application, and the extension of patent term and so on.

description.zh: 本課程主要關注台灣專利申請的程序觀點。其相關的主題包括發明人身份、專利權人（專利申請權人）身份、優先權、申請格式、發明人訪談、審查意見答覆寫作、訴願狀寫作和專利申請策略。此外，國際專利申請的實務觀點也會在課堂上討論以做為比較。本課程教材包括專利申請教科書、各國專利申請基準、和法院判決等。
description.en: This course focuses on the procedural aspect of the patent prosecution in Taiwan. The topics cover inventorship, ownership (including a right to file a patent application), priority, formality, inventor interview, office action response drafting, petition brief drafting, and patent filing strategy.  In addition, the practical aspect of international patent prosecution is presented for comparison. The class materials include a patent prosecution textbook, patent examination guidelines from different counties, and court decisions.

description.zh: 本課程之目的在訓練學生，使學生熟悉經常使用之統計方法與理論，能利用已知之資料整理、分析未知之現象，打好修習其他相關學科之基礎。課程內容包括：機率理論、推定、假設檢定、迴歸分析、變異數分析等。
description.en: The purpose of this course is to train student and to provide a background in the theory and methodology of general statistical issues. Topics include probability theory, inference, hypothesis testing, regression analysis and variance analysis.

description.zh: 由於工業發展帶來了各種環境的污染，使自然生態遭到破壞，人類健康受到傷害。本課程為分析汙染原因，並探討如何減輕污染源，以期學習者了解事前防範及事後補救之對策。
description.en: Introduction the methods of environmental protection.

name.zh: 數位匯流與智財法律專題
name.en: Intellectual Property Laws in the Age of Digital Convergence

description.zh: 在數位匯流的趨勢下，網際網路不但即將成為各種傳統媒體的聚集之處，同時也不斷衍生新型態的媒體傳播方式。有鑑於此，本課程目的即在探討數位匯流時代的智財法律議題。將由實際案例為主，輔以相關分析文章及法律規定的解析，帶領同學了解數位環境的特性、數位媒體形式與媒體內容的發展，同時針對著作權、隱私權等實用智慧財產權議題，讓同學了解、並具備分析數位時代的媒體趨勢、以及智財法律策略的能力。
description.en: In the face of digital convergence, the internet seems will not only become the ultimate channel for all kinds of traditional media, but the birthplace of new types. In light of the challenges posed by the digital age, this course is aimed at helping students explore the IP legal issues with reference to the media evolution on the internet. It will begin with the introduction of the characteristics of the internet, the developments of the digital media formation and content, and followed by the discussions and analysis on the cases in the real life.

name.zh: 醫藥智財權實務問題研究
name.en: Intellectual Property Rights in the Pharmaceutical Industry

description.zh: 本課程將介紹藥物智慧財產權之特色，主要適用之法律為專利法、藥事法、營業秘密法、孤兒藥法等等。其次，本課程將透過案例之探討，將醫藥科技與智財法規連結，以幫助學生了解實務上之運作。
description.en: This course focuses on the introduction of Intellectual Property Rights (IPR) in the pharmaceutical industry. Topics will mainly include IP laws related to pharmaceutical drugs such as Patent Law, Pharmaceutical Affairs Law, Trade Secrets Law, Orphan Drug Law, and so on. Also, the professor will discuss various pharmaceutical issues in combination with medical technology and IP regulations in order to help students understand the actual practice in this domain.

description.zh: 如英文概述內容所述。
description.en: This course is intended to help students explore various issues concerning intellectual property protection for industrial designs. The topics cover design patents, trademark, copyright, indigenous cultural expressions, and design service contracts. Students are required to read articles and cases prior to each class. Participation is necessary. The grading is based on the final term paper, in-class presentation, and participation.

name.zh: 營業秘密法與公平交易法專題研究
name.en: Monographic Study on Trade Secret Act and Fair Trade Act

description.zh: 本課程主要以公平交易法與營業秘密法之立法目的、沿革及發展趨勢為出發點，探討此二法律在規範對象、方法及競合等之差異；深入分析公平交易法與營業秘密法之內涵，進而個別探討公平交易法與營業秘密法等之智財權利行使的課題。
description.en: This course majors in the purpose, evolution, and development trend of legislation on the Fair Trade Act and the Trade Secret Act, with an attempt to differentiate between the two Acts in respect of objects, approaches, and choice of law that the Acts apply to.  In this course, analyses are also made, in depth, on the essence of the Fair Trade Act and the Trade Secret Act, together with discussion, respectively, on implementation of Intellectual Property Rights involved in the Fair Trade Act and the Trade Secret Act.

description.zh: 品質管理的基本觀念、原理、領域，品管部門的組織、功能，品管的工具、方法，品質表示法，品質管理成效評估，相關法令，品質管理未來趨勢
description.en: Fundamental concepts, theories, and areas of qualify control, Organization and functions of quality department, Tools and methods of quality control, Quality representation method, Evaluation of quality control, Related regulations and future trends of quality management.

description.zh: 本課程旨在使學生瞭解各種製造的方法和程序，工具機之基本功能。其內容包含有鑄造、精密鑄造、塑膠加工、熱加工、冷加工、工具機基本元件、金屬切削、工具機的操作、粉末加工及測量。
description.en: This course is intended to provide a comprehensive study of the Modern manufacturing processes and machine tools .The course is designed principally to provide the following topics:1. engineering of materials2. forming of materials 3. traditional casting processes4. broaching and sawing5. turning and boring6. drilling and reaming7. milling and grinding8. machine tools 9. nontraditional machining

description.zh: 本課程介紹環境之物理及人因相關因素對人員生理及肌肉骨骼系統之影響。內容包括噪音與噪音防治、氣溫等大氣狀況、振動與加速度、環境照明、人體計測與工作/工作空間設計等相關內容。課程目的在使修課學生了解工業環境與作業負荷對於人員之影響，進而於職場建立有效之因應對策。使學生能夠a. 瞭解工作場所主要人因工程危害因子(包括採光照明、噪音振動、極端溫濕環境、異常氣壓等物理因子及肌肉骨骼危害因子)、法規要求、量測/計算方法、評估與控制策略、以及相對應的預防措施。b. 具有評估及分析工業環境物理性與肌肉骨骼危害因子及擬訂其控制及預防對策的能力。
description.en: This course introduces physical and musculoskeletal effects of various environmental and ergonomic factors on humans. Lectures cover topics of noise and noise control, environmental temperature, vibration and acceleration measurements, environmental illumination, and work design. This course aims to cultivate students to identify different types of ergonomic risk factors (e.g. luminance, extreme temperatures, abnormal pressure, noise, vibration, musculoskeletal hazards) that can present in the work environment and to learn the related regulation requirements, risk assessment tools, and hazard control strategies.

description.zh: 先修課程：負責教授同意。變分法（ Weighted Residual法、Rayleih-Ritz 法等）、一維、二維及三維常用有限元素模型推演、介紹、元素內插(Interpolation)、積分、元素及總體矩陣、收歛及誤差、特徵值等、有限元素法於工程上之應用 (線性固態及結構問題為例)、商用軟體介紹。
description.en: Weighted Residual Method, Rayleigh-Ritz Method, Constant Strain Elements, Plane Strain and Stress Elemental and Global Matrix Formation, Convergence and Error, Eigenvalue Problems, Application to Engineering (Solid Mechanics and Structural Systems), and Commercial Packages.

description.zh: 模具製作專題為人力紮根計畫「模具領域」的核心課程之一，是要將「塑膠射出模具實務」、「3D-CAD模具設計」、「塑膠模具CAE模流分析」所學到的知識與技能加以整合，課程內容包含：產品設計、模具結構設計、CAE模流分析、3D-CAD拆模、開模與試模及射出，培養學生具備模具開發與設計的能力。
description.en: This is one of core course of the "Take Root in Manpower Project- mold field". It will integrate the knowledge and skills of the plastic injection mold practice, 3D-CAD mold design, CAE moldflow analysis of plastic mold. This course includes product design, mold structure design, CAE analysis, 3D-CAD disassembly mold, manufacturing and testing mold. The students may be capable of developing and designing of mold after studying this course.

description.en: Introduction (Overview of Microprocessor System, Data Representation), Microprocessor Architecture-CPU etc., Assembler Language-Instruction Format, Addressing Modes, Modular Programming, Byte and String Manipulation, I/O Programming, DOS Function Multiprogramming, SystemBus Structure, I/O Interface, Semiconductor Memory, Multiprocessor Configurations.

description.zh: 本課程將探討語音訊號的相關的各種基礎知識與處理技術，包括語音辨認，語音合成與口語對話系統等，並將檢視數個具目前最先進技術的系統，使學生能建立語音信號處理技術之基本知識及能力。課程內容包括：*語音的產生，語音訊號聲學特性與語音知覺的原理*語音分析*語音辨識*語音合成*口語對話系統*目前最先進技術系統*相關進階議題
description.en: In this course, we will introduce fundamental speech signal processing techniques, including speech recognition, speech synthesis and spoken dialogue system and examine some state-of-the-art systems.Content:*Overview of Speech Processing Techniques*Speech Production, Acoustic Phonetics and Psychoacoustic Phenomena*Speech Analysis*Speech Recognition*Speech Synthesis*Spoken Dialog System*State-of-the-Art Systems*Selected Advanced Topics

The contents of this course are1、CHARACTERISITICS OF PASSIVE IC COMPONENTS2、A REVIEW OF MOS DEVICE PHYSICS3、PASSIVE RLC NETWORKS4、DISTRIBUTED SYSTEMS5、THE SMITH CHART AND S-PARAMETERS6、BANDWIDTH ESTIMATION TECHNIQUES7、HIGH-FREQUENCY AMPLIFIER DESIG8、VOLTAGE REFERENCES AND BIASING9、NOISE ANALYSIS10、LNA DESIGN11、MIXERS12、RF POWER AMPLIFIERS13、FEEDBACK SYSTEMS14、PHASE-LOCKED LOOPS15、OSCILLATORS AND SYNTHESIZERS16、ARCHITECTURES

description.zh: 陣列信號處理之功效，在於展現以上空域上一系列線元組成之陣列天線系統，其可依據多通路信號特性及設定需求，自動調整系統參數以消除或減低無線系統在空域上所遭遇之干擾。因其具備自動干擾消除之能力，其已是未來無線通信(微波)系統之主流。而本課程之主要目的在提供相關陣列信處理之基本架構概念及處理程序，可為有興趣於通信工程之學生建立實際陣列信號處理概念及系統設計之基礎。同時課程所使用之分析處理技術亦可應用於其他類似領上。
description.en: The primary object of this course is to present the fundamental concept and treatment for spatial signal processing dealing with interference encountered in wirelwss communication by using an adaptive array. It is also the additional purpose of the subjects to provide the analllytic techniques used to predict the performance in other new applications.

name.zh: 互動式娛樂服務之音訊處理技術
name.en: Audio Signal Processing for Interactive Entertainment Services

description.zh: 本課程講述音訊處理技術之理論與實務，並著重於互動式娛樂服務之應用。理論部分包括聲音訊號的分析與辨識、電子音樂的產生、內涵式音樂檢索原理、以及空間音場等問題介紹。透過實際應用的探討，使學生獲得理論知識與設計創意。實務部分則以卡拉OK服務平台為核心，於課後作業及期末專題實作中，藉由軟體模擬、DSP開發平台、與手持行動裝置的程式設計，使學生應用電子音樂技術、音樂檢索技術、與空間音場原理來實現一卡拉OK系統，突破一般居家或手持行動裝置的功能限制，提升歌唱情境。
description.en: The course is designed to equip students with knowledge and skills in audio signal processing, particularly in the applications of interactive entertainment services. It covers both theory and practice of audio signal analysis and recognition, electronic music production, content-based music retrieval, and spatial audio effects. Through the use of personal computers, DSP platforms, and handheld devices, students will learn to apply the audio signal processing techniques to the design of interactive karaoke services.

description.zh: 本課程在訓練學生如何使用電腦輔助設計軟体來設計類比濾波器,進而能培養學生具有設計類比濾波器的能力,課程內容包念： 1.簡介 2.低雜訊放大器 3.混波器 4.振盪器5.頻率合成器 6.功率放大器 7. 類比基頻訊號處理
description.en: This course is trained the student to use computer-aided design tools for the design of analog filter. Therefore, the student has the design capability of analog filter integrated circuit. The contents of this course: 1. Introduction 2.LNA 3.Mixer 4.Oscillators 5.Frequency Synthesizers 6.Power Amplifier 7.Analog Baseband Signal Processing

description.zh: 克希荷夫定律(KCL, KVL)及綱目電流法、節點電位法及重疊定律、載維寧定律等之電路計算技巧應用；RLC電路之一階、二階電路之暫態自然響應及相量式之於弦波函數穩態分析。
description.en: Some useful tchniques of circuit analysis in mesh current method, nodal analysis, superposition principle and thevenin's theorems and so on; the first order and second order equation for natural response in RLC circuits and phasor concept to forced response in sinusoidal steady-state equation.

Systems of Linear Differential Equations4.	Series Solution of Ordinary Differential Equations and Special   Functions 5.	The Laplace Transform

description.zh: 基本儀器介紹；電子零件之認識；二極體電路（特性）；運算放大器；電晶體電路（特性）；A/D ，D/A 轉換器；類比乘法器。運算放大器應用；線性電壓調整器；電壓參考及電流源；電壓比較器；電壓控制振盪器；鎖相迴路；頻率－電壓轉換器；類比－數位轉換器；數位－類比轉換器；特殊裝置語言合成電路。

Part 2concentrates on analog circuit and system. Method of biasing adiscrete BJT or EET are given, and stability of the operating point isdiscussed. The small-signal model for each device is abstained and usedto calculate the performance of low frequency single stage andcascaded amplifiers. The feedback concepts of AMP. OP AMP, itscharacteristics and applications are described.

description.zh: 二十一世紀是中國人的世紀，全球最多的人口，第三大的土地，與台灣如此的近，政治、經濟、軍事、文化發展對台灣均有一定的影響。統一？台獨？無論如何，身為今日在台灣的知識份子，應對它有所瞭解。課程內容包括：中國共產黨的建立與發展、政制體制、教育科學文化發展、經濟展望、國防軍事建設、兩岸關係等。
description.en: This course is designed lets our students have a comprehensive understanding of the Mainland China. Introduced the developing history of Chinese Communism Party ; the organization of political ; the status of economics ; the development of science &　eductaion;the military construction; the policy of one country two systems;and the relationship of two - sides of straits ---。

description.zh: 本課程以培養學生尊重與欣賞不同族群、不同時空、不同價值觀所產生的音樂而設。藉由對音樂元素、本質的認知及介紹，欣賞各時期作曲家之代表作品，培養西方音樂的基本常識，建立音樂欣賞的專業態度。教學目標：1.提高學生音樂欣賞的素養，充實其音樂生活的內涵，2.激發學生對音樂的興趣，培育愛樂人口，增進社會祥和的原動力，3.介紹古今中外音樂名家名作，啟發學生對音樂創作的認知與敬重，4.建立學生對古典音樂、民族音樂、應用音樂及通俗音樂等不同類型音樂的正確認知與包容力，培養世界性的音樂觀。授課內容：1.概論, 2.歌樂, 3.器樂, 4.儀式音樂, 5.舞蹈音樂, 6.戲劇音樂。
description.en: This course aims to cultivate students' ability to appreciate music of different ethnic groups, different time and place, different value systems. Through the introduction of basic music elements as well as the appreciation of the masterpieces of various composers, it is hoped that students will build up basic music knowledge about music and enhance professional music appreciation potentiality in music. The goals include: 1. Elevating students' capability in music appreciation 2. Inspiring students' interest in music with a view to improving our society into a harmonious world. 3. Introducing domestic and international famous composers' pieces 4. Touring of various forms of music: classical, ethnic, applied and popular music. Contents of this course include: 1.Introduction 2. Vocal music 3. Instrumental music 4. Ritual music 5. Dance music 6. Theatre music

description.zh: 諺語是人類生活智慧在文字語言上的極致表現，藉著短短的一句話卻能表達出內涵豐富的意義，西洋諺語中在人際關係上有許多獨特的見解，不但深入且幽默更發人深省的句子；例如：(1)Give and take.  (中譯：施與受；與人交往應有來有往，互相體諒。)  (2)Wake not a sleeping lion. (中譯：勿驚擾睡獅；即勿自找麻煩。)    本課程目標為：(1)從西洋諺語中讓學生瞭解人性的需求以及人際關係的基礎 (2)從含意深刻的西洋諺語中使學生體會正確的人生態度，進而明白建立良好人際關係的技巧 (3)藉西洋諺語之介紹讓學生瞭解諺語之典故、使用法，達到提昇學生英文涵養之目的。    本課程將採取啟發法、小組討論、上台報告等授課方式，藉以增進學生思考及上台說話之能力。
description.en: Proverbs are the wisest words expressed in human life. By means of the short sentence, it has profound meaning. There are many particular views, not only deep but humorous, about human relationships in English proverbs. For examples: (1) Give and take. (2) Wake not a sleeping lion.  Both are short and have metaphor related with human relationships.     The objectives of this course are: (1) Let students understand the human needs and the bases of human relationships through English proverbs. (2) Let students realize the right attitude about the ways one should treats people, and then can establish the better technique for human relationships. (3) By means of using English proverbs to make students understand the proverbs' origin, usages and then to improve students English ability.    This course uses the methods of discovery learning, teams discussion, student presentation, and etc. In these ways we can advance students' ability to do deep thought and improve their speech ability when

description.zh: 西藥及中草藥是中華民族的傳統藥，也是中國藥學寶庫的重組成成分，中草藥包括中藥、草藥（即民間藥）以及少數民族地區使用的民族藥，在中國，使用中草藥防病治病已有數千年之歷史，寶鑑證明，中草藥療效確切，副作用較合成中藥少，力來深受群眾喜愛。當前，人類健康需要傳統醫藥之觀點正為越來越多之國家和人民接受，開發傳統要已成為當今藥物發展的潮流。同時，近年來科學研究成果表明，從中草藥發展出療效好，毒性低的新藥是一條成功的捷徑。因此，學習中草藥之人員日漸增加。本課程共分：西藥概論、中草藥概論、內科中草藥、兒科中草藥、男科中草藥、婦科中草藥、美容養生中草藥等。
description.en: The Drugs on Life is a two credit hours course and design especially for technology students. This curriculum emphasizes on the clinical applications and action mechanisms of various western and Chinese drugs. The curriculum trends will start from more details and bring a completely concepts. The subjects include neuropharmacology, autacoids, cardiovascular drugs, analgesics, anaethesia and drugs actiong on the central nervous system, chemotherapy of microbial disease and neoplastic disease, hormones and hormone antagonists, drugs acting on the blood and some Chinese drugs.

description.zh: 面對日益複雜的社會現象與社會組織，生活規範已由傳統的道德習俗，逐漸代之以法律倫理，生活在現代化的社會，有必要從認知法理、遵守法律，進而要求落實法治。俾政府施政依法而治，社會倫理得以重建，個人權益亦獲得確實的保障。本課程兼顧理論與實例的探討，包括法律的理念與概念、法律與社會生活各層面的關聯性、現行法體制的基本認識、法治生活的檢視與展望。
description.en: Facing increasingly complicated social phenomena and organization, norms of life are governed by laws instead of traditional moral customs. Living in modern society, it is necessary to have a better understanding of the law, so that people will abide by the law and further thoroughly implement the legal system to ensure that the government administration may be performed in accordance with the law. In this way, social ethic may be re-established and individual's benefit may be protected. The discussion in the course covers theory and examples, including the concept of the law, law and politic, law and society, law and life, etc.

name.en: The Cultural History of Chinese Medicine

description.zh: 本課程結合考古發現、出土文物、傳世圖書及近人研究，討論中國這塊地域自有文字出現以來的醫療文化變遷。經由本課程學生可以瞭解傳統中國社的醫療知識和社會、文化與政治間的可能關係。
description.en: The contents of this course include archaeological discoveries, unearthed artifacts, written documents and recent literature, and focuses on the medical and cultural changes in Chinese history. Students who take this course will be able to comprehend the medical knowledge as well as the interrelations among social, cultural and political dimensions in traditional China.

description.zh: 哲學心理學(Philosophical Psychology)是以人的理智(intellect)或理性(reason)為基礎，對人的各個層面，所做的知性探討。準此，這門學科又被稱做人的哲學(Philosophy of Man)或哲學人類學(Philosophical Anthropology)。本課程將分成兩個階段來進行:首先，我們將回顧歷史上一些重要哲學家對此主題的洞見。藉著點讀如亞里斯多德(Aristotle)、笛卡兒(R.Descartes)、休姆(D.Hume)、康德(I.Kant)、與維根斯坦(L.Wittgenstein)等大哲經典之吉光片語，可以奠定我們對此學科之理論基礎。然後，我們將借重一些當代科學，如腦神經科學(Neuroscience)、心理學(Psychology)、神經生物學(Neurobiology)、和生理學(Physiology)等之研究，增進我們對人自身一些重要議題的認識。這些議題至少包括:心靈(Mind)、情緒(Emotion)、感官(Sensation)、直覺(Intuition)、創造力(Creativity)、身體(Body)、與臉孔(Face)等。我們還將播放與這些議題有關的科學影片，以豐富我門對人自身之瞭解。
description.en: Basing on human intellect or human reason, philosophical psychology is an intellectual endeavor that investigates some of the important aspect of human beings. Hence, the subject is also called philosophy of man or philosophical anthropology. This course will be divided into two stages as it proceeds. First, we shall review the insights provided by a few important philosophers such as Aristotle, Descartes, Hume, Kant, Wittgenstein, we thus are able to understand this subject on a solid footing. Then, by monitoring the major findings in some subjects such as neuroscience, psychology, neurobiology, and physiology, we thus enhance our understanding toward some key issues concerning human beings. These issues include at least: mind, emotions, creativity, body, and faces, and so on. We will also watch some related watch some scientific films to enrich our understanding toward we human beings.

description.zh: 人類社會中的經濟活動愈來愈錯綜，人與人之間的經濟關係也愈來愈複雜，但無非都是為求經濟問題的解決。如何將有限的資源在諸多可行的途徑中，選擇最有利、最能發揮滿足人們慾望的效果，乃是身為「經濟人」的萬物之靈所努力的目標。本課程提供學習者分析經濟現象的工具，掌握經濟發展的脈動，以便在現代經濟社會中立於不敗之地。
description.en: In human society economic activity is getting more and more complicated and economic relationship between people is also getting more and more complicated but all are to seek for the solution of economic problems. Among a number feasible ways how to choose the best way that can make best use of limited resources to satisfy people's desire shall be the goal for human being as "economic persons" making effort to fulfill. The course enables students to learn the tools for the analysis of economic situation, the way of grasping the wave of economic development in Taiwan so as to win in the modern economic society.

description.zh: 本課程將有系統的介紹世界上最新的光電科技發展及在台灣的相關光電產業。時間上規劃以第一小時介紹基本光電理論，第二小時介紹應用技術與實例。課程內容包括：1.雷射光與原理與應用， 2.雷射光與精密量測， 3.雷射光與機械人， 4.光電技術與半導體製造， 5.光資訊與光儲存， 6.光纖通訊系統， 7.紅外系統， 8.紫外線系統， 9. 雷射醫學應用， 10雷射光與國防， 11.光學設計與光學設計軟體， 12 光電科技與未來。
description.en: The course gives the outlook of the technology of Opto-electronics and the industry of Opto-electronics in Taiwan. The contents of this course are constructed as following：1. The principles and applications of Laser, 2. Laser and precise measurements, 3. Laser and robot, 4. Opto-electronics technology and semiconductor magnification, 5. Optical information and Optical storage 6. Optical fiber communication, 7. Infrared system, 8. Ultraviolet system, 9. Medical applications of laser, 10. Laser and defense 11. Optical design and software. 12. Opto-electronics and future.

description.zh: 婚姻是一般人所必經的過程，家庭是生活的場所，關係著人生的幸福與美滿。本課程強調美滿婚姻與幸福家庭是一門學問，因此，課程內容包括：對婚姻與家庭有正確的認知、積極的態度、完整的規劃，並培養有認真努力去實踐的方法與能力。如何追求真正的快樂與幸福？除了在婚姻與家庭中追求平等化、合理化、自由化、公平化外，自我成長、相互尊重都是本課程的學習目標，以協助學生思考婚姻與家庭的終生大事。
description.en: Marriage is a process that most people will go through.  Family is where you belong to, and where the satisfaction and happiness come from. We believe that it is a kind of scholarship to have a high-quality marriage and a wonderful family.  The contents of this course include having the correct understanding of marriage and family, cultivating positive attitude, developing complete plans, and realizing them with all efforts. This course will help students think totally about marriage and family, learn to pursue equality, reasonableness and liberty, keep growing and respect each other, so that we can obtain the real delight and happiness.

description.zh: 個人或國家都無法自外於當今的國際社會；政治、經濟、社會、文化各層面皆受到國際間互動的影響下，為增進知識青年具備國際化的視野與認知，以因應時代發展趨勢，在強化技術研究的基礎上，拓展國家、社會與個人的發展空間。本課程內容包括基本理論與國際關係的動態，涵蓋國際社會的結構與演變、國際行為的類型及支配此行為的各種力量、國際事務的現象、本質及因果關係。
description.en: An individual or a country may not keep alien to today's internatonal community. Owing to internationally interactive influence with respect to politic, economy, society and culture, the purpose of the course is to equip intellectual youths with internaitonalized sight and awareness to keep pace with the develolpment trend of times, and to expand the space for national, social and individual development on basic of reinforced technical research. The contents of the course include basic theory and the situation  of international relations, covering the structure and changes in the international community, the type of international behavior, and various forces dominating such behavior, the phenomenon, essence, cause and consequence of international affairs.

description.zh: 本課程之目標為：充實生活技能、提升科技素養、豐富生活內涵、培養繼續進修之興趣與能力，以奠定終身學習及生涯發展之基礎。本課程之內容為：一、電腦基本概念，二、電腦功能與應用，三、資料處理，四、資訊管理，五、資訊網路，六、電腦的聲光世界，七、電腦的安全問題與防治，八、未來的資訊社會。
description.en: This course is designed to help student to learn another skill, better understand technology, enrich there live and inspire their interests for further study. The course includes: 1.basic knowledge of computer; 2.the application of computer; 3.data procession; 4.data control; 5.internet; 6.multimedia; 7.computer virus; 8. the world of information.

description.zh: 兩性關係是人際關係的核心問題，它關係著交友的態度、婚姻生活的幸福與社會的祥和。本課程由對兩性差異性的了解為基礎，以尊重為原則，在平等互助的精神中，確定兩性關係的和諧。本課程內容包括理論與實際的配合，儘量以生活化的內容貫穿其間，並注重課程內容的可實踐性，以協助學生處理兩性關係的難題。
description.en: Gender Studies is a core issue of interpersonal relationship.  It involves attitudes toward making friends, marriage and social tranquility.  This course aims to help students become aware of sex difference, understand the importance of respect, equality and mutual-help between sexes.  The contents of the course will cover both theory and practice, providing cases and examples related to our daily life so as to help students handle problems when getting along with the opposite sex.

description.zh: 一、教學目標：幫助同學把毛筆字練好，進而培養欣賞能力。二、其教學內容包含1.鑑賞相關知識。2.名碑帖之認識3.篆刻、裱褙    之簡介4.行書、楷書之臨模與創作5.書論之研讀。三、評量則以整學期先後習作之比較出情訂定其成績。
description.en: The purpose of this course is to improve students' ability of appreciating Chinese calligraphy as well as the practice of handwriting skill. The contents include: 1. The knowledge of appreciation 2. Introduction of masterpieces. 3. Introductory studies of seal carving and traditional Chinese picture mounting. 4. Chinese calligraphy practice 5.reference materials study. Grading will be based on the improvement of students` works through all semester.

description.zh: 本課程有系統概括性闡述動態地球科學的基本知識和理論。課程內容包括:地球簡介、地球在天體間的位置、地貌、全球熱量平衡、氣溫、水氣、降雨、風、氣旋、氣候、天氣、生態系統、水文、土壤、地球材料、岩石圈、板塊構造運動、火山、風化作用、塊體運動、淡水、流水地形、地形與岩石構造、風與浪地形、冰川地形、冰川期、土壤與生物等。
description.en: The contents of the course titled " INTRODUCTION TO EARTH SCIENCE " include : the earth; our place in the sun, geomorphology, the earth's global energy balance, air temperature, atmospheric moisture and precipitation, winds and global circulation, weather systems, global climates, global ecosystems, hydrology, global soils, earth materials, the lithosphere and plate tectonics, volcanic and tectonic landforms; weathering and mass erosion, fresh water of the continents; landforms made by running water, landforms and rock structure; landforms made by waves and wind; glacial landforms and the ice age; soil and biology.

description.zh: 本課程以戰後臺灣政治與社會的變遷做為討論的重點，講授內容包括半世紀以來臺灣的民主政治、經濟發展、對外關係以及文教、社會變遷等。希望透過本課程的研讀，能讓學生對戰後臺灣的發展有較全面性的瞭解。
description.en: The course focuses on how the political and social changes take place in Taiwan after World War II. The discussion topics include: the democratic politics, economic development, foreign affairs policies and the changes--cultural, educational and social-- over the past half century in Taiwan. It is our hope that the students will get a far more comprehensive picture of the post-war development in Taiwan.

description.zh: 個人或國家都無法自外於當今的國際社會；政治、經濟、社會、文化各層面皆受到國際間互動的影響下，為增進知識青年具備國際化的視野與認知，以因應時代發展趨勢，在強化技術研究的基礎上，拓展國家、社會與個人的發展空間。本課程內容包括基本理論與國際關係的動態，涵蓋國際社會的結構與演變、國際行為的類型及支配此行為的各種力量、國際事務的現象、本質及因果關係。
description.en: An individual or a country may not keep alien to today's internatonal community. Owing to internationally interactive influence with respect to politic, economy, society and culture, the purpose of the course is to equip intellectual youths with internaitonalized sight and awareness to keep pace with the develolpment trend of times, and to expand the space for national, social and individual development on basic of reinforced technical research. The contents of the course include basic theory and the situation  of international relations, covering the structure and changes in the international community, the type of international behavior, and various forces dominating such behavior, the phenomenon, essence, cause and consequence of international affairs.

description.zh: 人際關係是探討對自我的了解及對人的認知，包括性格、態度、魅力、溝通、壓力、挫折和情緒等重要課題的處理；幫助同學學習與各種不同品味、信念、立場與生活方式的人作有效率的溝通，開放的表達出自己的感覺與想法，以建立良好的合作關係，從而開發潛能、爭取更好的發展機會。
description.en: Interpersonal Relationship is to discuss about self-understanding and perception of other people, including how to handle key issues related to character, attitude, attractiveness, communication, pressure, frustration and emotion.  It helps students to learn effective communication, open their minds to express personal feeling and thought, and try to communicate with other people having different tastes, convictions, standpoints and ways of living so as to establish a harmonic and cooperative relationship and furtherly to develop personal potential and strive for better opportunity of development.

description.zh: 本課程以培養學生尊重與欣賞不同族群、不同時空、不同價值觀所產生的音樂而設。藉由對音樂元素、本質的認知及介紹，欣賞各時期作曲家之代表作品，培養西方音樂的基本常識，建立音樂欣賞的專業態度。教學目標：1.提高學生音樂欣賞的素養，充實其音樂生活的內涵，2.激發學生對音樂的興趣，培育愛樂人口，增進社會祥和的原動力，3.介紹古今中外音樂名家名作，啟發學生對音樂創作的認知與敬重，4.建立學生對古典音樂、民族音樂、應用音樂及通俗音樂等不同類型音樂的正確認知與包容力，培養世界性的音樂觀。授課內容：1.概論, 2.歌樂, 3.器樂, 4.儀式音樂, 5.舞蹈音樂, 6.戲劇音樂。
description.en: This course aims to cultivate students' ability to appreciate music of different ethnic groups, different time and place, different value systems. Through the introduction of basic music elements as well as the appreciation of the masterpieces of various composers, it is hoped that students will build up basic music knowledge about music and enhance professional music appreciation potentiality in music. The goals include: 1. Elevating students' capability in music appreciation 2. Inspiring students' interest in music with a view to improving our society into a harmonious world. 3. Introducing domestic and international famous composers' pieces 4. Touring of various forms of music: classical, ethnic, applied and popular music. Contents of this course include: 1.Introduction 2. Vocal music 3. Instrumental music 4. Ritual music 5. Dance music 6. Theatre music

description.zh: 人的身體一接觸自然界，便開始各個器官的功能，人不如機器，無法汰換零件，加上身體機能遇到問題之後，許多人往往不知如何處理應對，甚至身體出現徵兆也渾然不知。所以此科目最主要的目的是希望藉由對醫學的認識，讓大學生們更瞭解自己的身體，進而保護並時時自我偵測身體是否正常運作，要培養健全的大學生，而不是只會讀書的大病貓。
description.en: Once the human body contacts the natural environment, the organs of the body begin to function.  But the human body can not change it's organizational like machine.  So when our body's function is in trouble, we always have no idea how to solve it, either to find out.  One of these course's objection is to let college students understanding their own body by learning some important medical concepts.  We hope that our country both has excellent and healthy college students,  and not all sick.

description.zh: 本課程將使學生學習到氣象的一些基本知識，並應用於日常生活中。內容包括太空中的地球、天氣的要素、鋒面與風暴、世界的氣候、氣候變遷、天氣的觀測與分析、天氣預報、雲的種類、天象導覽、天氣觀察者指南等。
description.en: This course will let students learn the basic knowledge of the weather and use it to their life. The content includes the earth in the space, elements of the weather, fronts and storms, climate of the world, climate change, observing and analyzing the weather, types of clouds, field guide to the sky, weather watcher's resource guide.

description.zh: 為了讓學生有機會學習有系統的瞭解、接納自己，體諒父母、尊長，關愛別人，回饋社會，進而發揮潛能，自主自在的過一生，乃設計此種10～15人的獨特小團體，運用團體動力，以「交流分析」(Transactional Analysis,TA)為主要理論架構，採理論與實務、個別與團體並重方式，在師生積極參與中，討論、分享、成長。課程內容主要包含交流分析概述，人格結構與功能分析，自我圖，關愛經濟，愛的證言，交流方式分析，時間結構分析，心理遊戲分析，心理劇本分析的理論與習作等。
description.en: In a systematic way, this course will help students understand themselves, accept themselves, and understand their parents and elders.  Also, it teaches students how to care for other people and have contributions to society with a view to promoting students' potential and live their life self-confiently and freely.  The class is to be desinged into groups composed of 10 to 15 students in each section in order to make use of group interactions, to encourage students to actively participate in class discussion and experience sharing.  On the basis of Transactional Analysis(TA), both theory and practice, individual and group activities are emphasized.  Through such a focus, students will go through various stages leading to personal growth.  The contents of this course include: an introduction to TA, an analysis on personality, self-realization, caring and love experiences, transactional analysis, psychological tests, and game analysis, theory and exercise on psychological plays.

description.zh: 藥膳在中醫理論指導下，將中草藥與實務相配合，運用傳統烹調技術和現代加工方法製成味、色、形俱佳的、更有保健和治療作用作之食品，其內容廣泛，迄今已有三千年之歷史。所謂藥食同源更是集中而深刻的體現了藥膳之重要性。本課程共分：湯膳概論、穀物湯膳、蔬菜湯膳、果品湯膳、畜肉湯膳、海鮮湯膳、藥草湯膳和美容養生湯膳等。
description.en: The Applied Nutrition of Life is two credit hours course and design especially for technology students. This curriculum emphasizes on the clinical applications and action mechanisms of various food cooking of Chinese drugs. The curriculum trends will start from more details and bring a completely concepts. The subjects include some Chinese food cooking contain Chinese herbal and some skill to how to select a good quality Chinese herbal.

description.zh: 環境保護是廿世紀的新課題，也是人類目前及未來所面臨的最大考驗。因為環境問題是超越國界的，因此環境的保護是每個人都必須瞭解的，也是每個人應盡的責任。本課程首先在了解環境與生活素質的關係，並了解環境問題的產生及其分類，再就台灣環境問題之所在分析其根源，最後了解台灣環境實施之現況後，並共同研究解決之道。
description.en: Introduction to Environmental Protection is a brand new issue of the 20th century; also, it is the biggest challenge of all human beings and our offspring. Because environmental protection is an international issue, everyone got to realize it's importance and take some action. This lesson is designed to help students understand: 1. the connection between our environment and our living condition; 2.the cause of environmental problems and their classification; 3.the cause of environmental problems in Taiwan; and 4.the solution to Taiwan's environmental problems.

description.zh: 此課程提供理解媒體報導全球暖化相關議題必要的基本知識，主要內容包括以下重點：一、氣候變化與全球暖化現況概述二、地球溫室效應與主要溫室氣體簡介三、氣候的人為暖化與自然變異四、有關全球暖化熱門議題探討
description.en: This is an introductory course to Global Warming. The purpose of the course is aimed to give some basic knowledge to college students for understanding those Global-Warming related issues that have been frequently covered by popular news media.The contents of the course include:1.Climate change and the recent warming trend of the earth.2.Green house effects and green house gases.3.Attribution of recent climate change.4.Discussion on popular issues of global warming.

description.zh: 透過創造力理論建立與創造思考的策略與方法實例演練, 強化學生創意思考能力，讓學生有應用想像力的機會，以培養學生流暢、變通、獨創及精密的思考能力, 進而激發出無限創意潛能。
description.en: Through the establishment of creativity theories and the practices of the methods of creative thinking, students apply their imagination to problem solving. The aim of this course is to stimulating students' creativity by training their thinking modes to be fluent, flexible, original, and precise.

description.zh: 勞動法包括與勞動市場、個別勞動關係及集體勞動關係等方面有關勞工工作權益的法律規範，透過本課程可以學習正確的勞動法律觀念和知識，同時培養縝密思辨的能力，將課堂上所習得的知識應用落實在日常生活中，來保障並維護自己或他人的職場權益。
description.en: The legal specialty called Labor Law can be define as “the legal regulation of the labor market , individual labor relations and collective employer-employee relations. “labor market” pertains to market in which employers and workers exchange labor . Through this course , students can not only get correct concepts of " Labor Law " , but learn to protect their / others' rights in work place.

description.zh: 大眾傳播與人類社會的關係，正隨科技的進步而日益擴大它的影響力。根據學者研究發現，人類的思想、態度與價值觀念受大眾傳播的影響日漸加深，大傳媒介不但塑造人的思想，同時也影響人們的行為及價值；然而從傳播的功能言，大眾傳播同時具有正面與負面的社會功能，故大眾傳播的發展與過程，殊值重視與探討。本課程兼顧理論與實例的探討，包括傳播特性與要素、大眾傳播的能及效果、新聞守門人理論等，並以實例分析新聞的公正客觀性、新聞自由與國家安全、媒體與選舉等傳播爭議性問題。修習本課程可培養學生閱讀新聞的正確性，不玫人云亦云，受媒體報導所擺佈；同時亦可增強學生人際溝通的技巧與能力。
description.en: With the advancement of technology, mass communication is enlarging its influence in human society.  According to  researches, the thoughts, attitudes and value judgements of humans are deeply affected by mass communication.  The media not only shape persons' thoughts, but also have an impact on their behavior and values.  Since mass communication has positive and negative social functions at the same time, its development and process are therefore worthy of paying much attention and exploration to us.  This course includes the study of the theory and practice of mass communication, such as characteristics and elements functions and effects, as well as the theory of the news gatekeepers.  It also uses stories to analyze disputed issues, for example, news objectivism, freedom of the press and national security, and media and election.  Learning this course, students will be not only capable of cultivating the ability to read a news correctl

description.zh: 兩性關係是人際關係的核心問題，它關係著交友的態度、婚姻生活的幸福與社會的祥和。本課程由對兩性差異性的了解為基礎，以尊重為原則，在平等互助的精神中，確定兩性關係的和諧。本課程內容包括理論與實際的配合，儘量以生活化的內容貫穿其間，並注重課程內容的可實踐性，以協助學生處理兩性關係的難題。
description.en: Gender Studies is a core issue of interpersonal relationship.  It involves attitudes toward making friends, marriage and social tranquility.  This course aims to help students become aware of sex difference, understand the importance of respect, equality and mutual-help between sexes.  The contents of the course will cover both theory and practice, providing cases and examples related to our daily life so as to help students handle problems when getting along with the opposite sex.

description.zh: 植物與人類生活息息相關，人類選擇植物加以栽培生產，用來提供食、衣、行、及健康所需，而農耕的發達則與人類文化及社會的演變互相影響。本課程將由各種不同角度介紹，包括植物特性、栽培管理技術、自然環境、地理、人文、社會、政治、經濟等方面，與植物生產的關係。主旨希望同學能了解人類與植物間相依相存的關係，並進一步關懷人類、植物、與自然環境之間的相處之道。
description.en: Plants supply major food for all kinds of living organisms.  This lecture is prepared to introduce the relationship between the crop plant and modern food  production.  The whole spectrum will be viewed from the aspect of the chacteristics of platns, the nature environment, science, human civilization, society, politics and economics, etc..  Hope students can concern and respect the mutuality between plants and human.

description.zh: 本課程主要在介紹綠色科技及其在二十一世紀對人類生活的影響，內容包括現今幾個最重要的「潔能」與「節能」科技。「潔能科技」包括風力能、太陽能、水力能、地球內部能源、生質能、路面能、聲音能、燃料電池、電動車、碳回收等；「節能科技」則包括節能住宅、變頻空調等主題。介紹內容包括各項技術原理介紹及其發展概況。教學目的：綠色科技為21世紀最重要的科技，除了維繫人類在地球上的永續生存外，發展綠色科技更是對抗目前全球金融危機的唯一途徑。本課程希望透過介紹綠色科技，進而喚醒大家對環境的關懷與愛護，更重要的是透過介紹綠色科技的原理，讓更多年輕人瞭解綠色科技，期待綠色科技能在台灣真正技術生根。
description.en: This course aims to introduce green technologies and their influences on human life in the 21st century. The contents consist of the most important topics about the clean energy and energy conservation technologies. The clean energy technology consists of wind energy, solar energy, hydraulic energy, earth interior energy, bioenergy, roadway energy, sound energy, fuel cell, electric vehicles, carbon recapture, and so on. The energy conservation technology consists energy save buildings, variable frequency air-condition, etc.. This course will talk the technical principles and their general developing situations.  教學目的：    Green technology is the most important technology in the 21st century. It does not only influence the human ever life on the earth, but is also the unique road against the present global financial crisis. This course wishes people to care for and love the earth by way of understanding the green technologies. Moreover, this course hope to let more young people

description.zh: 打從這顆行星誕生，輻射就與它共同存在。我們生活的環境裡，包括我們的身體，也到處都有輻射的存在。主要課程內容將包括：1.輻射導論；2.天然輻射：包括宇宙輻射、地表輻射、大氣輻射、水源輻射、食物的輻射、人體內之輻射等；3.人造輻射：包括醫學用輻射、農業用輻射、工業用輻射等；4.核能電廠的輻射、核能電廠事故的輻射與緊急應變、核爆落塵之輻射；5.輻射劑量與防護。
description.en: Since this planet was formed, radiation coexists with it. Radiation exists anywhere including our living surroundings and our body. The lecture will mainly cover: 1.Introduction to radiation;2.Natural radiation: including cosmic rays, radiation from the ground surface, atmospheric radiation, radiation from water, radiation from food, radiation within the body;3.Artificial radiation: radiation employments for medical care,  agriculture, and industry;4.Radiation from nuclear plants, dust fall from nuclear detonation;5.Radiation dose and protection.

description.zh: 本課程將分理論、作品研讀與實地操作三部份。先有對於口述歷史理論基本的認識，再研究選讀近年來的口述歷史作品，透過這些作品瞭解部份歷史，並找出感興趣的題材，在以上理論與實例示範的基礎之下，學生自己擬定口述主題與進行方式，在課堂報告討論之後「下田野」去進行實際的調查，期末再將成果報告出來。
description.en: The main topics for class discussion include of: oral history theory, works and doing. First, students will learn about oral history theory. Second, we will discuss some oral history works, and realize with a part of history through those oral works. Students will find some interesting topics and make a plane to do it. And then we ask students to be an interviewee and make an interview with those people that they have chosen.

description.zh: 讀書報告、專題討論、機電系統產品介紹與討論、Seminar心得等。可重覆修習。
description.en: Case Study, Mechatronics in Industry, Seminars.

description.zh: 本課程探討介紹勞工問題及勞資爭議的基本概念，同時輔以相關案例的檢討分析，以提升學生對於問題的了解，同時幫助學生學習職場溝通，以建立和諧及合作的勞資關係。
description.en: The main  purpose  of  the  course   is  to  discuss  about  problems  arising  from  labor  relation  and  how  to  settle  it  . This  course  focuses  on  the  introduction  to  the  fundamental  ideas  of  labor  problems  and  labor  disputes .  Many  relevant  cases  are  presented  in  class  for  further  discussion  and  analysis  .  It  also  helps  students  to  communicate  with  other  people  in  work  place  so  as  to  establish  a  harmonic  and  cooperative  industrial  relationship .

description.zh: 資訊法律課程將讓同學了解網路資訊社會中各層面的相關法律議題。本課程內容著重於各種網路法律問題，例如資訊安全、網路契約的訂定、網域名稱、數位化著作權、商標權，隱私權以及電腦犯罪種類及防治的介紹。另外，本課程也以個案方式，敘述電腦資訊的相關法律問題，並從中了解虛擬世界與現實世界的法律規範，同時測試自己是否具備足夠的資訊法律知識，能夠在快速變遷的資訊社會中立足與發展。
description.en: The course of Information Laws is designed for the students to familiarize such legal issues in most of the aspects available in the current world as information security, internet contracts, domain names, digital copy rights, trademark ownership, individual privacy and the genre & prevention in relation to computers. In addition, we discuss individual cases to further understand the nature of legal issues concerning computerized information. Hopefully, we learn the legal disciplines existent in the virtual and real worlds; besides, the students are supposed to equip themselves with sufficient legal knowledge so that they can survive and thus keep growing in the ever-changing information society.

description.zh: 環境保護是廿世紀的新課題，也是人類目前及未來所面臨的最大考驗。因為環境問題是超越國界的，因此環境的保護是每個人都必須瞭解的，也是每個人應盡的責任。本課程首先在了解環境與生活素質的關係，並了解環境問題的產生及其分類，再就台灣環境問題之所在分析其根源，最後了解台灣環境實施之現況後，並共同研究解決之道。
description.en: Introduction to Environmental Protection is a brand new issue of the 20th century; also, it is the biggest challenge of all human beings and our offspring. Because environmental protection is an international issue, everyone got to realize it's importance and take some action. This lesson is designed to help students understand: 1. the connection between our environment and our living condition; 2.the cause of environmental problems and their classification; 3.the cause of environmental problems in Taiwan; and 4.the solution to Taiwan's environmental problems.

name.zh: 二十世紀中國現代文學與文化建構
name.en: The modern literature and cultural construction in twentieth century China

description.zh: 本課程關注的焦點將以都市文學和民族/文化/現代建構為基底，以“五四”文學以來的總體概述為起始的一個發現之旅。課程將以夏志清的中國現代小說史為起點，進而以李歐梵對於民國初年出版商和作家和他們的貢獻作為對照，來做為現代城市文化風景的呈現。課程中將以安德森”想像的共同體”為背景，解釋它被各種文化論述所引用的觀點，以各種面向來看待文學作品對於民族建構的貢獻。
description.en: We arrange the course that is based on urban literatures, with issues about the race, culture and the construction of the modern world. The students in the course will be guided into a tour of discovery, which is summed up and initiated from “May 4th Movement”. The progress of course will be mapped out from “A History of Modern Chinese Fiction” compiled by C. T. Hsia (夏志清), and then the analysis from Leo Lee, and other writers, will be compared to exhibit the style and features of modern urban literatures. According to the theory of “Imagined Communities” which is authored by B. Anderson, we will also explain the viewpoints from different cultures, and comment on the analyses to the race construction with varied points of view.

description.zh: 一般認為台灣民間宗教信仰源於中國民間宗教傳說，此說法亦無可厚非，不過台灣民間宗教信仰極重要的特色，已不再是神教文化承接的問題，而是其已轉為在地的以實體寺廟建築場所，作為當地政治社會文化中心所發展出的民間信仰。本課程在讓同學了解台灣地區有哪些歷史悠遠的廟宇主神、事蹟傳說，以及其所帶動的宗教組織和信仰風情。課程包括：1.台灣原住民的巫術與神靈信仰、2.台灣的?時與節慶，如過年與元宵、清明與端午、七夕與普渡、中秋、冬至與尾牙等；3.台灣的主要神明信仰，如媽祖、觀音、關聖帝君、玉皇大帝、玄天上帝、清水祖師、城隍爺、地藏王、福德正神、五府千歲及王船祭等；4.台灣的主要宗教團體如齋教、一貫道、理教、天理教、軒轅教、天帝教、台灣靈乩、符籙學會、儒教學會、亥子道教等。
description.en: "Taiwanese folk religion" involves many dimensions, and it is one the most important applicable knowledge to local education. However, students in elementary and junior high schools still lack of the knowledge in this field. Therefore, the arrangement of lecture, camp, and religious construction regarding to the learning of Taiwanese folk religion is desirable. Hopefully, through all the effort, students could acquire more knowledge about Taiwanese folk religion, and share their learning experience on their daily lives. The main goal of the course is not only to improve the situation that our students have insufficient knowledge about folk religion, but also to help them apply the knowledge on the internet frequently. In addition, we will help students gain more information in this field and improve their learning quality of Taiwanese folk religion in Taiwan. This course include four fields: 1.The various gods that people believe in Taiwan 2.The Taiwanese custom and daily habits 3.The

description.zh: 二十一世紀是中國人的世紀，全球最多的人口，第三大的土地，與台灣如此的近，政治、經濟、軍事、文化發展對台灣均有一定的影響。統一？台獨？無論如何，身為今日在台灣的知識份子，應對它有所瞭解。課程內容包括：中國共產黨的建立與發展、政制體制、教育科學文化發展、經濟展望、國防軍事建設、兩岸關係等。
description.en: This course is designed lets our students have a comprehensive understanding of the Mainland China. Introduced the developing history of Chinese Communism Party ; the organization of political ; the status of economics ; the development of science &　eductaion;the military construction; the policy of one country two systems;and the relationship of two - sides of straits ---。

description.zh: 唸社會哲學的主要原因在於，在社會的架構之內，從哲學的角度去探索一系列很根本的問題。它們包括﹕正義、公平、人權、自由、公民意識、市場與道德、科技與道德的關係等等。我們的探索是以哲學知識做為基礎，例如: 功利主義、康德的道德哲學、羅爾斯的正義理論，還有內格爾、多爾肯、與沈對公平理念的討論等等。由於這些問題與我們的福祉休戚相關，身為一個受過良好教育的社會公民，我們便需要具有社會哲學的知識。準此，我們可以了解社會是如何運作的，並且能夠對一些和我們個人利益乃至公共福祉相關的社會性議題進行反省，從而對它們做出正確的抉擇。
description.en: The main reason for studying Social Philosophy is that within the context of society, a number of fundamental questions can be answered from a philosophical perspective.  These include:  justice, equality, human rights, freedom, citizen consciousness, market and morality, and the relationship between technology and morality, etc. Furthermore, our investigation is based upon philosophical knowledge such as Utilitarianism, Kantian moral philosophy, John Rawls’ theory of justice, the debate of the idea of equality among Thomas Nagel, Ronald Dworkin, and Amartya Sen, etc.  Given these issues are directly relevant to our well-being and benefits, to be informed social citizens, we need to have knowledge of this subject.  Thus, we can know how the human society works, and being able to reflect upon these social issues that concern our personal interests and public welfare in an attempt of making good decisions for them.

description.zh: 通識教育之核心精神為「博雅」，其中「博」指的是知識廣度。是以建構多元認知及探討，正是拓展知識廣度的重要方法。本講座課程係以「單一主題」統領「多面知識」的方式進行授課。課程領域為社會科學，由六至八個相關單元組成，不同專家學者授課。除課堂授課外，得實行「實地體驗教學」，安排參觀與實習。
description.en: "Erudition & Refinement" is among the most essential in the field of General Education. "Erudition" refers to the width of knowledge-also a very important approach in enriching human experience by building multi-dimensional recognition of culture. The Lecture focuses on a "single theme" through the teaching/learning of "a diversity of knowledge. The course areas cover social science. The lecture will consist of six to eight units, which will be taught by different experts and scholars. In addition to the classroom teaching, there may also be "Experiencing Teaching On the Spot"-or rather, a visit to the location in question or practicum.

description.zh: 使同學具備良好的造形能力，對於今後從事各類型之設計、繪製圖表等均有幫助。教學內容包括筆法及明度練習，室內靜物寫生，室外樹木、建築物之寫生。教學方法：先練習運用鉛筆，使其表現各種筆觸、輕重，再要求造形之準確度，達到形態和質感的表現正確，以及構圖有美感的能力。先由老師示範，而後同學練習
description.en: Equip students with the ability of styling so that their designing and drawing ability can be improved. The teaching material used for this class includes stroke and chiaroscuro, drawing of still life, and nature painting outside. Teaching method: Practice how to use a pencil for the demonstrating various touches in light and heavy strokes.  Students shall learn how to perform  precise styling,  correct expression of formation and personality, and a beautiful configuration. The instructor will give a demonstration first and then students shall follow and learn.

description.zh: 因是在大專教藝術欣賞的課程，我在設計課程上，即考慮雖同學們不是藝術本科學生，但秉持"雖創作，但會欣賞的原則"，我的課程安排將從上古時代人類的美術創作活動進而引導解釋什麼是人類的美感經驗。讓他們明瞭東方藝術之同與不同，再介紹東西方的繪畫潮流，如西方：從文藝復興至寫實主義，印象主義，至超印象主義，東方：從漢的畫象磚開始至中國畫，書法之演進，中西繪畫之比較，內容是繁而多的。但我將用簡潔扼要的"重點教學法",寓教於樂的方式，讓同學不再懼怕"Art'，甚至可以簡單的分辨出藝術品的年代，作者，及欣賞藝術作品的要領，這是我給此門課所訂的目標。另一個教學重點是："理論和實際併重"。在每一單元中，我將設計一項簡的[自己動手做]大概祇花 20-30 分鐘讓學生體會和真正看見，明白，藝術家製造藝術品的過程。很希望能帶學生至博物院或美術館一趟，或至鶯砍參觀陶工廠。總之，一切課程計劃，乃配合學生之程度與興趣。
description.en: Because most students taking this course are not art major; therefore, I adhere to the principle of "Although not creation, appreciation will be instructed."  On course design, my class starts from the artistic creation of human beings in prehistoric time and further introduces the experience of beauty sensed by man and understand the similiar and difference of eastern and western art.  Moreover, I will introduce the fashion of priniting of eastern and western culture.  For example, the western culture: from the Renaissance to realism, impressionism and super impressionism.  Western culture: from a portrait stone of Han Dynasty to Chinese painting, the develpment of calligraphy and comparison of Chinese and western paintings. The teaching content is complicated, but I will simply it and highlight teaching way to let my students enjoy it.

name.en: The Social and Cutural Characters in Taiwan

description.zh: 本課程的主要內容是涵括台灣社會與台灣文化兩大部份，台灣社會部份可分為早期台灣原住民社會，十七世紀以後漢人社會的建立，十九世紀從移民社會到定居社會，近代工商業社會的建立等幾部份；文化方面則以原住民文化，漢人文化及近代文化為教授重點，希望在一學期的課程中使學生對台灣的社會與文化有一概括性的了解。
description.en: This course primarily includes two major sections: Taiwan's society and Taiwan's culture.  Taiwan's society is made up of early aboriginal society, Han immigrant society after 17th century, the society of settlement in 19th century and the establishment of industrial/commercial society after 1930.  Taiwan's culture focuses on aboriginal culture, Han culture, and contemporary culture.  This one-semester course provides students with the basic knowledge about the Taiwan's society and culture in the hope that the students would have a comprehensive understanding of the culture and society in Taiwan.

description.zh: 以深入淺出、活潑互動的方式，先帶領學生透過單元主題的討論，逐步認識佛學，正確地了解佛教的人生觀、宇宙觀、倫理觀及解脫觀等義理。在具備一定的理論基礎之後，再深入地與學生分享如何將這些學到的教理實際運用於日常生活，好讓自己獲得身心的安頓，創造光明喜悅的人生。
description.en: The purpose of this course is to help students to know Buddhism progressively by way of explain the profound theories in simple terms. After possessing certain Buddhist knowledge, the course's purpose will turn to the application of Buddhism in the daily life. We hope that after showing the right way of practicing the Buddhist teachings could help students to lead a joyful life.

description.zh: 何謂法國文化？文化對法國人而言代表了生活，每一分每一秒法國人都在創造編織文化，生活的點點滴滴具體象徵法蘭西文化與民族特性。隨著歐盟的成立與運作，地域文化的發展，東西歐文化交流與非歐洲移民文化的包容，再加上法國文化政策以發展地方文化為標的，使得20世紀的法國文化有別於過去的面貌。本課程將不同主題以單元方式探討，學習者可由中認識、了解法國文化的多元、形成方式，進而分辨與其它文化的差異點。此外，學習者需要自備主題參與討論、探討。主題準備方式是以在既有的書面或官方網站資料中衍生個人創意與想像力。
description.en: What is French Culture? For the French people, culture represents daily life, every minute and second the French is creating and weaving their culture, thus strengthening the symbol of French Culture and its identity. With the establishment and development of the European Union, France underwent a phase of decentralization and immigration; greatly influencing and changing the visage of 20the century French culture from before. Therefore, this course aims to stimulate discussion of the chapters through different subjects. Through this method, the students will be able to recognize and understand more about the diversity and formation of French culture; in addition, they will be capable of telling the differences between French culture and other cultures. During this course, the students are required to choose a subject to discuss and research. Note that in preparation of their final orientation, the information within must be based on photocopied texts or official websites in order to d

description.zh: 素描是造型能力訓練，水彩則為色彩的美感訓練。本課程先以幻燈教學方式，欣賞中外名家的水彩作品，再作實際水彩畫練習。首先教調色法，接著指導靜物、樹木、建築物等畫法，以其達到能具備室內靜物畫，及室外風景寫生的能力。
description.en: Sketch trains mold-making ability, and watercolor trains esthetic sense Ability of colors. First,this course lead you to enjoy famous watercolor painting by slide and then you practice actually painting. When you start to paint,the teacher let you know to paint different things, such as still life,trees or buildings. So that you can have ability of painting stillLife and of sketching outside scenery.

description.zh: 美學是一門研究人類感性知識的學科。近代探索中國美學，旨在對古代中國人的美意識，包括基本概念、範疇、規律等，加以剖析歸納，儘可能以現代語言表述，準確闡明其在美學理論上之實際涵義。本課程擬就近年中國美學研究成果，擇取代表性單元作為介紹重點：一、	美、美學、審美心理要素二、	「美」「善」在文字上表現中國人原始的美意識三、	中國禮制、藝術在用色上所蘊含的文化特性四、	中國線文藝術的特殊趨向五、	其他重要美學議題
description.en: Aesthetics is the study of knowledge of perception of humans. Recent study of Chinese aesthetics focuses very much on the ideas of beauty, including basic concepts, scope and regularities, on which analytical and inferential research is performed to explicitly express what aesthetic principles imply through the representation of the modern language. The course is designed to introduce to the students the most typical achievements we have made in the past centuries on the Chinese aesthetics.1.	Psychological factors that influence beauty, the fields of beauty and aesthetics2.	The underlying ideology of beauty revealed by "Beauty" and "Virtue," when realized through the form of written language3.	The cultural properties that are reflected by the choice of color in the ancient ceremonies on various occasions as well as in the art 4.	The particular trend as is shown in the art of linear texts5.	Other important issues on Aesthetics

description.zh: 小說是文學中重要的一支，而短篇小說更是利用最經濟的文學手段以塑造人物形象，反映社會現實的一種藝術。我國的短篇小說，自唐至清，代有佳作，故本課程即以歷代傑出作品為範疇，選擇最具代表性的篇章，透過閱讀及討論之方式，對其做多層面之探討，以期使受教者能在宏觀方面瞭解其所反映之當代文化及歷史價值，在微觀方面則能欣賞其所體現的文學藝術，最終並能掌握課堂所學，觸類旁通，施用於其他相關領域之學習。
description.en: Fiction is one of the important genres of literature. The novelette is regarded as the most effective means to depict people and reflect the society. From Tan Dynastic to Chiang Dynastic, Chinese classical novelette abounded with great works of fiction. This course aims to introduce some representative works of Chinese classical novelettes. By reading and discussing works of novelettes, we can understand their social background and their value in history in macro view and enjoy their beauty of literature forms in micro view. Students can apply what they learned in this course to their specific field of study.

description.zh: 本課程在介紹科學技術之重要成就及其發展，使學生對科技有一具體的認識。社會變遷、思考模式、文化發展等，影響科技的發展極大，而相關問題的探討，可使學生認識科技發展的特色及其優缺點，並引導其思考何以近兩三百年來科技衰落的原因，并尋求正確的發展方向。
description.en: he course will systematically introduce the development and important achievements of ancient technology so that students will have a profound understanding of it.  Besides, since social changes, the mode of thinking, cultural development, etc. are closely related to the development of technology, these topics will also be discussed.  In this way, students will have a more comprehensive understanding of the characteristics, advantages, and disadvantages of technology.  Hopefully, they may try to inquire why the development of technology has lagged behind in these 300 years and may start to find a perspective course for the development of technology in the future.

name.en: Elective  Curriculum of Liberal Arts Education：Nature

description.zh: n
description.en: n

notes: 自然選修,交大同步遠距,王從恕老師,9/27上課

description.zh: 這e世紀時代的資訊交流是一個廣泛、多樣化與複雜的；究竟人們如何透過溝通表達意識與行為，卻變成非常重要。有效的溝通程度常視為學習溝通的指標，須視事實、竟見、感覺、嗜好和經驗進行徹底地交融與分享的結果。因此，本課程重視現代社會學習「溝通管理」的二項關鍵技術包括：有效溝通結合自我學習技巧和方法：商業知識與科技結合促成人的系統互動能力，配合多媒體傳輸工具完成學習個人與團體溝通效益。課程涵概主題:1.溝通管理定義與本質元素。2.溝通管理內涵分析。3.學習個人溝通能力。4.學習溝通程序。5.e化自我學習技巧、方法與表達能力。6.學習全球化溝通科技工具。7.團隊溝通的策略與協同戰術。8.塑造整體溝通文化。
description.en: The information exchange is wide, variety, and complicated in the e-era; how do people express their consciousness and behavior turn to become very important. Effective communication degrees usually are seen as the index of learning communication. It depends on thoroughly melting and sharing with fact, opinion, feeling, interesting and experience. Therefore, "Communication Management," in this course we emphasize on two key techniques of modern society learning including: effective communication with self-learning skill and method; Business knowledge and technology with interactive ability of human system. By using multimedia transmitting tools to complete self and group learning communication and get benefit.Course Subjects:1. Definition and essential element of Communication Management.2. Content analysis of Communication Management.3. Learn personal communication ability.4. Learn communication process.5. E-learning skill, method, and expression ability.6. Learn the technical tools

description.zh: 本課程包含：1.多頻帶射頻接收機架構及鏈路預算2.多頻帶射頻接收機電路設計3.多頻帶射頻發射機架構及鏈路預算4.多頻帶射頻發射機電路設計5.多頻帶壓控振盪器與鎖相迴路設計學生能從這門課學習到多頻射頻收發系統的分析、設計與應用。

description.zh: 課程內容包含：系統定義、資料分析、迴歸方法、系統元件數值模建立、數值計算方法、系統性能模擬及數值佳化方法。
description.en: The course materials are as follows: definition of system, analysis of data, regression method, modeling equipment, numerical calculation, simulation and optimization of system

name.zh: 創新講座－產品與服務創新策略
name.en: Innovation Lecture - product and service innovation strategy

description.zh: 本課程目標在教導學生針對台灣目前經濟發展過程中，所面臨之問題透過創新設計的步驟與方法，策劃出符合技術發展企業「整合跨領域資源與知識」經營體質，並且能滿足市場及使用者使用情況需求的產品，經由邀請產業專家蒞校進行講座課程演講及論壇之方式，進行創產品與服務創新策略之實例教學，使學術與產業進行交流拉近產學之距離。
description.en: This course aims to teach about solving the problem of economic development of Taiwan through the way and method of innovation design; and to plan out the “Integration of interdisciplinary resources and knowledge” operating conditions fitting with technology development enterprise and products according needs of markets and users. Through lectures and conferences with industry experts, this course will also teach about existing cases of product and service innovation strategy. This course also aims to increase interactivities of academic and industry.

notes: 四設三、創新所與最後一哩合開

name.zh: 國際觀培養-全球化企業經營策略
name.en: Feast for the global perspective —Business Strategies of Global Enterprises

description.zh: 本課程藉由台灣企業與莘莘學子們的交流，分享企業品牌的經營、整合行銷、外銷推廣等經驗之機會，並佐以台灣企業品牌之實際案例，能讓台灣企業與年輕學子能由認識自己所屬國家的奮鬥過程，才能更進一步的追求國際觀，追求更廣闊的國際視野。
description.en: We invite the domestic business manager, as the model of outstanding and successful enterprise, to share his experiences of achievement with students. By offering the real examples, business manager will make students learn further about the Taiwan brand and innovation and creation thinking. Furthermore, to inspire students to pursue their ambition of achievement to strengthen their wills to plan the future.

name.zh: 創意與創新管理事業化
name.en: How to implement innovation into realized enterprise

description.zh: 在許多場合，無論是研討會、交流會等均會有許多創意點子出現，但多數的點子有如雨水一般，如果不能蓄存，散落後就消失；反之如果有系統收集，它就成為企業創新的主要來源，而透過企業創新的多元面向，如產品創新、流程創新、行銷創新等，均可為企業帶來附加價值，提升競爭力。本課程主要內容有產品創新、流程創新、經營模式創新、行銷創新、識別系統創新、組織創新、新事業創新、創意與創新管理事業化等，有助於學生將創意和創業事業化。
description.en: In many seminar and mutual discussion cases, there are many good ideas happened. But innovation like rain fall, if we don't have reservoir to keep it, It will rain everywhere and disappeared. If we have data base to collect all the innovation, It will to be value material in enterprise innovation. Through product innovation, process innovation and marketing innovation, It will bring high value to enterprise and rises its competing ability. From "How to establish an enterprise" classes, We find many students have many good ideas, If we can give them more advanced knowledge to use such ideas, It will benefit them success in establish an enterprise.

notes: 四管三與最後一哩合開

name.zh: 創業講座-網路創新服務

description.zh: 隨著網際網路的發展，電子商務的產值快速成長，網路創業大行其道，成為許多創業者的新選擇，面對這波網路創業風潮，應如何在茫茫網海中嶄露頭角？網路上沒有絕對正確的答案，最好的學習方式就是彼此分享成功經驗。這次講座特別邀請國內知名的網路創業達人，分享他們的創業故事。走吧，跟著這次講座來趟冒險吧！
description.en: Along with the prosperous development of Internet, the output value of E-commerce is growing fast. Launching a business on the internet has become a new choice for many entrepreneurs. How do you create a successful internet business endeavor?There is no specific success formula; the best way is to learn from the experts in this field. This course will invite well-known internet entrepreneurs to share their success stories with the students and allow students to gain insights to various internet business models.

notes: 四管三、經管所與最後一哩合開

name.zh: 創業講座-網路創新服務

description.en: Along with the prosperous development of Internet, the output value of E-commerce is growing fast. Launching a business on the internet has become a new choice for many entrepreneurs. How do you create a successful internet business endeavor?There is no specific success formula; the best way is to learn from the experts in this field. This course will invite well-known internet entrepreneurs to share their success stories with the students and allow students to gain insights to various internet business models.

name.en: Practice of Yarn and Fabric Formation

description.zh: 實際了解和操作短纖維及長纖維的主要紡紗與織布製程。對相關工廠的流程設計和產品企劃也應一併予以知悉。
description.en: To understand the process technology of yarn and fabric formation in detail. The plant design and the product planning are also evaluated.

name.zh: 國際觀培養:東協商務、文化
name.en: Development of global perspective: the series of ASEAN Community

description.zh: 東南亞地區向來為台灣的重要經貿夥伴，而東協十國已決定於2015年效法歐盟成立經濟共同體(ASEAN Community)，並積極尋求與日本、中國、南韓、印度、澳洲與紐西蘭等六國，簽署雙邊自由貿易協定，希望未來能建立一個30億人口、年經濟產值達九兆美元的「東亞自由貿易區」。希望藉由此次課程，讓學生瞭解東協成立後，臺灣的未來產業與市場發展，充實學生未來就業所需知識與技能。並藉由東南亞文化講座，開啟學生的國際視野，鼓勵學生實際透過度假打工、遊學、自助旅行、公益旅行、壯遊體驗等方式赴海外體驗學習，使其得以在經濟不景氣的時代下擴展未來的就業版圖。
description.en: Southeast Asia has been the most important economic and trading partner with Taiwan. Association of Southeast Asian Nations decided to found ASEAN Community in 2015, which takes European Union as a model. At the same time, it is vigorously looking for signing the Bilateral Free Trade Agreement with Japan, China, South Korea, India, Australia and New Zealand for the purpose of establishing an East Asia Free Trade Zone which accounts for the population of 3 billion of people and 9 trillion of GDP. We hope that we can make students learn more about this rising market after the establishment of ASEAN Free Trade Area (AFTA) by introducing them various aspects of Southeast Asia, including its cultures by means of taking part in a working holiday, a study abroad program, a backpacking tour, voluntourism, or a Grand Tour. After this class, students are expected to learn about new employment opportunities in this era of recession and high unemployment rate.

description.zh: 本課程之目標在於建構產業分析之思維架構及洞悉市場發展之研究能力，以因應市場之快速變遷,並介紹學生瞭解總體經濟與產業景氣分析,公司經營財務報表分析,投資標的評價與技術分析。透過研究方法之介紹及預測手法之教導並輔以個案實作以達其效。
description.en: The objective of the course is to construct the infrastructure of industry analysis and to build up the research capability for changing market development. The fundamental analysis of macro economy and business cycle, financial statement analysis and investment valuation methods are also studied. By introducing the methodologies and forecasting tools, the case study is implied in this class.

description.zh: 本課程主要在介紹中華民國憲法、探討憲政體制的運作、人民權利義務的規範及相關法律的適用等問題。期能使學生認知國家民主法治的實施狀況，維護社會秩序與個人基本權利，進而體現人性尊嚴的價值。
description.en: This course focuses the discussions on the Constitution of the Republic of China,constitutional mechanism, the rights and obligations for the people and legitimate operations of the society. It is our hope that the students may have a better understanding on how the democracy is performed in our country as well as on how to preserve social security and basic human rights of the individuals-with the realization of human dignity as our extreme goal.

notes: 博雅核心-法治,限外籍生修讀

description.zh: 本課程旨在培養學生成為具有深度文化視覺的科技人。從認識本土文化為起點，進而認識世界文化。引導學生如何探究文化現象，並且深入文化的精神境界，物質境界，瞭解文化價值與文化傳統，讓文化觀點充分融入個人的思維內涵。
description.en: The main purpose of this course is to develop the cultural cultivation of our technology majored students. Starting with the culture of our own land and extending to world-wide culture. The teachers would guide the students to explore the phenomena of the culture, and try to find out both the spirit and the material of the culture. Through the understanding of the worth and the tradition of the culture, the students might merge the cultural cultivation into their personal thinking.

notes: 博雅核心-文學,限外籍生修讀

description.zh: 本課程所為研究所課程，內容包括狀態控間分析，頻域分析，現代數位控制理論分析及控制器設計，應用實例介紹。
description.en: This course is designed mainly for senior-graduate students. The objective of this course is to introduce some fundamental concepts of digital control, such as state space approach, frequency domain approach, and modern control theory. The design and applications of the digital controllers are also included.

name.zh: 全民國防教育軍事訓練(三)

description.zh: 「國防科技」單元，主要使學生了解武器系統概況，並認識國防科技發展與我國國防產業現況，引發對國防科技的興趣，進而認同國防、支持國防。軍事訓練課目：軍事素養─軍兵種介紹、軍事素養─武器系統介紹、軍事素養─資訊作戰、核生化作戰及核生化訓練簡介、愛國教育（莒光園地專題研討）。
description.en: In Defense Technology, the main object is to let students overview the development of weapon systems, and understand the current development of the nation’s defense technology and defense industry, inspiring their interest in defense technology, and further identify and support national defense.The matched subjects of military training follow as below: Military Literacy—Introduction to Services and Arms, Military Literacy—Introduction to Weapon Systems, Military Literacy— Information Operations, Introduction to NBC Warfare and Training, and Patriotic Education (specific topics digested from TV program Chu-kuang Garden).

description.zh: 課程內容包括：審計及會計專業、AICPA Top10 Technologies、AIS research methods、IT technologies、查核規劃、Risk analysis、Security management、內部控制結構等。本課程將介紹的主題如下： ◆會計資訊系統之重要性和意義 ◆會計資訊系統與內外環境的關係 ◆資料處理作業程序中的五大功能 ◆內部控制與會計資系統 ◆資訊系統的工具與技術 ◆系統開發 ◆資料庫管理 ◆會計實務軟體的介紹與操作 ◆介紹有關AIS研究之分類及內容。 ◆新興的AIS研究課題及資訊應用。
description.en: Accounting information systems courses will provide the discussion on the areas of auditing and accounting profession, AICPA Top10 Technologies, AIS research methods, IT technologies, Risk analysis, Security management and Internal control, etc. In completing this course, the student's objectives will be ... 1. To develop an awareness of recent developments in accounting information systems technology. 2. To become familiar with, and gain research interests in the continuous auditing, accounting information systems and recently development of CAATs. 3. To become aware of the relationship between accounting information systems and the other subsystems that comprise management information systems, and to understand the role of accountants as designers, users, and evaluators of information systems. To gain experience working successfully in group settings.

description.zh: 工程分析概論，有限元素模型建立，進階模組技巧，實體模型的建立，一維元素分析，二維元素分析，三維元素分析，進階範例。
description.en: Introduction to Engineering Analysis, Finite Element Model Constructing, Advanced Techniques of Module, Solid models Constructing, One-dimensional Analysis, Two-dimensional Analysis, Three-dimensional Analysis, Advanced Examples.

description.zh: 本課程針對財務管理基本原理並配合各項相關議題進行個案研討，內容涵蓋：財務規劃與預測、資本預算決策、營運資金政策、長短期融資決策、股利政策、資本資產定價理論、套利定價理論、投資組合理論、合併與收購、行為財務…等。本課程結合財務管理實務並融入財務策略研討，以培育理論與實務兼備之財務管理人才。透過本課程之修習，期許學生能具備財務管理領域之學科知識與專業技術整合能力、獨立研究之能力、判斷性思考與決策能力，及制訂並解決財務管理問題之能力。
description.en: This course is case study approach, for the financial management theory to discuss relevant issues with financial decision-making. Seminar covers: Financial planning and forecasting, capital budgeting decisions, working capital policy, short-term and long-term financing decisions, dividend policy, capital asset pricing theory, arbitrage pricing theory, portfolio theory, mergers and acquisitions, behavioral finance, etc. This course combines business management practices and financial strategies into the discussion, in order to foster both theory and practice of financial management personnel. Through the course of the attendance, students should be able to have the financial management of the academic ability to integrate knowledge and expertise, the ability of independent research, critical thinking and decision-making capacity, and ability to solve financial management problems.

notes: 博士班,碩士生欲修習須經授課教師同意後方可

description.zh: 機械振動、非線性振動、振動量測、振動抑制及隔離技術、振動與波之傳播、聲音之反射及折射、噪音之降低及吸音材料、消音器與噪音控制、法規及環境等。
description.en: Topics include: Mechanical vibration, Vibration  transmission, Vibration measurement, The use of vibration isolators and absorbers, Fundamentals of acoustics, Noise control engineering, Instrumentation and Law.

name.en: High efficiency switching mode power supplies

description.zh: 主題:1. 切換式電源供應器 (降壓,昇壓,降昇壓,返馳式,諧振轉換器)2. 發光二極體電源應用3. 轉接器電源應用4. 個人電腦電源應用5. 伺服器電源應用
description.en: Topic:1. Switching Power Converters (buck, boost, buck-boost, flyback, LLC converter)2. LED power Applications3. Adaptor Applications4. PC Power Applications5. Server Power Applications

description.zh: 1. 簡介2. 數學基礎	- 機率	- 隨機程序：自相關函數與功率密度函數，高斯程序、白雜訊	- 正交開展與線性濾波	- 取樣與量化3. 最佳接收器設計	- 信號的幾何表示	- 最大事後機率與最大可能接收原理	- 相配濾波器	- 錯誤機率4. 數位調變與多工技術	- 數位調變：振幅移鍵調變、相位移鍵調變、四相振幅調變、頻率移鍵調變	- 數位調變的取捨條件：錯誤機率、功率、頻寬與複雜度	- 多工技術：分頻多工、分時多工、分碼多工5. 消息理論簡介	- 源編碼與熵	- 通道編碼與通訊容量

name.zh: 生醫植入晶片系統實務
name.en: Special Projects on Biomedical Integrated System

description.zh: 本課程之目標在於提供修課學生對於生醫植入晶片在實務上的設計與應用。利用晶片植入系統擷取動物的生理參數或用以治療疾病，瞭解生理參數所代表的意義，以及設計新的生醫晶片系統架構來提昇目前的醫療技術。
description.en: The object of this course is to provide students for learning the special projects on Biomedical integrated system. Using the system to capture the animals' physiological parameters or to treatment diseases, and understand the meaning of these physiological parameters. Moreover, some techniques can be developed for improving the existing technologies.

description.zh: 1.無線通訊簡介 2.IS-95CDMA系統介紹 3.智慧型天線系統簡介 4.智慧型天線於CDMA系統之應用 5.使用智慧型天線改進CDMA系統之效能6.向量傳播通道特性 7.適應性陣列信號演算法則 8.信號到達方向估測演算法則

description.zh: 本課程為光電科學之概念介紹，本課程包括光的特性、固態物理概念、光的調變、顯示器、雷射、光偵測器、光纖維波導以及光通訊系統。
description.en: The course of Introduction to Optoelectronic Engineering introduces the concepts of the science of electro-optics. It consists properties of light, concepts of solid state physics, modulation of light, display devices, lasers, photo-detectors, fiber optical wave-guide and optical communication systems.

notes: 四光二和四電資二合開
